title: Adobe Acrobat Reader: Edit PDF
description:
Major new update

Major new update: The new Adobe Acrobat AI Assistant makes it easier than ever to do more with PDFs. Adobe Acrobat AI Assistant ‚Ä¢ Work across multiple files in one place with PDF Spaces. Collaborate, store, and use AI Assistant across files ‚Ä¢ Use voice or text prompts with AI Assistant chatbot ‚Ä¢ Ask questions and get cited answers about details in your document, including charts, graphs, and tables with Figures Q&A ‚Ä¢ Easily share the responses you get ‚Ä¢ Try voice support to ask queries and have answers read aloud. ‚Ä¢ Instantly generate summaries from your PDFs with Generative AI Summaries ‚Ä¢ Get content for emails, text, study notes, blogs, and more [Adobe Acrobat AI Assistant is a paid feature*, free for a limited time] The world‚Äôs most trusted PDF reader, PDF editor, and PDF maker with more than 635 million installs. View, share, annotate, add comments, and sign documents - all in one app. You can store your files online and read documents anywhere. Get your 7-day free trial and try all the features of Acrobat Reader.

Paid features

Edit PDFs ‚Ä¢ With our PDF editor, edit text and images directly in your PDF (mobile only) ‚Ä¢ Fix typos or add paragraphs with the PDF editor ‚Ä¢ Easily add, delete, or rotate any image ‚Ä¢ Use this PDF signer and PDF viewer to get your docs just right Recognize text ‚Ä¢ Optical Character Recognition (OCR) turns scanned PDFs into searchable, editable text to use in other formats Merge & organize PDFs with PDF converter ‚Ä¢ Split or combine multiple files into one PDF with PDF converter ‚Ä¢ Use the PDF editor to insert, delete, rotate, crop & reorder pages in your PDF file Create, convert & export PDFs ‚Ä¢ Easily convert to PDF from any file type including Microsoft, Google Docs, and images ‚Ä¢ Export and convert PDFs to Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, or various image files ‚Ä¢ Convert web pages to PDFs Compress & highly secure PDFs ‚Ä¢ Compress PDF files for easy saving and sharing ‚Ä¢ Password Protect PDF documents Have your PDF read aloud ‚Ä¢ Listen to your PDFs on the go, great for reading support ‚Ä¢ Choose free voices or upgrade for high-quality options Subscribe now to access all these features and use Acrobat across mobile and web platforms.

Free-to-use features

PDF signer: Fill & Sign Adobe Fill & Sign is free & available in Acrobat Reader. A form filler and PDF signer that lets you fill, sign, and send Liquid mode for optimal PDF viewing ‚Ä¢ Get the best PDF reading experience with this PDF viewer ‚Ä¢ Search, navigate & adjust font size or spacing to fit your screen Share PDFs & collaborate ‚Ä¢ Share files for commenting or viewing, tag others with @mention, and manage all comments in one place ‚Ä¢ Receive activity notifications for shared files Annotate PDFs ‚Ä¢ Add sticky notes, comments, and highlight text Store & manage files ‚Ä¢ Link online storage accounts like Microsoft OneDrive, Dropbox, or Google Drive ‚Ä¢ Star files to quickly open important documents Connect the PDF viewer and reader to Google Drive ‚Ä¢ A PDF creator that lets you edit, compress, and export Google Drive files with a subscription Work with scanned documents ‚Ä¢ Access scanned PDFs from Adobe Scan in Acrobat to fill, sign, and share The Acrobat Reader mobile app is designed to work with customers who have Enterprise Mobility Management (EMM) enabled. An Adobe Acrobat AI Assistant add-on plan is available to Acrobat Individual customers. Terms & Conditions: Your use of this application is governed by the Adobe General Terms of Use http://www.adobe.com/go/terms_en and the Adobe Privacy Policy http://www.adobe.com/go/privacy_policy_en Do not sell or share my personal information www.adobe.com/go/ca-rights
descriptionHTML:
Major new update

Major new update: The new Adobe Acrobat AI Assistant makes it easier than ever to do more with PDFs.

Adobe Acrobat AI Assistant
‚Ä¢ Work across multiple files in one place with PDF Spaces. Collaborate, store, and use AI Assistant across files
‚Ä¢ Use voice or text prompts with AI Assistant chatbot
‚Ä¢ Ask questions and get cited answers about details in your document, including charts, graphs, and tables with Figures Q&A
‚Ä¢ Easily share the responses you get
‚Ä¢ Try voice support to ask queries and have answers read aloud.
‚Ä¢ Instantly generate summaries from your PDFs with Generative AI Summaries
‚Ä¢ Get content for emails, text, study notes, blogs, and more

[Adobe Acrobat AI Assistant is a paid feature*, free for a limited time]

The world‚Äôs most trusted PDF reader, PDF editor, and PDF maker with more than 635 million installs. View, share, annotate, add comments, and sign documents - all in one app. You can store your files online and read documents anywhere.

Get your 7-day free trial and try all the features of Acrobat Reader.

Paid features

Edit PDFs
‚Ä¢ With our PDF editor, edit text and images directly in your PDF (mobile only)
‚Ä¢ Fix typos or add paragraphs with the PDF editor
‚Ä¢ Easily add, delete, or rotate any image
‚Ä¢ Use this PDF signer and PDF viewer to get your docs just right

Recognize text
‚Ä¢ Optical Character Recognition (OCR) turns scanned PDFs into searchable, editable text to use in other formats

Merge & organize PDFs with PDF converter
‚Ä¢ Split or combine multiple files into one PDF with PDF converter
‚Ä¢ Use the PDF editor to insert, delete, rotate, crop & reorder pages in your PDF file

Create, convert & export PDFs
‚Ä¢ Easily convert to PDF from any file type including Microsoft, Google Docs, and images
‚Ä¢ Export and convert PDFs to Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, or various image files
‚Ä¢ Convert web pages to PDFs

Compress & highly secure PDFs
‚Ä¢ Compress PDF files for easy saving and sharing
‚Ä¢ Password Protect PDF documents

Have your PDF read aloud
‚Ä¢ Listen to your PDFs on the go, great for reading support
‚Ä¢ Choose free voices or upgrade for high-quality options

Subscribe now to access all these features and use Acrobat across mobile and web platforms.

Free-to-use features

PDF signer: Fill & Sign
Adobe Fill & Sign is free & available in Acrobat Reader. A form filler and PDF signer that lets you fill, sign, and send

Liquid mode for optimal PDF viewing
‚Ä¢ Get the best PDF reading experience with this PDF viewer
‚Ä¢ Search, navigate & adjust font size or spacing to fit your screen

Share PDFs & collaborate
‚Ä¢ Share files for commenting or viewing, tag others with @mention, and manage all comments in one place
‚Ä¢ Receive activity notifications for shared files

Annotate PDFs
‚Ä¢ Add sticky notes, comments, and highlight text

Store & manage files
‚Ä¢ Link online storage accounts like Microsoft OneDrive, Dropbox, or Google Drive
‚Ä¢ Star files to quickly open important documents

Connect the PDF viewer and reader to Google Drive
‚Ä¢ A PDF creator that lets you edit, compress, and export Google Drive files with a subscription

Work with scanned documents
‚Ä¢ Access scanned PDFs from Adobe Scan in Acrobat to fill, sign, and share

The Acrobat Reader mobile app is designed to work with customers who have Enterprise Mobility Management (EMM) enabled.

An Adobe Acrobat AI Assistant add-on plan is available to Acrobat Individual customers.

Terms & Conditions:
Your use of this application is governed by the Adobe General Terms of Use http://www.adobe.com/go/terms_en and the Adobe Privacy Policy http://www.adobe.com/go/privacy_policy_en

Do not sell or share my personal information www.adobe.com/go/ca-rights
summary: Convert PDFs, edit files, read and sign forms, and view work docs in one app.

scraped_reviews.content: If you work with a wide array of documents,if you fiddle with forms, or find yourself finagling all kinds of frickn' flowsheet formats, well then, you'll flipping feel this aps' factually fantastic. Long day, what can I say? - Really though, Acrobat's been decent to good. One small gripe's related to their AI. I've found it to be less than useful, but, then again, it's optional. Once they get it right, it will be such a profound help.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! Thank you for the 4 stars! We strive for perfection. What could we do to turn your 4-star experience into a 5-star one? Your feedback is important to us. ^RS

scraped_reviews.content: I wanted to only use the free trial. I cancelled right away and somehow I got charged $70! Seriously, even if it is an error on my end to force me to pay for something for an entire year instead of something like a month is ridiculous. Also it was unnecessarily not simple for a task I wanted to do that should be simple
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! Sorry, this happened üòî. We understand how frustrating this can be. For refund help, please reach out to our support team here: [adobe.ly/contactsupport]. They'll guide you step by step and ensure you get the right assistance. We truly value your patience and understanding. Thanks! ^VK

scraped_reviews.content: I paid months in advance for the premium subscription because I use Acrobat all the time (fill & sign, editing, etc.), but I‚Äôm honestly shocked. Since upgrading, I get more pop-up ads and interruptions than before I was paying. That makes zero sense‚Äîwhy bombard a paying customer with ads after you already have my money? The core tools are good, but the constant ‚Äúupsell‚Äù garbage ruins the experience. You were awesome until greed got in the way. I‚Äôm cancelling after this term. One star.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Dandy! Sorry to hear about your experience üò¢. These pop-ups are meant to highlight tools, but we understand your frustration. Could you please share more details on when and how often they appear? The more we know, the better we can improve your experience. Thanks! ^VK

scraped_reviews.content: For about the past week I can't open any documents, it takes me to a page to sign up for the paid version, I click on the cross and it takes me out of the document. Same thing happens when I try to reopen again. I do have the free version but it even says I should be able to read documents. Also been unable to save documents to Onedrive for about 1 year. Everytime I try to it says error saving document.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Erin! Sorry to hear that. Viewing PDFs is free in Acrobat. If you're seeing an upgrade prompt, feel free to skip it. Opening other format files is a premium feature. For the OneDrive issue, please share a screen recording of the workflow with our developer at [acrobat-android-support@adobe.com] so we can investigate better. Thanks! ^VK

scraped_reviews.content: If I want a basic PDF reader I'll just use a browser or a smaller app. The nail in the coffin for this app to me is the fact that basically everything beyond viewing is locked behind a paywall. Even things that once weren't, like rotating pages!? In a few years they will probably lock zooming in behind a paywall. And viewing more than two PDFs a month. If it's an Adobe app, they'll figure out how to monetize it. The app's usable but I'll deal with a little jank for a company that respects me.

The ads are random and I don't know where they come from. Only that when I open your app, they start appearing. And once I figure out how to delete them more ads show up. Most of the time, I end up having to turn my phone off. I have deleted the app and now use MS Word to create and edit .pdf files. Much better! ---------- This app is intent on advertising over and over without any way of exiting the app. So annoying! It's apps like this that make me want to stay off the internet...
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jon! Sorry, the pop-ups are bothering youüòî. They're meant to highlight added features that can help boost productivity, & are skippable, so you can continue your workflow. We have taken your feedback seriously and will strive to improve your experience. Please make sure you're using the latest version of the app. Thanks for being patient! ^VK

scraped_reviews.content: TERRIBLE! DON'T SUBSCRIBE! Signed up for the free trial, tried to cancel and didn't give me the option to, instead uses aggressive marketing and MAKE YOU sign up for the annual subscription. Then, when I tried to cancel, made me go through hoops just to cancel them and charges an early cancelation fee! I never wanted to sign up for the annual subscription in the first place! It is NOT user friendly! They want access to too many files- overly invasive. BEWARE!

I am pretty ticked off. I wanted to tell the 'edit' function and I was prompted to pay for it with a 7-day trial period. Supposedly if I signed up and canceled within the 7 days, I would not be charged. I signed up and it took money from my Google Rewards account immediately. I tried the edit functions for 10 minutes and realized it did not do what I wanted so I canceled immediately after that 10 minutes. Well, Adobe kept the money it collected & 6 days later, no credit back. Not a free trial!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! We understand your concern. To seek assistance, kindly reach out to our support team [adobe.ly/contactsupport]. They are equipped to provide you with detailed assistance through a two-way dialogue. Your understanding and patience are greatly valued. Thank you! ^SS

scraped_reviews.content: So inconvenient when it comes to unsubscribing. This should be immediately available in the app with with the "restore subscriptions" instead of it becoming detective work. It also misleads you to believe you'll find it in the Google play subs section (nope not for me). Subscribers be prepared to do ten times the work to unsubscribe. Oh don't forget you have to pay an early termination fee. unbelievable. I should get to remove the last star for having to pay for my cancellation. üëéüëéüëéüëéüëé

I just updated the app. We appreciate the advancements and updates. I'm getting used to it...BUT it's so difficult / almost impossible to paste anything in the "text" box when you first open the box. Starting a "note" is simple. It would be easier if the "text" would start like making a "note" then when you "post" the text box appears on the pdf then you can place it where you like and edit from that box. I like that you're able to move the view panel/box around, wish the ability to make it a little larger was there. The side panel view helps. Thank you.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Thanks for the feedback.
If you are using the external keyboard, enter will submit the changes made in the PDF. You can go to new line using SHIFT+ENTER key from external keyboard.
If you are using the device keyboard ENTER key will go to new line and user need to click on the post icon to make the changes in the PDF.
Thanks,
Adobe Team

scraped_reviews.content: The update looks nice, but drawings move when the screen rotates. That wasn't an issue in order versions. I use the freehand drawings to mark up PDFs when I can't highlight for one reason or another. it would also be nice to be able to use night mode in general, not just specific to single PDFs. another small thing that I wish I could be included would be the ability to freehand draw, but also advance the next page by swiping. Along with that, be able to zoom in and out, pan around a page, while free hand drawing. Overall very good app but just a few tweaks might make it more useful
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
We are sorry for the experience you had with Acrobat Reader.Could you please explain the steps in detail at acrobat-android-support@adobe.com so that we may help you better? Also, if possible , please share a video of an issue.
 Thanks, Adobe Acrobat Team

scraped_reviews.content: I tested the premium for 2 days. It just works so bad... Everything works in the cloud which makes a simple combine PDF to take 30 minutes and 2GB of data... Then the document gives you error when you try to open it. If it is not damaged takes between 7-8 min to open. You want to rotate the pages and there is no option to select all. You need to go one by one!!! In a 200 page document... Incredible they want to charge 10$/month for this. What a steal!!

The new search functions is awful and utterly useless. I need to search a long complicated document, on a regular basis. I need an overview of all occurrences of my search term, as it was in previous versions. Having to go through each individual hit, as it is now, is completely unacceptable and unusable. Switch it back or I will be forced to find a way to get sideload a bootleg of an older version . That search feature is more important to me than any so-called improvements you could ever make. Also, I will NOT log in to a stupid pdf viewer. Very offensive. Stop trying to track people or steal their data. Viewing PDF'S on my phone does not require any internet or cloud access.

Naggy piece of software. Just wanted to use the "name brand" PDF reader to do basic viewing, but Adobe has lost the plot with all the constant notifications and popups about "features". I shouldn't have to tell it a hundred times that no, I don't want to convert an image I just downloaded into a PDF, and no, telling Android to block the notifications doesn't count as a "setting" in your app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey! Thank you for sharing your concern. Since file access permission has been provided by you to Acrobat, we aim to enhance your experience by identifying potential document images and providing an easy way to convert them to PDFs. You can disable these notifications by turning off the ‚ÄòDownloads‚Äô channel in your app notification settings. ^VB

scraped_reviews.content: Super shady. I was sure I signed up month to month, but when I tried to cancel it, it wouldn't let me cancel without paying a $70 cancelation fee. When I signed up initially, I didn't read anything about a cancelation fee. I paid $20 on a month to month basis... this app also never stopped blowing me up with notifications. It wasn't a super intuitive program to use either. Start to finish was, unfortunately, a terrible experience.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you for contacting us. To better understand Adobe's subscription terms and refund policies, here is a useful link [adobe.ly/CancellationTerms]. Please provide details of your issue along with your Adobe ID at acrobat-android-support@adobe.com, so we can assist you more effectively. Thank you! ^VB

scraped_reviews.content: What in the world is going on with trying to edit a document all of a sudden!? The mobile app now constantly freezes and crashes. Both the desktop and mobile app; it was simple last week to click on the area I wanted to text, and voila. I go to fill in some dates on a document today (both on desktop and mobile app) and the text is so small, I can't even read it and it's blue. I can no longer move the text where I want it on the "line" and I can't even size it! Paid subscription and frustrated!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Just checking if you‚Äôve updated to the latest version of the app. Please let us know if the issue still persists. We‚Äôre here to assist you further! Thanks! ^SS

scraped_reviews.content: Has become worse and worse over years. All kinds of pop-ups and banners ("welcome page", "generative summary" etc.) come to clutter the page and make me loose time everytime I want to read a file. PDF is a free technology. It should be readable in a simple way, without an account, AI or ads. Any app that cannot offer that is not a good PDF app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Florent! Sorry to hear about your experience üò¢. These pop-ups are meant to highlight tools, but we understand your frustration. Could you please share more details on when and how often they appear? The more we know, the better we can improve your experience. Thanks! ^VK

scraped_reviews.content: The new update no longer allows you to send multiple files at the same time. It consistently freezes the app when you try to sign the form. You have to shut the computer multiple times to get it to sign properly. I would recommend trying it yourself. I am only getting 2 options when selecting the "three dots" (also known as option selection) I'm seeing remove from recent and delete. No option to share.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: You can still send multiple files using our app at the same time. Just select the files you want to share and tap on the 3 dots at top right of the screen. You will get an option to Share, select that, and then you can proceed to 'Share a Copy' button. For the sign issue, can you please share a video with us at acrobat-android-support@adobe.com?

scraped_reviews.content: Frustrating as hell. Can't paste, moving text is extremely unintuitive, can't paste, the keyboard keeps popping up, can't past, I want to throw my phone, can't paste. What the hell happened, the older version was, from what I remember, much much more useful and easy to use. Can't paste in this version. This is frustrating. Have to sign in? Uninstalling...

I love the Adobe app, but there are two major problems I have with it. The first is It doesn't have folder creations where you can create a folder and organize your files as you desire. The other problem is that when you upload a document and you want to share or upload it to a third-party app, it doesn't appear in the upload. You would have to save to your phone to locate it. These two issues warrant a 2 star deduction, but I decided to be generous.

For several months, this app had serious issues: documents would not fully load. The size was not large; 90kB, or less. Updating did not help, so I started using another PDF reader. I hoped Adobe would eventually fix their issues. Recently, I opened a file in Adobe, and the app immediately crashed. I reinstalled, and now I have the AI button. I emailed Adobe, and got a blank auto-reply. Apparently, the whole company is having issues. Use Foxit or Drive PDF instead.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We‚Äôre happy to share that the issue you reported has been fixed in the latest update. Please update to the newest version and let us know if it resolves the problem. If it‚Äôs fixed, we‚Äôd appreciate it if you could update your rating. Don‚Äôt hesitate to reach out if you encounter any more issues. We're here to help! Thanks! ^SS

scraped_reviews.content: Actually opened a PDF on my device for the first time in ages, as Acrobat Reader (apparently now with editing - why?). It assumes (incorrectly) that I'm viewing in portrait mode, it invites me to sign in (for no apparent reason, and refusal seemed not to impair my experience) and some sort of AI button appeared on top of the page (which just got in the way) that I presume was not third-party. All features *possibly* useful, for some, but I did not want them. Will try not to use again.

App is well designed and works, it is usable for all basic functions for free and doesn't cripple the app if you don't pay, the features that require payment are reasonable. Most of all, I like that when they implemented AI they let you opt out without any fuss. Not everyone needs or wants it and you can easily disable it in the settings, it's not forced.

Should have left fill and sign as a separate app. Ever since it was merged with an acrobat there's been a lot of glitches. With Phil and sign I could type in text up close and then pinch and zoom to zoom out and the text stayed there. Now the text shifts as if an image was moved in Microsoft word and jumbled everything up. Almost unusable because of this

This app would be great except for the AI Assistant box that covers the lower half of the page when opening a PDF in the Android app. And, don't tell me about this fix... IT DOES NOT WORK! "Generative Alfeatures are on by default in Acrobat Reader. Todisable them, close any open files, go to Preferences - Generative Al, uncheck Enable generative Alfeatures, and select OK." THERE APPEARS TO BE NO WAY TO GET RID OF IT. ADOBE NEEDS TO FIX THIS!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! The steps you mentioned above should let you disable the AI Assistant. If these steps are not working, please share a screen recording showing the same with our developers at acrobat-android-support@adobe.com. This will help us investigate further and assist you better. We appreciate your patience and understanding! ^SS

scraped_reviews.content: Unusable nightmare on android. Trying to select and copy text is difficult and I have to leave and come back to the document multiple times. The application also closes on itself when trying to scroll down the document list. Tempted to cancel membership Edit: Was told by Adobe to contact the company through methods where I won't be able to speak to an actual representative. I don't see how I can screen record my issue without breaching identity as I can't hide document names. Terrible advice
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! We appreciate you notifying us! Could you kindly send a screen recording of the workflow to our developers at acrobat-android-support@adobe.com? Additionally, you may contact our expert community at (https://adobe.ly/readermobilecommunity) for enhanced support. We are eager to look into this and assist in resolving the issues. Thank you! ^SS

scraped_reviews.content: The AI Assistant functionality can't be fully deactivated. Even when I disabled the Assistant and open a PDF from and email attachment, there is still a large pop-up at the bottom of the screen, asking whether I want to activate the feature and covering half the content of the document I'm trying to view. This doesn't happen when I open a PDF stored locally. Adobe, let users deactivate this stupid AI integration. All I want to do is view documents, and fill in and sign the odd form.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! To disable the Al Assistant: -Go to Preferences -Select the toggle next to Enable generative AI features in Acrobat The option Enable generative AI features in Acrobat is displayed only if you previously opted in for the generative AI features. Learn more here-[https://adobe.ly/readerandroidaiassistant]. Hope this helps. Thanks! ^VB

scraped_reviews.content: Extraordinary tool, so helpful! I've just started to use this tool in order to summarised my own CV. With its AI, not only does it accurately but also is able to read a Spanish doc and summarise it in English language. I find it can improve by letting you choose the outcome language. Also, the 'read aloud' function didn't work for this doc, although it didn't tell you why. All in all, an excellent app!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! We‚Äôre grateful for your 4-star rating! What can we do to improve and make it a 5-star experience? Your feedback means a lot to us. ^RS

scraped_reviews.content: Been billed multiple times by Adobe for services that I didn't sign up for. I was looking to add comments to a locked PDF so up for a free trial of the full suite. I was still unable to edit the document so I used another app (Readle Documents) and cancelled my free trial with Adobe. In the last week, I've been billed three times by PayPal: $39.99 $12.99 and $47.99 for I don't know what. How can I cancel a subscription that doesn't exist? This is worse than trying to cancel Reader's Digest!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! Sorry to hear this happened üòî. We understand how frustrating it can be. For refund help, please reach out to our support team here: [adobe.ly/contactsupport]. They‚Äôll guide you step by step. In the meantime, here‚Äôs a handy link to learn about subscriptions & refund policy: [adobe.ly/CancellationTerms]. Thanks! ^VK

scraped_reviews.content: I will ALWAYS choose the free version over the paid version, because I can't stand your subscription tactics. I cannot fall for the trap again. I'm glad that Liquid Mode is available for free, and for that, you have my thanks. Bravo on Photoshop's themed icons! Let Acrobat be the next one to get its themed icon. Also, for banners, that could definitely use some work. I want to see Markdown to PDF support!!

The "Can't Save File" is really inconvenient. Wdym you can't save file just when I've closed the file after I finished highlighting everything? That's just very inconvenient and there's not even a single way to at least revert back the changes. It literally just vanishes because of some random bs error.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! Sorry to hear about your experienceüòî. We understand how frustrating this can be. Could you please share more details, like how often you‚Äôve experienced this issue and, if possible, a screen recording along with your Adobe ID, with our developers at [acrobat-android-support@adobe.com]? To help us investigate better & fix it faster. ^VK

scraped_reviews.content: Adobe Acrobat used to be so much better and easier to use with less frustrating and upsetting intrusions into your life. Adobe acrobat used to be free with every computer or phone that you bought without hounding You to purchase the full version for $500. Adobe Acrobat is now just another never-ending sales pitch eroding any good will they once had with their customers.

I had subscribed to Adobe Acrobat only for the 14-day free trial. When I started the trial, it showed auto-pay of ‚Çπ1450, and I thought the amount would be deducted after the trial ended, but it was charged immediately. I tried many times to cancel the subscription, but no option was available. I even contacted the support team multiple times asking to cancel and refund, but got no proper help. I am really disappointed w
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! Sorry to hear that üò¢. If you‚Äôve already requested a refund through customer service, please wait 5‚Äì7 days, as refunds take time to be credited to your account. If not, please write directly to [acrobat-android-support@adobe.com] with your Adobe ID, along with your reason for cancellation. Hope it helps! üôÇ ^VK

scraped_reviews.content: It is so terrible. Half the time you cannot open it because it shows ads for premium and not yohr file. And when you get it to open a file half of the screen is filled with an ad for a useless AI assistant that is actually just another ad. Useless.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! Sorry to hear thatüò¢. Acrobat highlights tools to help new users discover features that can make working with PDFs easier & more productive. We understand that too many prompts can feel distracting. We‚Äôve noted your concern & will strive to improve this experience in future updates. Thanks for your patience and understanding. üôÇ ^VK

scraped_reviews.content: I couldn't get it to work, everything I imported was marked as a corrupted file. And when I dowloaded pdf files, acrobat wasnt available as an option for reading them. Tried again after a long time. Repeated message, "There was an error starting Edit" Useless as always. I won't try again. I'll use Xodo.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Thanks for bringing this to our attention. Can you please share a test file and screen recording of the workflow with our developers at acrobat-android-support@adobe.com? You can also contact our community of experts (https://adobe.ly/readermobilecommunity) for assistance. We will love to investigate this and help resolve the issues. Thanks!^SS

scraped_reviews.content: can no longer take a continuous/larger screenshot bc now as soon as a screenshot is taken a prompt pops up asking to share. no workaround has been given by adobe, its supposedly being looked into. super frustrating! it doesnt help do more like the response from the app rep says, it prevents us from doing what we want. mine is not the only review with the concern. search online and plenty of people are annoyed. no one asked for the "improvement".
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Michelle! Sorry to hear that üò¢. In Acrobat, the prompt that appears after taking a screenshot is meant to help you do more with it, like sharing more easily. We‚Äôve noted your concern and will strive to improve this in future updates. Thanks! ^VK

scraped_reviews.content: I started the 7 day free trial yesterday and the money has been taken out of my account. I would like a refund as I only wanted the trial; not an account in minus, all because of a stupid app that was ment to give me 7 days before taking that money. How disrespectful and greedy to customers/ potential customers do you want to be ? Please give me my Money back!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Cass! Sorry to hear thatüò¢. The free trial is only available with an annual subscription, not a monthly plan. If you began a free trial your payment method would be charged at the end unless you cancelled in time or have used the same account for a trial in the past. For more help, reach out to our support team here [adobe.ly/contactsupport] ^VK

scraped_reviews.content: acrobat not working on chromebook after using reader on my chromebook for over a year all of sudden it won't work gets loosening page with logo on then just stays on that top bar keeps going from black to grey but wonton to normal. page need this for my work. can you look into this for me I've uninstalled it cleared cache everything that's been said I've done but still nothing up tillyhen been great app to use
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Andy! Sorry to hear you‚Äôre not having a great experience with the appüòî. Could you please share a screen recording of the workflow, when experiencing this issue, along with your device details, with our developers at: [acrobat-android-support@adobe.com]? This will help us investigate the issue better and work on resolving it faster. Thanks! ^VK

scraped_reviews.content: It is easily accessible and great for use beit for school, business, and signing new hire forms, etc. . I highly recommend Adobe Acrobat for any line of profession. You have everything you need right. You can compile it with any other app! as well to keep from spending long extended hours on something so simple.

adobe would be better if they allowed you to access all of the features for free but just limited the number of times per month you could use each feature. it would demonstrate how useful all of the pro features are to people who don't want to spend the money and it would allow us poor folks to use them when we really need them. #freethefeatures

I am very disappointed with the Adobe Acrobat Reader app. It has become one of the worst apps for viewing PDF, PPT, or even Word files. Whenever I try to open a file, it doesn‚Äôt show properly and keeps asking me to buy the premium version. I just want to view my PDF files, but the app makes it very difficult without paying. Please fix this issue or make the basic viewing features free and easier to use.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Nihal! We understand your concern üò¢. Viewing PDFs is free and doesn't require an upgrade. If you're seeing an upgrade prompt, you may be trying to open a non-PDF file that needs conversion to PDF. You can open non-PDF files with a free trial. Check this out for more tips and tricksüí°: [adobe.ly/readerfaq]. Thanks!üôÇ ^VK

scraped_reviews.content: Such a big step backwards after using the Adobe Fill and Sign app from Adobe. Just so much more painful to get a simple .PDF signed. Making the boxes sized to fit and positioned is driving me back to printing to paper and just writing and going to not even trying to get esign.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey! That shouldn't be happening! Can you please share a screen recording of the workflow with our developers at acrobat-android-support@adobe.com? You can also contact our community of experts: (https://adobe.ly/readermobilecommunity) for assistance. We will love to investigate this and help resolve the issues. Thanks! ^SS

scraped_reviews.content: Good app though it's very IN YOUR FACE about pushing an expensive subscription. Also, when the trial voice expires, you get NO ability to choose another free voice, but are stuck with a horrible robotic voice that ADOBE select purposefully so you are driven mad... this kind of behaviour gets them one star.

For the past year, every time I try to open the app, it will go to the loading page for very long and the page cannot load and I cannot open the app. If I try to open a document, it will auto open another tab which loads long and cannot open and I got to close it and choose to go to the original tab. I am using my company account which is a paying account. So this is a really bad experience.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Eunice! Sorry to hear you‚Äôre not having a great experience with the appüòî. Could you please share a screen recording of the workflow when experiencing this issue, along with your Adobe ID, with our developers at: [acrobat-android-support@adobe.com]? This will help us investigate the issue better and work on resolving it faster. Thanks! ^VK

scraped_reviews.content: I paid for this solely to be able to encrypt pdf files. Junk. The app is cluttered and over complicated. The file list in the app for files on the device is a mess and I haven't found any way to sort it from the random order from every directory. It continually pops up feature reminders and tips you can't turn off in preferences. Getting rid of the paid version as soon as I'm finished needing encrypted documents.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Brian! Sorry, you‚Äôre not having a great experience üòî. We‚Äôve noted your concern about sorting and pop-up reminders, and we‚Äôll work to improve them in future updates. Please update your app to the latest version, as we‚Äôre always working to improve it. Thanks for your patience and understanding. ^VK

scraped_reviews.content: the worst possible app ever. used it when it was popup free. now it looks like all you're getting is popups and ads. absolutely abject development!!! UPDATE: YEAH! well, I just wanna see my damn PDF file. NO ads, NO suggestions NO plans and packages, NOTHING ELSE! just narrow borders and my document ready to copy text from. that's IT! can I pay 5 bucks a month to get THAT? WELL LET ME GUESS: NO! GOD!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Chip! Sorry to hear that üò¢. Acrobat highlights tools to help new users discover features that can make working with PDFs easier & more productive. We understand that too many prompts can feel distracting. We‚Äôve noted your concern & will strive to improve this experience in future updates. Thanks for your patience and understanding. üôÇ ^VK

scraped_reviews.content: You need to fix this bug , is because when I filled up my answers in the question, when I need a short break then I leave the app it say ( saved ) , after few days the answer it still in the question below , but after of my ( Two day ) hardworking, when I was ready to bring to tomorrow when class come but ( every of my Answers from the question is gone ! is gone ! , it just wasted my two day hard working for searching those answers and filling up these answer ! you should fix this deep problem.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! Sorry to hear about your experienceüòî. We understand how frustrating this can be. Could you please share more details, like how often you‚Äôve experienced this issue and, if possible, a screen recording along with your Adobe ID, with our developers at [acrobat-android-support@adobe.com]? To help us investigate better & fix it faster. ^VK

scraped_reviews.content: ‚ö†Ô∏è Scam Alert Even if you cancel your Adobe subscription through Google Play, they still charge your card. I tried the 7-day free trial, canceled before it ended, and yet my credit card was billed. I even deleted my account, but the charges kept coming. On top of that, there‚Äôs no proper way to reach customer support, it‚Äôs a complete mess. Terrible experience.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Vivek! Sorry to hear thatüòî. The free trial is only available with an annual subscription, not a monthly plan. If you began a free trial, your payment method would be charged at the end unless you canceled in time or have used the same account for a trial in the past. For more help, reach out to our support team: [adobe.ly/contactsupport]. ^VK

scraped_reviews.content: The Liquid Mode, since the last updates, is no longer working as usual. Some PDF that originated from a Word document, and is made of straightforward simple layout paragraphs, no columns, just one image at the top, no longer support liquid mode, but previously was no issue. It was working properly before the lasted updates.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Michel! Sorry to hear the Liquid mode isn‚Äôt working as expectedüòî. Since it was working fine before, we‚Äôd like our team to take a closer look. Could you please share a screen recording of the issue along with your device details at [acrobat-android-support@adobe.com]? This will help us investigate and work on resolving it faster. Thanks! ^VK

scraped_reviews.content: Surprisingly poor. Annotating and printing is very poorly done. It's fiddly and the fields have a tendency to disappear. There's no longer an option to flatten the document, so I attempted to print the PDF. When I did so, the previously entered fields were misaligned. I repositioned the fields with another app from a small company and they remained in position when I printed. In general, the app has a clunky feel.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Luke! Sorry to hear this isn‚Äôt working right üòî. We understand how frustrating it can be when it affects your work. Could you please share a screen recording showing the edited, misaligned, or missing text while printing, with our developers at [acrobat-android-support@adobe.com]? This will help us investigate and resolve it faster. Thanks! ^VK

title: eBay online shopping & selling
description:
With the eBay mobile app, buy and sell millions of items on the go. Discover
exclusive deals every day in our online marketplace.

Never miss a deal
Online shopping and selling in the eBay app is simple. Get real-time alerts about
Daily Deals, auctions, order updates, and so much more‚Äîall sent to your device with
personalized push notifications. Give pre-loved items a new home. Whether you‚Äôre
looking to sell clothing, tech, or car parts, our app is always at your fingertips.

Quickly list items with AI
Snap or upload a photo in the eBay app and let AI instantly generate descriptions and
key details for your listing‚Äîincluding brand, category, and more.

Search, find, and save faves
‚óè Discover on-trend items: Buy fashion, handbags, jewelry, watches, and more.
‚óè Shop by condition: Filter for new, pre-loved, used, or eBay Refurbished items.
‚óè Shop by category: Browse fashion, jewelry, sneakers, tech, auto parts, and
more.
‚óè Sell and cash in: List used car parts, tech, clothing, and more. Create your own
store to pass on your treasures.
‚óè Heart your faves: Never miss the latest drops and deals when you save your
most-loved finds.
‚óè Search with pics: See something you like? Upload a photo and find matches
instantly to buy it now.
‚óè Top items for less: From car accessories to clothing, find high quality at the
right price.
Shop the sustainable way
Discover the excitement of buying vintage and pre-loved items. With eBay, you can
extend the life cycle of items, all while helping the planet. What‚Äôs not to love?

Find new, pre-loved, and vintage fashion
We‚Äôre on a mission to change the way people shop and sell fashion. With the eBay
marketplace, you can find all your fave items in one place.

Collect the easy way with PSA Vault
Simply add PSA grading to eligible raw trading cards. With PSA Vault you can
manage your entire portfolio and save money thanks to no sales tax and no storage or
selling fees (withdrawal fee applies). Plus, you can find, price, and list gems at
lightning speed.

Get cars, auto parts, and accessories
From new and used cars that fit your lifestyle to the parts and tools to revamp your
vehicle, we‚Äôve got you. Enter your car details in My Garage to find the right parts
every time.

Score eBay Live exclusives
Your real-time shopping experience is here! Join the livestream for exclusive drops,
live auctions, and case breaks. Connect with your community, fave sellers, and
creators for more of the things you love.

Authenticity Guarantee
Shop with confidence. The Authenticity Guarantee checkmark means eligible
trading cards, sneakers, watches, and handbags will be inspected and verified by
expert authenticators.

eBay Money Back Guarantee
Enjoy total peace of mind thanks to the eBay Money Back Guarantee. With us,
you‚Äôre covered. Get the item you ordered or your money back‚Äîit‚Äôs that simple.*
*For full eligibility criteria and all terms and conditions visit:
https://pages.ebay.com/ebay-money-back-guarantee/

Explore quick and easy payment options
We make it easy to pay for the things you want in an instant. Simply store your
preferred payments safely and securely so you can check out in a flash!

Keep in touch
Your feedback is important to us. Contact us with any questions by joining the
discussion at www.ebay.com/android

summary: Life‚Äôs easier in the eBay app‚Äîbuy and sell millions of items on the go.

scraped_reviews.content: eBay is one of the worst platforms for sellers. Buyers apparently have all the power. You can prove they're lying via messages, and then they can lower your rating without even receiving a product. Why are buyers allowed to rate a product when it's been canceled for legitimate reasons. They will not back you as a seller. It's great if you're a buyer, but it's terrible if you're a seller. You have no protection, just the illusion of it. Be warned. I'm going to move over to PayPal and Mercari.

I can change notification settings now. I disabled notifications for ebay lives and I still get them! also I reported an item for manipulating search results, listing with the wrong item condition (i.e listed as "pre-owned" but the title and desc. say "for Parts&Repair") got an email saying the AI didn't find anything despite that the item name in the same email said "PARTS ONLY". yes, it's in all caps in the item name. How did this go over the AI's head?! Stop giving me tiny shipping labels!!

The app is actually very easy to use. But I would caution on selling as the fees are outrageous. They take about 12-15% of the item, taxes and shipping cost. Which brings the fee to 18-20% of the original item. An item for $400 and ships for $75 will pay a fee of $76. This all seems outrageous when it costs them the same to list a book as it does to list an appliance. Other platforms with payments are cheaper, around 12% of item In this way eBay is inflating prices of used goods....

Great to buy on, horrible to sell on. I sold an item on here which was refunded to the buyer, but I never got my item back. Ebay said I owed them money for the refund, on top of me never getting my item back! It wasn't something cheap either. 6 months of constant phone calls later... Still stuck. And they're trying to get the debt collector on me. I have been as transparent as possible and made so many efforts to move this case. If you get scammed as a seller on ebay, they do NOT have your back.

Terrible seller UX. Can't select multiple shipping options, sometimes the description gets lost, and no for the last time I don't want to promote my item just list the damn thing and stop begging for more money. And stop with the AI description garbage. I don't want to use it, buyers either don't care or are actively turned off, and it's just useless fluff. Seriously, it'll be a cold day in hell when I voluntarily give up 10% more of the sale price on top of the ridiculous fees.

I've been using ebay since 1999, buying and selling. I've gone through so many iterations of the site, mostly improvements. The app is great - the search tool works the same as the website, it's easy to make a purchase or post an item, keep track of your purchases or inventory. I just wish there was a way to block mega sellers when you're looking for a true vintage or authentic item. Otherwise fast accurate, easy to use.

Update 05/03/25: As a part-time seller, using the app primarily, I have to bring this down from 5 to 3. The new "updated" seller interface was completely unnessesary, & just plain bad. It turned a one-page interface into 4-5 seperate pages. Months later, after major bug fixes the formatting is still terrible, causing the buyer to scroll left & right to read each section/paragraph as one long line. I wish we could simply opt back to the former seller interface! You fixed what wasn't broken. üò¢

Hey so kind of a big problem here. The app is poorly designed on the profile page. It doesn't make it obvious where important information like addresses and payments methods are when initially going to the profile tab. Also, when I updated my card info and shipping address before buying something, why didn't it auto switch to my new address?? Now I have a package going to my old address. I'm pretty sure I checked everything before buying too, but would be nice to confirm during processing!

not even exaggerating. its easy and awesome. (NOTE: if you're ever planning to buy from another store/site, ALWAYS check n see if eBay has it cheaper first. just copy n paste the title of the item or something lol) UPDATE (4/20/25): Recently, the notification feature that lets me know when an item I'm selling has been sold has not been working. I've made two different sales in the last couple of weeks, and I never got a notification or an email. I worry that I will miss a customer's order.)

Worst app I have used so far. As a buyer and seller the app is really unreliable. The fees charged to you when you sell make it hard to make any profit,if someone wants to return and item the seller must pay for money they didn't receive since eBay kept it. As a buyer I have come across multiple scammers and if you leave a bad or neutral review they can request it to be removed. Really twisted app to navigate. I'm closing my shop and not buying through eBay anymore.

Fees are ridiculous. I understand a listing fee, but it seems I get nickel and dimed to death with each sale for so much extra stuff. Also just because I look at an item ONCE doesn't mean that I want to be harassed for the next entire month with offers and notifications in my inbox of price changes for those items that I'm NOT even "watching". Especially AFTER I have turned off all email and notification settings. It's annoying and completely ruins the whole experience.

It would be very helpful if book and media listings showed the item‚Äôs condition (Used ‚Äì Like New, Very Good, Good, or Acceptable) directly on the search results page. Right now, you have to click into each listing to see the condition. Adding that label next to the price or title would save a lot of time, help buyers compare listings faster, and make shopping for books and DVDs much smoother overall.

I used to enjoy buying and selling on ebay, but its turned into a total mess. there are so many surprise fees that are impossible to see in advance and even more difficult to figure out even after the fact. information that helps you math the math is not disclosed before listing an item and its even more difficult to try and understand why and where the money is going after its been taken. ebay has become greedy and the user experience suffers. what was 30% fees and good is now 50% and bad! bye

App is a buggy mess. "Simple delivery is anything but" simple. As a seller you can't alter postage prices to cover your packing costs, so you have to recycle whenever possible. If you receive an offer from a seller, you can't accept it from the app, AT ALL! Only on PC. If you list an item, DO NOT upload a video. Doing so instantly makes the app crash EVERY. SINGLE. TIME. When you try to open the app again, it throws a temper tantrum, that YOU DARED UPLOAD A VIDEO in the first place. Madness!

Overall a great app, just make sure you read details about the item in question, and do your research on sellers. Update: I wouldn't recommend this app or site to save my life. I've lost more money from scam sellers than I care to admit, and customer support is an absolute joke. Id rather put more money in Jeff Bezos pocket and stick with Amazon.

I'm tired of receiving offers on things I've already bought. I've removed all my items for sale on eBay and I'm using other markets due to the fact eBay has complicated receiving your funds. they've made a riddle out of simplicity. they claim life is easier in the eBay app. I don't think so. that hasn't been my experience. the eBay app used to be much easier. this is eBay's third strike.

I mostly think this app is great, but lately I've had issues with a saved search. I have the saved search set to "new results only," but I am getting a notification EVERY DAY titled "Saved search new items listed," but there are NO NEW search items, OR it will still show all 400+ existing results in addition to any new. It shouldn't be sending me a notification at all if there are no NEW search items. I also find the "new results only" button being shut off, and I have to keep turning it on.

I enjoy using the app to a certain degree. The one complaint I have is the now push for eBay live on my home page. I don't care about seeing these people shilling their second hand and/or cheaply made products while using AI images as their thumbnails. At the very least, give people the option to customize their home page and being able to remove it. The selling aspect is fairly decent. The in app camera still needs some work. Overall, it's ok but this app still needs work.

I used to love ebay, and I still find great things through them. However, I feel like the search and filter features have been acting up. If I filter for size, it works fine. but if I filter by color, brand, etc. it doesn't work. Ex: I was looking for a particular brand of shoes. Searched the brand name and shoe size, selected the sizes I wanted, and the colors. The search results showed me every brand under the sun, and in colors that I hadn't selected. Would be 5 * if search worked

The app has become a huge hassle to browse. Sellers being able to send offers notifying people who have simply looked at a listing is an incredibly annoying way of being harassed by a platform. If someone does not add a listing to their watch list, they should not be contacted at all by a seller regarding a price drop or discount. At a minimum this should be a setting to disable; at worst, the process should be a one click decline from the notification shade. It makes me not want to shop.

Ebay is a terrible place to try to sell products. Even when you list all your items at a 15% ad rate, things just won't sell. Within the last 30 days, I've had over 830 total views, found in search results over 322,000 times- but only "one" sale. Really ebay?? What a waste of valuable time and effort. At least there are other platforms to sell your products on, and I encourage others to do likewise.

Not receiving email notifications anymore from ebay, so I'm forced to open the app just to know what's going on with sales. Before some eBay shill says otherwise, it's happening to other people too. Look it up. It is absolutely not my email provider, because I receive all other emails from other venues with no problems whatsoever. Maybe they changed it this way to force you to use their app. eBay has been slowly dying for years, so maybe they're making the change to increase visits.

I can no longer buy items, after using ebay for 8 years I have recently discovered an ebay bug, in which 90% of ebay listings say not available in my location even though they should be. I have had this problem for over 2 months now. I have been in touch with customer service agents at least 5 times each time assuring me that it will get fixed. I've had to give up and stop using ebay. the problem is not specific to the app. it persists on ebay on my laptop or other devices as well.

$5 discount nowhere to be found after clicking and installing the app. Other errors: "ebay:" links fail; Can't find coupon or voucher they said would be in my account; No way to find which products are "eligible" for the offer. I've seen this kind of trick before on eBay, and wasted significant time thinking something's wrong with MY inability to find what they offered. Uninstalling the app. (And "TELL US MORE (OPTIONAL)" in this review form doesn't let me type anything... they just don't care!)

What happened to sorting for lowest price + shipping? All I see anymore are prices too good to be true with insanely inflated shipping, like $50+ for a small item. Edit to add: I cannot turn off any notifications from within the app. I get a "Something went wrong" message when accessing the page in app settings. All I want to do is disable the annoying "Random seller is live" notifications. I still want watched item ones so I don't want to disable notifications at the system level.

Saved sellers within the search feature no longer are clickable in the mobile app. You have to go through some roundabout way to get to it. With the stock of eBay plummeting, you would think they would care more about their platform. Quit adding irrelevant features and just make it work correctly. eBay is turning for the worse and I let customer service know exactly how I felt the other day. I know they don't care, but someday they will when they wake up and there is no eBay customer service

I just sold an item for the first time in years on Ebay. Word of advice DON'T USE THE APP TO MAKE ANY OF YOUR LISTINGS! I just sold two books as a bundle for $200. There were over $90 in fees!!!! $20tax, $37 Transaction fee, $18 Shipping label, $43 Ad Feeü§¨ü§¨ü§¨. There used to be a way to adjust promoted listings through the app. Now you can't. And there is no way to tell at what rate it's being promoted. It doesn't show. Very deceptive business practice. We need transparency across this app ü§¨

If your thinking of selling items on ebay, please reconsider. there is absolutely NO ONE to assist you if they send your payout to the wrong place, or if something goes wrong. you will be out your item, fees, taxes, shipping and whatever you got paid for your item, not to mention time! After days of trying to reach someone, I still have yet to talk to someone and even their automated system cant help. Once they get their fees, and taxes, they are done. they dont care if you dont get paid.

App has become useless because of a problem with the new automatic payment feature. When an item is listed with "automatic payment", the bid fails. EBay was great 25 years ago. Over the years there have been countless changes to the eBay system. Every single change has worsened the eBay experience. Incredibly, eBay is now rejecting bids from their best customers!

A problem so bad, it's on the FAQ. "Having trouble adding pictures?" I'm using the fully updated version, but it basically says 'oh well, use the classic site,' which is just ANNOYING because when I go to their "classic site," it takes me back to the app and I'm not switching my settings for this stupid, annoying issue.    Ebay is not people friendly. Forget ebay..too many little annoying things, now this..AGAIN. 3rd item I've had to return this year, too. Amazon is definitely better. #PrimeMember

The search function is frustrating. It no longer matters how specific your search query is. Most of the results are unrelated to what you actually searched for. Customer service is impossible to obtain. I get push notifications for items in which I'm no interested, because I glanced at them for 5 seconds. Seller fees have reached the point of being so ridiculously high that people are now referring to it as FeeBay. eBay is no longer my go to for buying. It's my last resort for selling.

I know its a stripped down version of the site but there are some useful features missing. You cant find what country a buyer is from, it defaults to 30 days for listing duration when you relist. The app sends a notification about everything....everything. Luckily you can uncheck a lot of them. AI integration is bad and buggy. Too many in app notifications for stuff I don't want. update: the promoted feature is sneaky. they try to tack on another 10% seller fee charge and its hard to adjust it

EDIT, previous review was five stars, now I am incredibly disappointed by new developments: eBay is my go to online shopping service. I like that I get a digital thrift store, except I get to support the people selling their stuff directly. However, you don't give me the option to disable/opt out of AI, and I find it not only disquieting but absolutely repugnant. I am uninterested, and I do not appreciate it being forced on me. Give me an option to turn it off.

As a seller, this service is absolutely awful and should be avoided if at all possible. The amount you pay in fees (usually rounding out to at least 20% of the item) after everything is insane and they're notoriously preferential to buyers. So little to no protection with about a quarter of your funds taken by eBay for every single item you sell; definitely would not recommend!

This company keeps getting worse by the hour, the let sellers get away with all sorts of tricks and cheating the buyer, but ebay always replys, "if it doesn't go against their "standards" or "rules" or what ever other bs phrases they can come up with, then the buyer is just SOL!!!! Don't get me wrong, I've had some great experiences with sellers, but 75-90% are going to cheat you, they go on Amazon and buy something way cheaper and then raise the price, so if your buying new, check Amazon first!

I might never buy anything on this site again after my experience today & the fact there is zero customer service makes it nearly impossible to fix. I had a major problem fixing an order, so I had to cancel it. in trying to reorder it, to get the right shipping address, the app keeps trying to verify my identity thru an old phone number I no longer have. I've updated the addresses stored, which includes my phone number but it's still doing this bs. worst experience ever.

Garbage! You can no longer go above Ebay's recommended price, when selling an item under their "Buy it now" option. I was attempting to sell something that Ebay was showing was recommended at $28, which is not even close, but wouldn't let me go above that. It's bad enough they hammer us with increasing fees, but now want to regulate how much we can sell something for. DO NOT USE!!

I had a seller ship me a fake Pok√©mon card with a positive seller rating, so I thought nothing of it. After contacting eBay Customer Service two separate times which I believe were addressed by AI bots [you can tell by the communication] and the seller refusing to refund my money and forcing me to pay for shipping on a return I'm not getting the full value for. I am incredibly disappointed with ebay and their handling of this situation, especially with their "money back guarantee." Scammers.

As a seller, I am very unsatisfied with the way eBay handles their seller platform. I am able to perform basic seller actions, but creating shipping policies, combining shipping, basically setting policies for anything required the use of a computer. Accessing the website on mobile is atrocious, and it automatically kicks back to the app at some point, anyway. Why make an app and leave out key features of the platform?

From a seller‚Äôs perspective, the buyer-paid shipping should mean exactly that‚Äîthe buyer covers the real cost, end of story. Instead, eBay‚Äôs system can basically force the seller to subsidize shipping if the label costs more than what the buyer paid. It‚Äôs like telling you, ‚ÄúHey, you sell this for $100, buyer pays $16 shipping‚Ä¶ oh wait, now pay $200‚Äîgood luck!‚Äù It‚Äôs basically a bait-and-switch on shipping.

App makes it harder to search, especially in motors. and everything else. not all car makes are in the listing that are pre-selected. the filters don't work. the new functionality does not work as well as the old. I simply want all the categories of cars had a way to search a range of years and models. I dropped down at work for the selection. a usability engineer needs to review how this functionality works on the app.

WHAT'S up with your app?!?? Second time I've reported. Now when listing new items, eBay is placing its own prices on items and will not allow us to change them! Cannot "Revise" some of my listings already done! It will let me change other details of listings, either. I have many listings on eBay, it will let me update prices of SOME of my listings. But, it will NOT let me edit prices on others. I have cleared the app cache, stopped and restarted the app, restarted my phone and STILL no good.

This is normally a fine enough app, most things function as they should. Except, you cannot customize notifications and you will constantly get notifications for live auctions that you will never participate in. There is an option, which is conveniently always greyed out, and a "something went wrong" message appears. Even after updating my app, this function still does not work. Searching online reveals that this has been an issue for years, which tells me it's not a bug, it's intentional.

I've been using eBay for over 25 years and used to love it. No more. Ebay has become nothing but a place for sellers to rip off buyers any way they can. I have problems with my transactions at least 50-60% of the time due to terrible sellers. I'm done. It's more of a hassle and a bummer than anything else now. Also the app is slow.

Great app, wonderful platform I use this to get virtually everything I need, usually cheaper than Amazon, and without the damage to the environment or the economy. Most of the stuff I purchase is coming from someone's garage, though occasionally I get brand new stuff that may be stored at a warehouse. You can even make offers and haggle, like in the good ol days

7 of 7 times has customer service not resolved platform automation logic fail points. The automation scripts is simple and doesn't look at enough data points to make sure transactions go smoothly. As both buyer and seller, the first few times reaching out to customer service because the platform fails logic, was frustrating. On the 7th call I'm not even frustrated because my expectations for eBay has bottomed out.

notifications not coming straight through when items sell, can be up to 12 hours sometimes. not good when you have despatch time set to 24hrs. Also keep getting stuck in a loop when trying to withdraw funds. "enter password" "now enter code texted to you" a few seconds of loading then "enter password" "now enter the code texted to you" etc etc. 5 times. in fact the only solution in the end was to use desktop pc

I purchased an item on eBay, and the seller first told me it had already shipped. Shortly after, they canceled my order with a fake excuse about a ‚Äúshipping address issue.‚Äù I‚Äôve never had problems with my address on any other orders. The seller then relisted the exact same item at a much higher price. To make it worse, eBay doesn‚Äôt even allow me to leave negative feedback in this situation.

been a seller on ebay i think 7 years now, great way to make a living and never miss a moment. The app has come a LONG way, and we like some of the features on it more than the desktop site... 5 stars all the way around for the platform they offer us, the app, website, customer service, everything!

Two things are not good in this app, which are necessary: 1- The package weight and dimensions must be written. 2- When writing a message to a seller, the keyboard gets about the writing area, and i'm not able to read through while typing, to correct any mistakes. and if i try to point to a place to correct it, it is like by a chance to get it right cuz i'm blindly selecting the place. it must move up when writing to be able to see what I am typing.

title: Citymapper
description: Instantly compare your travel options in real-time across all transport modes! Easily navigate your city with turn-by-turn directions for all your public transportation, walking, cycling and scooter trips. Find the best route ‚ñ∫ Simple city navigation and trip planning combining bus üöé subway üöá train üöÑ ferry ‚õ¥ cabs üöï ride share üöñ car share üöó bike share üö≤ e-scooters üõ¥ and walking üö∂‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èDiscover routes you never knew existed üïµÔ∏è‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è! Hit the GO button for step-by-step directions ‚ñ∫ Turn-by-turn navigation for your transit, walking, cycling and scooter trips. Choose between 3 different map views, see the charge levels of e-scooters and e-bikes around you, and avoid no-parking zones. We take care of the logistical thinking with our smart route planner so you are free to enjoy the ride üôå Experience one-stop-shop mobility ‚ñ∫ Compare cab fares, hail a ride, hop on a shared bike or get on the nearest scooter. Our partners include: Uber, Lyft, JUMP, Lime, Bird, Spin, Skip, Scoot, Citi Bike, JerseryBike, Bluebikes, Indego, CaBi, Divvy, Metro Bike, Breeze, Bay Wheels, Healthy Ride, Relay, BCycle, SA Bike Share, GREENbike, Grid, RTC Bike, BIKETOWN, Biki üöñ üö≤ üõ¥ Beat the rush-hour crowd ‚ñ∫ Live wait times and ETA so you'll never miss a bus, train or ferry again. Follow your public transportation as it‚Äôs approaching on a real-time map with our train & bus tracker. See the best train car to board, check the next train or bus stop, get alerted when it's time to get off, and get in and out from the best exit at any subway / train station ‚è∞ Smarten up your daily transit navigation ‚ñ∫ Get daily updates right on your lock screen for all public transportation: real-time bus arrivals, subway, ferry and train times, with disruption / delay / status alerts and alternative routes. Stay on top of any changes to your local bus schedule, train schedule or ferry timetable with the all-in-one transit tracker üö® Personalize your city navigation ‚ñ∫ Save Home, Work and your go-to stops / stations for fast trip planning. Subscribe to your favorite subway, train, bus or ferry line for automatic disruption / delay / status alerts. Your local subway map, next bus time, subway time and train schedule at your fingertips ‚ù§Ô∏è Get social ‚ñ∫ Share your live trip: let friends follow your live trip to know when you'll arrive. Share any location or address: one tap for others to get directions ü§≥ Travel offline ‚ñ∫ Access offline the official NYC subway map, Manhattan bus transit map, Brooklyn bus map, MTA map, Queens bus map, DC metro map, Muni metro map, and more üó∫ Works on Wear OS ‚ñ∫ Hit GO in the app and automatically see all the information you need during your trip on your Wear OS watch. Cities ‚ñ∫ New York City | Chicago | Los Angeles | San Francisco | Washington DC | Boston | Philadelphia | Seattle | Miami | Atlanta | Portland | Denver | Baltimore | San Diego | Minneapolis | Houston | Phoenix | Dallas | Las Vegas | Pittsburgh | Honolulu | Salt Lake City | San Antonio | St. Louis | Cleveland | Austin + Many more worldwide! See the full list and vote for the next one in the app or at https://citymapper.com/cities üèô Agencies ‚ñ∫ We use open data from transit agencies, including: MTA | CTA | LA Metro | MBTA | WMATA | SEPTA | NJ Transit | Muni | BART | King Bus | MARTA | LIRR | RTD | TriMet | Metro-North Railroad | PATH | Houston METRO | San Diego MTS | Miami-Dade Transit | Metro Transit MN | METRA | RTC | TheBus | Port Authority | DART | AC Transit | Sound Transit | UTA | OCTA | VIA | PTD | St. Louis Metro Transit | RTA | Capital Metro | Broward County Transit Division | NY Waterway Ferries | LBT üìà Keep in touch ‚ñ∫ If you have any questions or feedback email us at: support@citymapper.com Follow us on Twitter: /Citymapper Visit our website: citymapper.com
