summary: Route Planner for City Navigation: MTA MBTA NJ Transit Bus Times & Subway Map

scraped_reviews.content: So I've been using this app for about a year now and it's hands down the best option for non-car transportation. From the bus to bike routes. Every time gives me superior options to the alternatives. Gives more information on Bus route changes and closures. And the bike routes? Incredible!! I've stopped using Google Maps altogether because of how it prioritizes bike paths to the point of inconvenience. If you want actually good non-car route assistance, try Citymapper! You won't be disappointed.

the app is regionalised. it is only possible to create routes within the selected region. this means, for instance, that it is not possible to plot a route from Norwich to Ipswich, which are 45 miles apart and on the same railway line as one is I London and the other in Midlands. The app is excellent if both start and endpoint are in the same region. but for any reasonably long journey or even short ones crossing an arbitrary region boundary you can forget it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi üëã Thank you so much for the feedback. We really appreciate it and would love to hear more about how you think we can improve! Please email us at support@citymapper.com with your thoughts and any screenshots of issues you are seeing. We'll then get to work! üí™

scraped_reviews.content: awesome app. used it often while vacationing in London in 2024. (walking, taxi, bus). Couldn't have made it around without city mapper. While planning the trip I used Google maps, but it never gave me a choice to use ferries. City mapper will give you best route and alternate routes. Sometimes it made us walk to an underground for 15min when one was right next to us. It also doesn't see you're out of the subway, but you can restart your search and it will work fine. (Android)

I was a long time subscriber and huge evangelist for this app. I'm not sure what has gone wrong, but this app is a shell of its former self. I've now spent over the amount of the subscription fee on extra train fees and wasted time due to bizzare and outright incorrect directions. Suggesting busses that do not exist, routing me on trains that MTA reports as having major delays, ignoring other faster routes. I hope you all turn it around, but it's become too unreliable to use or recommend.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi üëã Thanks for taking the time to leave a review, your feedback is so valuable to us! We're sorry to hear you are facing issues with one of your journeys. Please plan the same journey again and hit "Report Issue" at the bottom of the page, we'll get working on a fix. Thanks! üôå

scraped_reviews.content: A must have when traveling in cities!!!! This app was recommended by a youtuber and she was on target. Just put in where you want to go & either "now" or a set arrival or departure time & it gives tons of options with their corresponding times & costs. You can search ahead and save trips to use when you are offline. You can save locations which you use/need often. It has an alert to let you know when your stop is approaching. Sometimes following the walking while on the move is a bit confusing.

I've been trying the different transit apps over the past few months, and CityMapper is among the best! The interface is beautiful and intuitive, and the real-time bus tracking helps ensure you never miss your ride. This would be my #1 favorite app if not for one thing: no integrated fare payment. I have to use a separate payment app from my local transit agency. This is a feature that the competing Transit app provides, and it makes a much better experience.

Very nice app, offering varied modes of public transportation, how to get there. and how long it takes. The only con so far is that names of places are not always displayed on the outside of the bus as stated on the app, which can be confusing for an international traveler. Missing a bus taught me whether I was correct or incorrect, and do differently next time.

This is a horrible app for transportation. I just keep getting confused or not getting the right information I need. If I click on anything, it give me the wrong information, but when I click on something I want, it take me somewhere complete different. For example, I click on a line, give me the opposite direction or something close, then schedules, then directions. Why can't you click and choose options, honestly sounds like a bad take but when you're looking for a line, so many clicks makes
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi üëã Thanks for taking the time to provide us with feedback! If you wish to give us more details, you can write to us at support@citymapper.com and include any screenshots you might have. This will help us to start working on a fix! Thanks üôå

scraped_reviews.content: The app is really great for figuring out different routes to get to places, but the GPS navigation is so difficult to use because the view makes it difficult to determine which side of the street I should be on or which direction I should be walking. The actual compass effect of the map (the highlight that projects from your dot and moves with your phone as you walk) is very inaccurate.

Citymapper is less accurate than some of the other apps out there. the fee to get the best route planning for my situation (chronic fatigue) is a little steep. however, the app is useful for pre-planning and making decisions about which bus or train lines make the most sense the night before, just don't rely on the advance times. I've had busses that show as 6 minutes away just vanish off the screen and not show up.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Margaret üëã Thanks for taking the time to leave a review, your feedback is so valuable to us! We're sorry to hear you are facing issues with one of your journeys. Please plan the same journey again and hit "Report Issue" at the bottom of the page, we'll get working on a fix. Thanks! üôå

scraped_reviews.content: The app is great at navigating me to the places I need to get too and be at on time. But the way the GPS acts is so inaccurate. It will give me routes and times that don't even matchup. I can literally get to my destinations faster than the GPS for the app can tell me what time exactly I will get there which is way earlier than expected or way later than expected!

Not as useful as it could be. It's fine for next departures, but when I get directions, I want the option to choose less walking, bus only, etc. The other day, it wanted me to walk 16 minutes at the end of the trip instead of showing the transfer time for another bus that stops three minutes from where I wanted to go. I now have to use two different apps to get the info I need since 511 discontinued providing the info on their web site .

they only cover a limited amount of cities but they are great when they do cover them. it is much better than Google maps and I highly recommend for travel or if you even live in the city use this instead. note that the locations are very complete because it will match locations by name with Google maps so you won't be missing anything!

I like the Citymapper app a lot. The information is in real time and there are several options. My biggest gripe is that some the travel directions make no sense. Why would I get off a stop before the station, follow the walking instructions to the tracks at the back of the station, which has no entrance, only to have to walk around to the front of the station for a later bus or train and it makes me late? Sullivan Station in Boston MA has no a back entrance. I hope that flaw is corrected.

11.31.2 has now fixed the problem. I am now seeing just English. I enjoy using this app. (In 11.31 and the app had started to show part of its information in Turkish, part in English, despite my app language being English. I have uninstalled and reinstalled and yet this bug does not go away. If I change the app language to French then everything is in Franch. But when I change back to English I get a strange mix of both English and Turkish!)
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi üëã Thanks for taking the time to leave a review. Hearing from our users is core to how we improve Citymapper! We are happy to let you know that this should now be fixed with the latest version of the appüí• Thanks again! üôå

scraped_reviews.content: For public transit travel in and around NYC, Citymapper is definitely better than Google Maps. It has more and more accurate routes and departure times, which are really the biggest perks for me. Unfortunately, even though it's the best around, it still lacks important information sometimes, such as which NJT train track to go to to catch the train it recommends. I've missed connections more than once due to this, adding 30 minutes to my trip. Its waking estimates are also overly optimistic.

Used to be good when I got it but now - not so much..Buses or tubes hardy ever match. When I select go home now it keeps finding options 10-20 mins from now ("leave in 15 mins" - no, I want to leave NOW). I've just gotten off at a tube station cause citymapper told me there will be a bus in a few minutes but there were no buses whatsoever, so back to the tube extending my commute home, late at night even further - not the first time. Thanks for nothing citymapper.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Kora üëã Thanks for taking the time to leave a review, your feedback is so valuable to us! We're sorry to hear you are facing issues with one of your journeys. Please plan the same journey again and hit "Report Issue" at the bottom of the page, we'll get working on a fix. Thanks! üôå

scraped_reviews.content: For some reason the voiceover in the app speaks at about 3x speed which makes it impossible to know what she's saying, and there arent settings in-ap to adjust it. But after moving cities, this has been a lifesaver for me and so much better than Google, which gave me such wrong directions it put me across town from my destination on transit.

The app looks very good, however, I have a major problem with the ads you are allowing. Is it deliberate to have temu ads popping up that contain pornographic thumbnails? The last thing I want is to be using a map with and ad at the bottom showing graphic images. Seriously. Porn has its place but that isn't an ad on a map app. Quite a cunning way to get you to pay for going ad free. Sorry Citymapper but you won't be getting my money and I'm uninstalling your app.

Really good app. I like how it shows you what section to get on the train for (not all trips) Unfortunately where it falls short is that it consistently tells me to leave the train station and walk to the next bus stop, even if there is a direct connection within that station. Also, Ali Express ads will trigger if they are loaded regardless of if you tap it or not, which is incredibly frustrating. I've reported both issues to support years ago, but nothing has been fixed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi üëã Thank you so much for the feedback. We really appreciate it and would love to hear more about how you think we can improve! Please email us at support@citymapper.com with your thoughts and any screenshots of issues you are seeing. We'll then get to work! üí™

scraped_reviews.content: I really love this app. It shows all public transport routes, travel times, and alternative options. You can share your live location for safety, save favourites, and track your trip in real time, which is especially helpful on new routes. If you miss a stop or go the wrong way, it guides you back on track. The arrival option is great for preplanning trips. Overall, it‚Äôs an excellent app.

The best navigation app I've ever used. No problems ever encountered, used it in London, Cardiff and all around South Korea. It works brilliantly, is very accurate & tells you exactly where you have to go, even using several different modes of transport in one journey. It takes traffic into account, too. It also uses bikes and cars. It has live bus tracking to tell you exactly where the bus is, and shows future schedules. It also allows you to plan ahead, letting you pick leave/arrive by time

Very good experience compared to other mappers. I adore the fact that you have many route suggestions & that you can (almost always) see where the buses are on the map relative to your stop. If you take the full screen, unskippable ad approach, like some other journey planners, I'll be uninstalling. Travelling is time sensitive! I'm fine with mini & bar ads!!

I paid for citymapper and installed it on a new phone. I succesfully restored the purchase and yet now when I lauch it I have ads (moreover it's TEMU, PLEASE don't hesitate to advertise anything less ethical, oh wait, there is none !). When I try to restore the payment I have now an error "Sorry there was an issue, please try it again later". Great job, keep advertising planet killer to your subcribers !
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Marion‚Äã. Sorry to hear that Club isn't showing on your device. As Club subscriptions are managed by Apple/Google, you will need to be logged in to the same Apple ID/Google Play account on your device. Once this is done, head to the Club page, scroll to the very bottom and tap ‚ÄòRestore Purchase‚Äô. Your Club subscription will then show up!

scraped_reviews.content: Citymapper has been my go-to for navigating the city, whether it's by bus, train, or walking. The real-time updates on public transport delays and changes are super accurate, and I love how it shows multiple route options, including the fastest and cheapest ways to get around. The interface is clean and easy to use, and the integration with ride-sharing and cycling options is a bonus! It's helped me save so much time and hassle. Highly recommend to anyone who relies on public transportation.

Love it, bit of a shame though that you cannot look at tube maps while you are Ona journey. On many oscassions I wanted to do just that, so if you want to look at maps midjourney you have to cancel your journey. When you looked at the maps and now want to plan your journey quite often it will not give you your original route! Also not great in some situations when it instructs you to take a train to a certain destination where other trains to a different destination also get you to the station

App is great and would be a 5/5, except for the fact that I am left to wonder if the National Rail pays them [or pays them more than TFL] in London. This is due to the fact that recently I'll look at the Turbo travel options the app, and it will only recommend journeys that use the train, ignoring alternative tube/bus based routes even where they are quicker.

Fantastic city oriented transport app! As a Vancouver based person I would like to see better cycling options and some routes tend to be unsafe or with much better alternatives nearby so the algorithm needs work. Transit is wonderful though and is the best working in any app, with easy to find schedules and good itineraries with some fun connections that other services just don't find.

I love this app so much. I tried to navigate the NYC system on their app and had so much trouble. I used this app and just went to Edinburgh, London, and Paris. It worked flawlessly and saved me so many headaches!!! I just input my destination and followed the recommended route and had such an easy time. It mentions any disruptions and an accurate time of bus/train arrivals. Love the get me home feature instead of remembering hotel/airbnb addresses. I'm officially a citymapper girl for life :)

Extremely user friendly with route maps plus bus stop lists all integrated on same screen. This App doesn't stall plus clutter with adds & its information is always correct to the dot. Simply a must-have, especially when the official transport apps often break down at the very wrong moment especially when needed most. Congrats for such a Brilliant App guys & take care.

it's the first time that i came across and made use of this app for a trip in Italy. it was very helpful and we highly rated ita functionality and accuracy. it is not good for every area, and when we got to Modena and Parma in Italy, one could not use the app. so there is still some work to be done but otherwise really cool.

The app is not updating properly at the moment. Most South buses into London are being diverted, event on in city, but the app doesn't show that. You're waiting for a bus and then it just disappears from the app, it doesn't say cancelled, it doesn't say diverted it just disappears and then the next one and then it happens again and again.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi üëã Thanks for taking the time to provide us with feedback! If you wish to give us more details, you can write to us at support@citymapper.com and include any screenshots you might have. This will help us to start working on a fix! Thanks üôå

scraped_reviews.content: So, not only does your app not do anything when I report that areas are shut to the public (it has been over 2 years since my first report, and recently I reported it again), but also your app now randomly opens up ads without the ad banners being touched. I touch the bus/train time or route variations, and suddenly my phones browser redirects to Ali Express or some nonsense. Time to redownload TFLGo I guess.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi üëã Thanks for taking the time to provide us with feedback! If you wish to give us more details, you can write to us at support@citymapper.com and include any screenshots you might have. This will help us to start working on a fix! Thanks üôå

scraped_reviews.content: Downloaded the app for a trip to London and it's been incredibly helpful figuring out different routes and transportation options. It gives cost, time/ETA, which lines you need to take, and even how many calories you've burned and CO2 and money you've saved. 10/10 would recommend

Probably the best app for getting around. So easy to use with so many routes you can choose from to adapt to your needs, also allows you to check for any issues with transport. I'd love to be able to add stops on my routes as it would allow me to plan out whole days.

You can't change the language and where you set your work place but other than that the app is nice, it gives the bus times correctly and multiple ways of getting to your destination. Its a generally a good app. No I'm not a bot üòë, you can trust

citymapper was the best but for some reason now my buses don't show real time? not sure if it was a recent update but now instead of showing me the exact number of minutes till my bus arrives, the app just tells me my bus will come "every x minutes". please change it back to the old real-time information!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi üëã Thanks for taking the time to leave a review, your feedback is so valuable to us! We're sorry to hear you are facing issues with one of your journeys. Please plan the same journey again and hit "Report Issue" at the bottom of the page, we'll get working on a fix. Thanks! üôå

scraped_reviews.content: I usually clicked the "simple" option when navigating. It always recommended safe, fast travel options and it made navigating the subway system a breeze. I used Google Maps to find points of interest and then used Citymapper to navigate to them.

As a bus driver, this is my go to for trip calculation. Also I love the little games that turn up, it's the icing on the cake of how wonderfully this app calculates everything, and shows where the vehicles are, and presumes that you have no car, which is great

The app is great with trains, very helpful, but with buses is useless. It shows ridiculous times, for example today it said the next bus will be in 18 minutes, so I walked, and 2 buses passed me in the next few minutes. Very irritating.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi üëã Thanks for taking the time to leave a review, your feedback is so valuable to us! We're sorry to hear you are facing issues with one of your journeys. Please plan the same journey again and hit "Report Issue" at the bottom of the page, we'll get working on a fix. Thanks! üôå

scraped_reviews.content: Does exactly what we need, where all other apps have failed! couldn't understand why a seemingly simple trip was taking me on 5 different trains. installed this app and its 1 change and 50% less journey time, exactly what I expected from the more 'official' apps

Takes me where I want, in the most convenient way. Just be sure to check the connection times, a bus or train usually is late 3-5 min, and there's connections that are just 2-3 min away. It is usually safer to bet on longer connections to circumvent this.
Randomly thinks showing me Chinese notifications is a good idea. I'm not in China. Even if I were, my phone is set to English. I don't speak Chinese, so why the hell would that be a thing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi üëã Thanks for taking the time to provide us with feedback! If you wish to give us more details, you can write to us at support@citymapper.com and include any screenshots you might have. This will help us to start working on a fix! Thanks üôå

scraped_reviews.content: I've been using the app to get around using public transportation for almost 10 years now. It's honestly more reliable than most of the city's official apps.
It was great before it stopped showing the buses on the map. it's been like this for about 2 months. the accuracy of the wait times is off
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi üëã Thanks for taking the time to leave a review, your feedback is so valuable to us! We're sorry to hear you are facing issues with one of your journeys. Please plan the same journey again and hit "Report Issue" at the bottom of the page, we'll get working on a fix. Thanks! üôå

scraped_reviews.content: I had posted earlier that the ads keep coming despite a paid version. I uninstalled and reinstalled the app and the ads no longer appear. that's good. the app on the whole works great and even helps when offline !
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi üëã Thanks for taking the time to provide us with feedback! If you wish to give us more details, you can write to us at support@citymapper.com and include any screenshots you might have. This will help us to start working on a fix! Thanks üôå

scraped_reviews.content: Edit 2: they have updated their privacy policy, so now they collect and sell your location data (as well as other information from your usage) to third parties and advertisers. (changed rating to 2 stars) Edit1: The ads are back, but they are banners so not that bad. (I will uninstall if they change them to pop ups) They unlocked premium features and removed ads, Thank you

The only transit app I've needed in 10 years of NYC living. Delays are accounted for quickly, and the bus tracker makes that form of transportation far less frustrating. It's about time I upgrade to paid!

I absolutely love this app again with all my heart ever since the update on September 10th I don't have to fight to get the live location icon on the bus anymore and the timings are perfect no more last second 1minute remaining when it showed like 7-10 minutes I love this app 100 million times more now it's accurate no more glitches I faced a lot of glitches with the timings the new map display of the live locations is amazing this app always makes me want to go out for a walk love citymapperüíö
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi üëã Thanks for taking the time to leave a review, your feedback is so valuable to us! We're sorry to hear you are facing issues with one of your journeys. Please plan the same journey again and hit "Report Issue" at the bottom of the page, we'll get working on a fix. Thanks! üôå

scraped_reviews.content: Fantastic app which gives you multiple options for travel in many cities... invaluable in London. Gives me the confidence to use buses as an alternative to the Tube!

title: Yahoo Finance: Stocks & News
description:
Yahoo Finance app is the premier app used by millions to track the markets and the economy. With Yahoo Finance you can keep close tabs on the daily movers so that you are informed around the clock about Finance news so you are well equipped to make the best possible trade. 

Whether you trade stocks, crypto, or bonds, you can execute with confidence that Yahoo Finance will keep you updated with personalized news and alerts. Access real-time stock, crypto, or bond market information and investment updates to stay on top of the market. 


Yahoo Finance features:
‚ÄúHome‚Äù 
‚Ä¢ Track the performance of your personal portfolio
‚Ä¢ Link your portfolio to Yahoo Finance and keep tabs of your holdings on the go. See your holding‚Äôs daily performance at a glance in the ‚ÄúHome‚Äù tab
‚Ä¢ Follow stocks to get real-time quotes and personalized news. Get push notifications from markets like NASDAQ, Dow Jones, BTC, CMC Crypto 200, Oil prices, Bond market, Gold and more. Never miss a beat in the economy
‚Ä¢ Discover detailed financial information such as historical financials, ESG ratings, and top holders, invest with confidence with Yahoo Finance at your fingertips
‚Ä¢ Go beyond stocks and track currencies, bonds, commodities, equities, world indices, and futures
‚Ä¢ Compare and evaluate stocks with interactive full screen charts

‚ÄúNews‚Äù 
‚Ä¢ Read detailed breaking finance news about individual stock, equity, or general economy in relation to what is happening throughout the day by our premier editorial team who will break down individual stories so you get the best detail of the subject
‚Ä¢ Make articles font sizes larger or smaller depending on your device‚Äôs screen size or preference
‚Ä¢ Share out interesting articles you came across with your network easily with the ‚Äúshare‚Äù button or ‚Äúcopy to clipboard‚Äù UI icons

‚ÄúDiscover‚Äù 
‚Ä¢ See the winners and losers, trending equities, or which equities has the most activities throughout the trading day
‚Ä¢ Keep tabs on investment strategies, signals and upcoming financial events.  
‚Ä¢ Dig through the equity, crypto, ETF, mutual fund, or options tabs to see what is trending in each category of your choosing. Invest with the latest information available by Yahoo Finance

‚ÄúMarket‚Äù  
‚Ä¢ Keep tabs on the US, Europe, and Asia market with Yahoo Finance. You will quickly find top gainers and losers for each region 

‚ÄúAccount‚Äù
‚Ä¢ Sign in to view and edit your web portfolio on the go
‚Ä¢ Customize your alerts for news, and stock pricing so you can keep tabs on your stocks

Helpful tips:
‚Ä¢ Follow all the stocks you care about by searching for the ticker and tapping the star icon
‚Ä¢ Create multiple watchlists to organize the stocks you follow
‚Ä¢ Enable notifications for price alerts, breaking news, earnings reports, and more
‚Ä¢ Sync your portfolios across devices

Never invest without the Yahoo Finance App again. We will equip you with the best financial information and analysis available so that you can confidently invest knowing that you are up to date with everything that is going on in the market in relation to news, stocks, crypto, bonds, ETF, mutual funds, or options.   

Privacy Policy: https://legal.yahoo.com/us/en/yahoo/privacy/index.html
Terms of Service: https://legal.yahoo.com/us/en/yahoo/terms/otos/index.html

summary: Breaking Financial News about the market, Stocks, Crypto & Portfolio Tracking

scraped_reviews.content: The news articles often come with the usual extreme Yahoo bias, but otherwise, I highly recommend it. The info and charting that is available (I keep it set to include stochastic momentum), and the range of historical timelines is useful for visualizing when to buy or sell. Update: I don't know what they did, but the app keeps glitching now. It won't display any full scale charts.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your review and helpful feedback! We're always working to improve and have shared your input with our product team. If you have more to share, feel free to reach out to finance.support@yahooinc.com. ~ Yahoo Finance Team

scraped_reviews.content: Normally I have loved this app. However, since the last update, I've had a lot of problems with clicking on a stock and instead of going to the details for that stock, it just spins. If I exit Yahoo Finance and restart then I can go to the stock fine. But if I'm looking up several stocks, the same issue reoccurs. And sometimes if I'm trying to check out stock price history, when I click on 1 month, or 6 months, etc. the numbers don't change. This is fixed if I restart Yahoo Finance.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: If you're encountering freezing, please first ensure your device is running the latest official version, then: 1. Force stop and restart the app 2. Restart your device 3. Uninstall and reinstall the app. If problems persist after these steps, please contact us at finance.support@yahooinc.com so we can assist further. ~ Yahoo Finance Team

scraped_reviews.content: It is a good app for charts and news related to stocks. There are occasional loading issues and the financial metrics are not always updated. I look at numerous stocks regularly and find missing P/E data, yields, expense ratios (on ETFs), and other similar holes in the data. This isn't every stock, but I would estimate that about 1 in 10 have something missing. Despite that, it is still one of the easiest and most accessible free options that investors and traders can use in my opinion.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your review and helpful feedback! We're always working to improve and have shared your input with our product team. If you have more to share, feel free to reach out to finance.support@yahooinc.com. ~ Yahoo Finance Team

scraped_reviews.content: This review encompasses the web page moreso than the app. I made the mistake of getting a smaller phone which has cured me of any desire I had to use the device(if any). I use the web page daily. I use the app only if absolutely necessary. I can't find anything on it and if I do it is lacking in so much information simply due to size. I nearly upgraded my phone, but I think I prefer just never using it. Nothing against tech but dual 27" monitors are sooo much better.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your review and helpful feedback! We're always working to improve and have shared your input with our product team. If you have more to share, feel free to reach out to finance.support@yahooinc.com. ~ Yahoo Finance Team

scraped_reviews.content: I like it a lot but it often seems to struggle with displaying holdings correctly. I might own ¬£100 of a share but it will inflate the price and loss/gain by a factor of 100 on some screens, telling me I have ¬£10000 instead. Seems to happen when I click on individual stocks... the summary pages showing all my holdings are correct.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your review and helpful feedback! We're always working to improve and have shared your input with our product team. If you have more to share, feel free to reach out to finance.support@yahooinc.com. ~ Yahoo Finance Team

scraped_reviews.content: I have a love/hate relationship with this app now. I use to totally love it. But lately, the updates have left glitches. when opening the app from a news notification I get in my feed, I get this message... 'Unexpected error, please try again'. I hit the retry button but it doesn't clear the error. usually takes numerous hits on the retry button to make it clear. SO VERY FRUSTRATING. Also, they took away the DATE info from the ALL HOLDINGS block on the portfolio page. this was very helpful. üò¢
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for reporting this! We've released an update that should resolve the issue. Please let us know at finance.support@yahooinc.com if you continue to experience problems. ~ Yahoo Finance Team

scraped_reviews.content: Notifications on this app are atrocious! For as long as I've been using this app to track my stock prices, the app design team refuses to address the issue of notifications. I, as well as many others, have only price alert notifications turned on yet I continue to receive numerous alerts that I do not want throughout the day. Why is this so hard to fix??
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear you're not satisfied with the app. Your feedback has been shared with our team for review. We truly appreciate you taking the time to help us improve. ~ Yahoo Finance Team

scraped_reviews.content: Getting blue "Unexpected error. Please try again. RETRY" messages all the time when I read the news. Pushing RETRY doesn't help. I cleared the cache and that didn't fix it. I uninstalled and reinstalled the app and that did not fix it. Sometimes the story will turn off. I like the app other than that. It's very useful.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your review! We'd love to hear how we can improve your experience‚Äîplease email us at finance.support@yahooinc.com with any thoughts. ~ Yahoo Finance Team

scraped_reviews.content: What did you do to this, it sucks. Just leave it alone, it was better before you "improved" it. June 15th, it won't even open. Mail either. Can't even click on a stock symbol with it closing down and app error messages. Its non functional now. Garbage. Here it is almost 2 years later since my last review, and more iterations of the application and it's just as bad. Symbols won't update, the charts are messed up and the values aren't correct. Can't you fix this thing and just leave it alone?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear about your disappointment. We'd appreciate it if you could share more about your experience with us at finance.support@yahooinc.com so we can address it. ~ Yahoo Finance Team

scraped_reviews.content: I've been using this app for many years. It is a great way to check on stocks you may be interested in or gather news relating to such stock. At first it may be a bit confusing as to how to use it: create lists, delete/add stock symbols,etc., but once you get familiar with it, it's a very niceand useful app, in my opinion. UPDATE NOV. 2024 Im having problems with the app. It closes suddenly. I ve deleted the app and reinstalled it. Problem persists. UPDATE JUNE 2025. No problems anymore. üëç
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for your 5-star review! We're thrilled to hear you're enjoying Yahoo Finance. If there's anything else you'd like to see or share, we'd love to hear from you! ~ Yahoo Finance Team

scraped_reviews.content: The latest update of this app is terrible. The prices all show 0.00 when I am scrolling through my stock lists. It takes ages (about 8-10 seconds) for the prices to update and it only updates the prices that are visible on the screen. When I scroll further down it shows 0.00 again until I wait 8-10 seconds for the update. So it virtually takes a few minutes to see all my prices. Also the color schemes aren't great and markets that are not open don't show in grey like they used to.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your review and helpful feedback! We're always working to improve and have shared your input with our product team. If you have more to share, feel free to reach out to finance.support@yahooinc.com. ~ Yahoo Finance Team

scraped_reviews.content: Excellent, easy to use financial app + excellent news stories. I've tried most of the free financial apps; this is definitely the best one. (One minor quibble: it would be better if they showed the Dow, S & P 500 and NASDAQ numbers in BOTH points AND percentages on the home screen. You can tap on it, to change from points to percentage, and vice versa, but it would be easier and better if BOTH were automatically displayed on the home page.)
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for sharing your review, we are super proud that you‚Äôre pleased with Yahoo Finance! ~ Yahoo Finance Team

scraped_reviews.content: It is a good software if you only want to track stock prices. If you add any stocks/funds to a folder to track daily changes, then the app is insufficient. It won't adjust for stock split. Also, if you trade and then use the buy/sell function to add/substract your shares, the graph is all messed up!!! I have actually earned money this year, but it shows I have lost money. For some crazy reason, while the dollar amount in my portfolio is calculated correctly, the graph shows a total different pic
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks so much for sending us this great feedback. We have noted it and will be exploring further. Thanks! ~ Yahoo Finance Team

scraped_reviews.content: Generally, an easy app to create and follow a list of stocks. My gripe is the watchlist used to be easier to read. Now, there is a tiny 1 day chart inserted between symbol and current price/change that is a waste of space and reduced the font size of the stock symbol, current price, and change. If I want to see the chart, I'll click on the symbol and view it... I've searched everywhere for how to remove that useless chart on the watchlist page with no luck. Android.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, please contact us at finance.support@verizonmedia.com with information about your issue and ideally a screenshot of the error you are getting. We'll definitely look into it.

scraped_reviews.content: Easy to use. I miss the old graphs that showed dividend histories, but it's one my favorite financial apps. I would give it five stars, if Yahoo adds the dividend feature back on the standard graphs. I still miss the old graphs with splits and dividend details, but it's improved since my last review. You need to increase the number of securities that can be added. Thanks to DRIP plans and fractional purchases it's a lot easier to hold multiple securities than it was in the past.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks so much for sending us this great feedback. We have noted it and will be exploring further. Thanks! ~ Yahoo Finance Team

scraped_reviews.content: Latest update is terrible. It shows the total value of my holdings and daily gains and losses, but it won't show the lots purchased (dates and prices) that I took all the time to enter. Either says unexpected error, or occasionally says I need to login, only I am logged in. obviously it still has the information on the lots as it wouldn't be able to show my gains and losses, so what the heck Yahoo??
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry to hear you are experiencing issues with the app. Our engineers want to further investigate this, please contact us at finance.support@verizonmedia.com for further assistance. - AB

scraped_reviews.content: The app mostly works for a quick app to check prices. The app can kind of track your accounts if you add your positions. Yahoo very much has an agenda as far as the "news" they present to you. Most of their articles are editorial in nature, churned out by shills. If you can stomach the constant attempts at market manipulation Yahoo throws at you. I would think yahoo would curate their "news" a little better, but I guess if msm is ever investigated for market manipulation, there is a long trail.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks so much for sending us this great feedback. We have noted it and will be exploring further. Thanks! ~ Yahoo Finance Team

scraped_reviews.content: Update: I adjusted my stars ( wish I could do 2.5 stars) because an important sector of investing are not allowed to be added to your list. Crypto investments should be allowed to add to your list. I have more in Crypto than in stocks at the moment. Please add Crypto investments to your platform so we can add it to our portfolio. Thank you for considering. I am editing my review as the crashing issue has been resolved. I really like the news I get from this app, very informative.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey TJ! Thanks so much for taking the time to share your feedback, super useful. Very pleased to say that this should now be possible! If you are not able to add them, please send a screen recording or screenshot of your issue to finance-playstore-feedback@yahooinc.com.

scraped_reviews.content: Extremely overpriced, $35/month or $350/year. Any information found within this app can easily be accessed with a quick Google search or contacting a company directly. For the trading aspect, there's another company that offers $0 commission free trading. If you'd lower the price, I'd be more compelled to buy premium. I do like that this app makes things easier and less time consuming but for the price, it doesn't make up for the time invested in doing my own research.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we are always looking to improve the experience for our users, and really appreciate the feedback. If there is anything specific we can look into, please contact us at hkec-android-qna@oath.com.

scraped_reviews.content: Great app. Easy access. The new version lacks the capability to see the pre & after market price on the list without opening the quote. The older version was more convenient at a glance down the list...my preference. Also, the message boards were better served when all the responses opened completely without having to press the extend button on each response. Otherwise, I like the app for timeliness, news, etc.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks so much for your review, we are so pleased you're loving the app! ~ Yahoo Finance Team

scraped_reviews.content: love it ! one of the best programs out there, for what it does. We need it every day, and there is not a good substitute. However, it gets loaded up, gets latent, and crashes, sometimes even has mistakes and shows green when stock is down. It is a deep program and can track tons and tons of data. Keep improving it, we need it. It has been the best stock and market tracker for the last 25 years
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi David, thanks for the review! Should you have additional feedback, we'd love to hear from you. Please email us at finance.support@verizonmedia.com. -AB

scraped_reviews.content: Yahoo had a great app for viewing stocks live, until they changed it around March 10, 2019. Before it was streamlined and you could see many securities on one page. And if you wanted more detail, you could open it up with one click. Now it comes in large font and which only allows a handful on one page. Additionally, the volume is always wrong and the securities do not update in real time. I have never understood why software writers make changes that are not improvements, but the opposite.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry that you don't like the new format, but we appreciate your honest feedback. Should you have additional feedback, we'd love to hear from you. Please email us at finance.support@verizonmedia.com. -AB

scraped_reviews.content: Up-to-date, latest financial data in the palm of my hand. My favorite stocks, prices of commodities, interests rates, and the latest headlines--all at the tip of my finger-tips....this is a truly awesome app imo! May 6th 2019: New Version is awful, inaccurate, crashes and is in no way an improvement on the older, "great version", I highly rated above. All this version is, is an attempt to cram more ads in and among the app. It's sad to see so much of technology, go this way; Newer NOT better!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry you're having problems. We'd like to help. Please reach out to finance.support@verizonmedia.com. -MN

scraped_reviews.content: It is much, much better than it used to be. I run a fairly long watch list, and my research on various symbols is now faster. Financial data loads much faster than back in 2019. It is a good second opinion source with data, rather than reading so many " pump and dump" articles with interesting headlines, but no meat, and they bait you to join their "Pro" subscription that still doesn't have the data to back up their opinions.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Sorry to hear you are experiencing issues, please make sure you have downloaded the latest version of the app. Please visit our help pages here: https://help.yahoo.com/kb/finance-app-for-android/latest-version-sln14200.html or contact us at finance.support@verizonmedia.com for further assistance. - AB

scraped_reviews.content: It's baffling how this app got 4 stars. It is utterly useless. It shows one of my stocks is up 43¬¢ when in reality its up 13¬¢. This happens everyday. Column headers do not freeze. No landscape mode in portfolio view. I get a notification and when I click on it, it plays a video ad...I don't think so. This app fails in the one thing it's supposed to do. But then it's Yahoo so I am not surprised. They can't even get email right after 25 years. Useless company.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry you're having problems. We'd like to help. Please reach out to finance.support@verizonmedia.com. -AB

scraped_reviews.content: This was my primary watch list and portfolio tool. After the update last week, all are gone. I've uninstalled/reinstalled which seems to have helped others recover, but didn't help. I really like being able to track and update on mobile, then export to CSV on a PC desktop to run scripts against. Very frustrated it's gone. Also found the older version useful for quickly finding a specific ticker's metrics. Much of that is still there, but requires more navigation to reach. All downside.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Rob! Sorry to hear you're having problems. If you reach out to finance.support@verizonmedia.com we'll help you get things sorted out. - AB

scraped_reviews.content: I have used yahoo finance for over a decade. Very disappointed with the update. Not everyone wants to analyze every stock every time they look. Sometimes you just want a quick glance. The new format makes it much more difficult to read. Too much info on the page. I am most interested in the numbers showing the current price change of the stocks. Those numbers are the smallest on the page, with no adjustment for bold face or size. 1/2/24 - Update Thank you yahoo! Easy to see now at a glance.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're really sorry to hear that you're disappointed with our app :( We have noted your feedback and will be exploring further. Thanks! ~ Yahoo Finance Team

scraped_reviews.content: The Yahoo Finance app is great for a quick check on stock quotes and also a quick look on how my portfolio is doing mid-day. I just changed my rating from 5* to 1*, due to recent changes. I no longer can see current total daily dollar gain for individual stocks, not can I see gain or loss to date, or any of the columns that were formerly visible. the app freezes up every time I try to view anything other than the current screen view.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry to hear you're having problems. If you reach out to finance.support@verizonmedia.com we'll help you get things sorted out. -AB

scraped_reviews.content: Overall, I find the app more helpful than most others I have experienced. The newer version makes it more difficult to denote the number of shares in a particular equity position, as it appears to me that you can only edit the position by entering new "Lots" info. I don't want to enter specific information re "Lots" in a phone app, so that actually makes it less user friendly to me than the previous versions of the app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks so much for sending us this great feedback. We have noted it and will be exploring further. Thanks! ~ Yahoo Finance Team

scraped_reviews.content: Same app, differenr problem. Recently updated app for android 9.0 and the app no longer updates marker indices throughout the day. When i click the "markets" button, it appears that they're only updated in the morning shortly after the market open. I received a response from Finance support team on this issue, suggesting that I clear the app data, which I did. Now the app is unable to to retrieve data at all for any of the market indices. This app is complete junk and I'm uninstalling it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Tyler, we would like to further investigate this, please contact us with more information regarding the issue you are experiencing at finance.support@verizonmedia.com. -BR

scraped_reviews.content: The app is okay most of the time. Sometimes it won't load. The web page is trash though. Around December they updated it to some table format that doesn't fit in the screen so you have to scroll everywhere wasting 4+ inches of both sides of the screen. Also, it's a constant barrage of "error 500" no matter what browser you try. Don't worry though this will get the bottom response and that will fix everything.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're really sorry to hear that you're disappointed with our app :( We‚Äôd love to hear what you feel is missing from it or how else we could do better, so please do share it with us here finance.support@yahooinc.com. Thanks a ton! ~ Yahoo Finance Team

scraped_reviews.content: I like that you can link multiple brokerage accounts. One thing, or possibly two things, I would like to see is the option to not merge the total amount of shares into one sum. I'd rather keep the shares separate for their respective brokerage account. Maybe for the overall view, yes, merge them. But if I look into a specific brokerage account, show only the shares for THAT account.

The new update was a step backwards. The data doesn't update properly. I'm forced to exit and re-enter the app for it to update to realtime data. Unfortunately, that only works half the time. When I look at a specific stock, the price reflects a realtime quote, but the chart is three hours behind. This would be a fantastic app if these issues were fixed. It's frustrating and useless otherwise.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We would like to further investigate this, please contact us with more information regarding the issue you are experiencing at finance.support@verizonmedia.com. -BR

scraped_reviews.content: App has a lot of features. From % users who are bullish, bearish, neutral to earnings report date, average & daily volume, share price over a large number of days, months, years, news of the day, and some minor analyst reports such as Market Watch (take with a grain of salt). This is the only thing Yahoo has that's unbiased and I've used Yahoo Finance to track markets, bonds, commodities, stocks since long before smart phones.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for sharing your review, we are super proud that you‚Äôre pleased with Yahoo Finance! ~ Yahoo Finance Team

scraped_reviews.content: Yahoo just changed the appearance of the fonts. it's not an improvement the old format was more readable. The index prices at the top are not fully displayed (cut off). I also noticed in the last few days closing stock prices are sometimes wrong. Overall it seems like changes are being made without any real testing before implementing. Why is there no future earnings date for stocks?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: I am sorry that you are not loving the new design. We would love to hear recommendations from you about how you think the app can be improved. Please email us at finance.support@verizonmedia.com. - AB

scraped_reviews.content: Great for tracking stocks, but they seem to have decided they should tell you what to think about everything. I wouldn't even mind the pushed headlines if they weren't so blatantly biased. They literally pyshed an article a few days ago that said all the cancelled oil infrastructure (cancelled leases, non renewed, less new, cancelled delivery projects...) weren't affecting prices. I can't take it anymore. App removed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! We are really sorry that you aren‚Äôt satisfied with the balance of the news stream. If you‚Äôd be able to share a screenshot or the name and publisher of the article with us here (finance.support@yahooinc.com) we‚Äôll pass it on to our editorial team. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: This app keeps getting worse every year. They keep changing it and they always change it so that it's worse than it was before. I logged in to see if they have at least fixed their statistics that they list on their charts. No, they're still wrong. As an example, look at the 10-year treasury note using the "ALL" option where it shows the price going from 11 down to 4 which they show as a price increase of 6%. You cannot rely on their charts.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're really sorry to hear that you're disappointed with our app :( We‚Äôd love to hear what you feel is missing from it or how else we could do better, so please do share it with us here finance.support@yahooinc.com. Thanks a ton! ~ Yahoo Finance Team

scraped_reviews.content: Once app is opened you see what the Dow, S&P, and Nasdaq are doing. There is a list of the largest moving stocks of the day (up or down). Easy to type in your stocks, get relevant data with easy to read graphs of prior performance along with running total for time-frame selected. Your favs can be loaded on daily list as well. Lastly, there are news articles below data updated often.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks so much for sending us this great feedback. We have noted it and will be exploring further. Thanks! ~ Yahoo Finance Team

scraped_reviews.content: Great beginning but more to learn. It seems that tracking mutual fund portfolios cannot be relied on soon after the market closes as suggested by the app messaging you about daily progress. The funds must be given a few hours after close to price and update. Usually there is a significant difference between the early report and where things settle out.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Sorry to hear you are experiencing issues, please make sure you have downloaded the latest version of the app. Please visit our help pages here: https://help.yahoo.com/kb/finance-app-for-android/latest-version-sln14200.html or contact us at finance.support@verizonmedia.com. - MN

scraped_reviews.content: i use this app to monitor my portfolios at multiple firms, using the account linking feature. While this app works well enough on iOS (with some occasional glitches), it is horribly, horribly wrong on Android. Every one of my stocks could be red for the day, but the app would still show a positive "day's gain" for each stock and the portfolio as a whole. The numbers shown never make any sense and seem completely random. Not a great feature for a stock app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jonathan - sorry to see you are having problems with the linked brokerage accounts on the Android app.  Please contact us by emailing us at finance.support@verizonmedia.com so we can gather more details and investigate the problem.  Thank you! - NF

scraped_reviews.content: They have changed again...it is good to see the ex-dividend date....but now I don't see an earnings date? I used to be able to see pre-market numbers on the stocks on my list, but since the last build I have to open the detail on a specific stock to see if there is pre-market activity. That is annoying.  Update March 18, 2019. Updated the app. As it was earlier, right after the last big update, it has started freezing up and has only gotten worse, much worse, when I updated it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry you're still having problems. We'd like to learn more about your issues. Please reach out to finance.support@verizonmedia.com. - MN

scraped_reviews.content: It's okay, but missing small, but important features that prevent it from being my one stop finance app. First, it needs more notification options, specifically for one ONLY for price alert. Second, there needs to be a price tracker/custom stock price alert option where you can set a desired price of a stock on your list and get an alert if it ever reaches that price. After all, what's the point of a watchlist if it isn't watching the stock prices for you?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for sharing your feedback with us. We will share this with the rest of the team. Thanks again! -BR

scraped_reviews.content: This app has always had one problem or another, but the latest update seems like it wasn't even tested. Prices are completely wrong premarket. The premarket change is showing both for previous close and premarket and even then they don't seem to add up to the main price. I don't love the new ux choices, but it's not a huge deal to me, accuracy and stability are more important. I don't see how or why I would ever connect my actual broker to this with bugs like this constantly slipping through.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry to hear you're having problems. If you reach out to finance.support@verizonmedia.com. We'll help you get things sorted out. - MN

scraped_reviews.content: This Yahoo Finance app does not always work correctly. The chart area shows up blank or has serious problems keeping your charting indicators.like the moving average, but everything else seems to work well. I would only use the free version, because paying you may get disappointed because when you really need to use the charring won't work. But all other areas work well and makes it a good app. Giving it 3 stars because when it goes down, it stays down for days on end.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks so much for reporting this! We have been looking into this issue and the issue with indicators not saving has been resolved. Please contact us at finance.support@yahooinc.com for any other issues that still persist. Thanks! ~ Yahoo Finance Team

scraped_reviews.content: WAS the best app for taking a quick look at stocks and keeping a running tracker, but ever since the recent update it is terrible. Now I have to individually refresh every single stock I am tracking just to see the updated price, and on a list of 30+ stocks that I track it is just unusable. Another update that I did today said it would "fix bugs", but it didn't, and after uninstalling and reinstalling it, it still does not auto update. Was my "go to" for years, but now done with it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry you're having problems. We'd like to help. Please reach out to finance.support@verizonmedia.com. - MN

scraped_reviews.content: Update August 2024: Their new version 2.0 is easier to use and provides more information that i actually use in making investment decisions. Of course, the 5* rating stays. Very useful for tracking my portfolio. I have a ton of functionality with my broker's website, but this one fills a gap. It's not perfect, but still good enough for 5*.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for sharing your review, we are super proud that you‚Äôre pleased with Yahoo Finance! ~ Yahoo Finance Team

scraped_reviews.content: i dont know what has happened since the update, but whenever i use the app for a while, it freezes, and it also crashes my whole phone and whatever is running in the background. every. single. time. I've tried reinstalling, and I've tried clearing cache, force closing, and every possible solution. nope doesnt work. i love the app, but this horrible issue has forced me to look towards other applications.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: If you're encountering freezing, please first ensure your device is running the latest official version, then: 1. Force stop and restart the app 2. Restart your device 3. Uninstall and reinstall the app. If problems persist after these steps, please contact us at finance.support@yahooinc.com so we can assist further. ~ Yahoo Finance Team

scraped_reviews.content: The app is ideal for financial information. I use it for news and prices of specific stocks. On top of this the option prices are very easy and quick to browse. I haven't looked too far but an economic calendar and quarterly results due section for each stock would be good. As said I've not looked too far so it could be there.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for your 5-star review! We're thrilled to hear you're enjoying Yahoo Finance. If there's anything else you'd like to see or share, we'd love to hear from you! ~ Yahoo Finance Team

scraped_reviews.content: Main menu is cluttered with useless and intrusive daily brief. Although the devs receive significant backlash for it, they do nothing. We used to be able to access at least the individual stock's pages from the app's widget, but guess what? It does not work any more! The widget does not load data most of the time and when it does, clicking on anything brings you to the main menu full of spam. Good job devs! You never fail to disappoint!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear you're not satisfied with the app. Your feedback has been shared with our team for review. We truly appreciate you taking the time to help us improve. ~ Yahoo Finance Team

scraped_reviews.content: I have not found a suitable alternative to Yahoo Finance, for providing a consolidated mirror to all my individual investments. I use it all the time, so should score it highly (and Recommend it). The Yahoo team do keep fiddling with it, but for a fee app, I cannot find anything better. The recent redesign of Yahoo Finance has ruined the former ease of assimilating my personal finances! I am looking for an alternative.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your review and helpful feedback! We're always working to improve and have shared your input with our product team. If you have more to share, feel free to reach out to finance.support@yahooinc.com. ~ Yahoo Finance Team

title: Amazon Music
description: We're changing the way you discover and play the music you love. Listen free to music with ads‚Äîno credit card required. Prime members can enjoy all the music ad-free. Or, get unlimited access with Amazon Music Unlimited and play any song, anytime, anywhere. Included with your Prime membership at no additional cost: ‚Ä¢ All the music ad-free ‚Ä¢ Discover new music based on your likes ‚Ä¢ Shuffle play any artist, album, or playlist Amazon Music Unlimited: ‚Ä¢ Unlimited access to 100 million songs ‚Ä¢ Pick and play any song, ad-free ‚Ä¢ Listen offline ‚Ä¢ Unlimited skips Or listen to free streaming music, no credit card required: ‚Ä¢ Thousands of stations and top playlists ‚Ä¢ Discover new music based on your likes ‚Ä¢ No credit card required Import your playlists: ‚Ä¢ Move existing playlists from other music platforms to Amazon Music in a few quick steps. Learn more at http://www.amazon.com/playlistimport My Music: ‚Ä¢ Listen to music you‚Äôve purchased from Amazon ‚Äì MP3s or AutoRip CDs/Vinyl. Your Amazon purchases are stored for free in the Amazon cloud Visit us at: www.amazon.com/music/unlimited www.amazon.com/music/prime www.facebook.com/amazonmusic www.twitter.com/amazonmusic www.instagram.com/amazonmusic
descriptionHTML:
We're changing the way you discover and play the music you love. Listen free to music with ads‚Äîno credit card required. Prime members can enjoy all the music ad-free. Or, get unlimited access with Amazon Music Unlimited and play any song, anytime, anywhere.


Included with your Prime membership at no additional cost:
‚Ä¢ All the music ad-free
‚Ä¢ Discover new music based on your likes
‚Ä¢ Shuffle play any artist, album, or playlist

Amazon Music Unlimited:
‚Ä¢ Unlimited access to 100 million songs
‚Ä¢ Pick and play any song, ad-free
‚Ä¢ Listen offline
‚Ä¢ Unlimited skips

Or listen to free streaming music, no credit card required:
‚Ä¢ Thousands of stations and top playlists
‚Ä¢ Discover new music based on your likes
‚Ä¢ No credit card required


Import your playlists:
‚Ä¢ Move existing playlists from other music platforms to Amazon Music in a few quick steps. Learn more at http://www.amazon.com/playlistimport

My Music:
‚Ä¢ Listen to music you‚Äôve purchased from Amazon ‚Äì MP3s or AutoRip CDs/Vinyl. Your Amazon purchases are stored for free in the Amazon cloud


Visit us at:
www.amazon.com/music/unlimited
www.amazon.com/music/prime
www.facebook.com/amazonmusic
www.twitter.com/amazonmusic
www.instagram.com/amazonmusic
summary: We‚Äôre changing the way you find and play the music you love.

scraped_reviews.content: The good: the unlimited membership offer 30 days trial period so that user can decide if they keep it or not. The collection appears to be quite large. The bad: it is impossible to search a composer or performer and get a list of all relevant works. The worst part is that one feels overwhelmed by so many items that are pushed to one. For a membership fee supported platform, it shouldn't be the case.

Horrible UI, just horrible. 1) Recently added is a list of songs?! It should give you to change it to list recently added albums. 2) "You might like" and "songs for you" "albums for you" and the other "for you" sections seem to be based on one thing you recently listened to, which is ridiculous if you happen to like more than one micro-genre of music. 3) The app doesn't let you add a song or album to your collection! 4) "My music" is organized alphabetically, with no way to jump to the, say, "R"s. When you offer so many thousands of options, that's awfully unwieldy. (Yeah, I know I can search, but that's clunky at best, and NO, I don't have or want Alexa).

This is one of the glitchiest apps I've ever used. lt frequently just stops in the middle of a song. When you try to restart the app is blank. Forcing you to have to close it and restart it. The current new hell I'm experiencing is in the version on my smart TV. For some reason now the search feature has stopped working. It allows you to type in what you want to search for but when you press search it deposits you outside of the app. I've tried uninstalling and reinstalling it but it doesn't do anything. The music sounds great when you can access it.

This would be a nice app... as long as it would work. It has great features, like HD quality or lyrics, but, frankly, it stops playing all the time on Android TV (all the video apps work flawlessly with an Ethernet wired connection, so it's an app problem). Of course, don't expect any help from Amazon. So I'm coming back to Spotify (Apple Music is not an option, I won't face Apple stupidity anymore).

The Amazon Music app in the Google Play Store has a bug which was caused by a recent upgrade as it was working well before. On my Android devices (TVs, Tablet) and on Chromecast device my music playlists are no longer sorted to match the Sort I have on my Windows laptop. And there is no Sort functionality that is available through the Play Store App. This is a huge problem for me as I have playlists spanning over 50 years.

music rarely ever plays and when it does play, only plays one song. this happens on all devices no matter what internet connection is used and also on cell connection. liteally 5 to 10 minutes between songs if at all. i have been prime for over a decade withuot this issue. meanwhile all other music services work fine on every device. terrible service by prime music. buyer beware.

the search bar allows me to input text, but pressing enter does not launch the search, instead it selects the next option in the "search by genre" area so the search bar is completely useless. it does the same pressing "ok", and the same using 3 different remote types. Rii remote, original remote, and Nvidia Shield virtual remote on my phone. app is up to date, adroid is up to date. this app is useless in that state.

Fixed artists view but the experience is still worse than what it was before they made the total fail of changing it in the first place. Thankfully now you can go back to your normal artists view, but when you click on an artist, rather than seeing the music you have for them, it shows the view as if you searched that artist. You have to once again click that you want to see music in your library for them. You have to do this every time for every artist. It doesn't save the setting for all.

For a billion dollar company you would think they can create a music app that works on Android TV. App constantly freezes at startup and the only way to fix it is to uninstall and reinstall. The mobile app isn't much better either. Uninstalling for the last time and cancelling my subscription to Amazon HD service.

I am a user of PocketCast. I was allured to this because of the lack of ads. The user-interface is profoundly awful. Every time I load the app, I get a popup for upgrading to unlimited. That is customer hostile. The UI is not suitable for podcasts at all. You can't change the order of items. It's just horrible.

I am running Amazon Music on Android TV (version 9) on my Xiaomi MiBox and I noticed recently that every time I log back in to Amazon Music and play a song from a playlist it will not forward to the next song so I discovered a way to fix this which is to force stop the app and then clear the cache. Once the cache is cleared and I re-open the app then the songs in the playlist will play and go to the next song once the previous song ended. Can you please fix this issue as it becoming annoying.

Eh. Not sure why this isn't being updated, which I wouldn't mind if it supported HD music services because it's mostly fine otherwise. You can't uninstall it, but you can sideload the standard Android Amazon Music app right next to it, and just ignore this one. I suggest you do so.

Difficult interface that does not easily serve up your faves. Biggest issue is screen burn in on tvs. The logo sits in the upper right corner and does not move. The controls sit across the bottom and are also fixed white as a default.

I just canceled my HBO + on Google play because it was impossible to load on my phone. I went to my devices and my phone wasn‚Äôt there. When I tried to add it it was impossible to find out how to add a device. Besides the fact that there were old iPads and computers there that shouldn‚Äôt have been. As usual navigation of this app is confusing. I will now purchase directly from the HBO max app. There I click on the app and I can play it with no issues. This is why I don‚Äôt like to purchase an app within the google play app. I can‚Äôt find it when I want it or can‚Äôt load it on my device. You have much work to do when it comes to User friendly or how easy it is to navigate your apps.

To start I am quite adept at installing apps across many platforms. First I love Amazon Music and have installed it on all my devices, I tried every trick I know to no avail and I have to say the app for Chromecast sucks. Had to give up and uninstall.

Using this on Nvidia shield pro 2019. It's slow on start up and to start streaming. Also if it's playing and the shield screensaver goes on after a while it just stop playing. Dezzer does not have this issue. Also sometimes you can find the like or add to my list buttons. Seems like an inconsistent interface. It also hangs sometimes on startup

Horrible UI. Can only find your albums by scrolling through long list. Can't search or order the list for, say, recently added albums. There is a recently added playlist which lists the songs on the albums you have added IN REVERSE ORDER.

Hardly worth repeating how horrible this app is. Stops playing at some point IN. EVERY. SONG. Yes, I've done the clear cache dance. To be clear, this is on a DirecTV Stream STB. Lastly, I really like the phone app so will continue trying this until it's fixed! :-|

The Amazon Music app for Android tv is quite poorly developed and deserves criticism to the highest degree. It freezes almost every time it is started. I pay a monthly fee, but Amazon cannot provide a working app.
This app has too much going on. It's easy to get lost. Plus, each time a station is played it plays the same songs, in the same order each time. This all makes the app quite annoying to use.

no way to turn off lyrics in the tv app. if I search for a song and play if on the tv it keeps playing more songs with the same name instead of playing songs of the same genre. extremely dissatisfied and disappointed.

There is a good selection of music in this app, but after a week and sometimes before you have to clear the cache and force to stop the app. I have been using the app since it came out, but the same problem persists. Please, do something!!!

Horrible app that hasn't been updated in 13+ months. Won't play past the sleep timer on Shield (which Spotify does perfectly fine) and doesn't support their Music HD offering. It's a system app so it can't be uninstalled either.

This app hangs on the splash screen. It will stay broken because Amazon has made it impossible to contact the company unless you want to duel with a bot for 10 minutes to then "chat" with someone in India who may, or may not, understand the issue.
this app does not allow you to edit your playlists and sometimes stops after each song which is very annoying. Bottom line is, "Amazon you need to do better!"
The main problem I have with this app is that it lacks the ability to introduce you to new music of an artist you like or similar groups. Instead it regurgitates a handful of songs you said you like.

I've so far had 0 issues with this app on the Mi Box 4. It even continues to play while I'm surfing the web in Puffin which is awesome! It also seamlessly connected me to the HD version of the service. Only gripe would be I can't add to my overall account music section. But great app still!

I love Amazon music but my only issue is that I wish on the Amazon music app for TV, you could listen to your music in Dolby Atmos. Maybe it's something that Amazon can work on getting for their Amazon music TV app.
This app refuses to work on Android TV. I can't tell you how many times I reinstalled it. Even with a chunky Ethernet connection, this app is not interested in playing music.
Region locked, does not work in most countries while the base app on mobile devices does. Also, history between the versions (app on shield and app on mobile) does not synch.
I can't even play the music I purchased without being shuffled and Amazon telling me I need to upgrade to unlimited if I want to listen to the songs in order. this a scam and should be investigated.
I'm just disappointed with playback. When you play an album,it will play the first track then stop.
The search bar doesn't work, which makes it useless. Otherwise, it's a good app.
app has issues. stops playing at the end of a song and won't automatically start the next one. app has to be forced closed.
Very bad. I always have problem playing continuously despite doing exactly what troubleshooting asked me. On iPhone works well but not on TV. THEN OUT OF THE BLUE IT WORKS. THEN NOT AGAIN.
This app is driving me crazy. it constantly crashes or fails to start all together. Also, still no way to save stations.
Hasn't been working well since updated. getting stuck trying to load songs but fails. force stop doesn't fix, reinstalling now! Android TV
this has almost all the music! it has my favorite songs. but you have to start a trial to have all the songs.
I love this app but it doesn't play one song after another it stops after one song and you have to go back to the app to start the next song at least on Android tv. please fix this
Amazon music is good but you have to get a account and everything so hopefully they make it so you don't have to have account. :) plus you have to do a code. please like
this is a worthless app. one cannot listen to podcasts and if one tries to stream a podcast from their cell phone to the TV, the app freezes
No support for Atmos tracks. Can't navigate through playback. Can't add/remove from playlists. Please address these issues ASAP.
app always worked in hd and UHD until recently. it now opens but will not play at all through Sony Bravia. app does play through Roku but not in hd. revisit the Feb 7 update please.

This app on my Sony android a80j through the google play store is so far behind its ridiculous.I use an iPhone and it‚Äôs always up to the latest version but on my tv through the play store,it was last updated on April 12.This doesn‚Äôt allow me to listen to Dolby Atmos or 360 reality audio which stinks. My 7.2.4 system is amazing but this app along with others just don‚Äôt get updated enough.Luckily I was able to get Tidal to give me what I wanted but not through play store.Why is updating a problem?
it's one of the worst Android TV apps constant freezing this has been a consistent issue over the years I've had this app on several different TVs please optimize this damn app
Couldn't use it on my TV, no way to just sign in. Wanted me to change password, even though it's already on my phone and tablet. Not very helpful.
won't even open on Nvidia shield tv even though it's available in the app store. it installs, then gives the option to enable but nothing happens.
the main problem is it has tooooo many ads and has been laggy I tried restarting it it would not work Trash app INAPPROPRIATE super trash also when I try to play music it stops!
It lacks basic features for playing music. If you're lucky, Prime may unlock them for you.

won't work on any device in uhd etc except Windows all recent after free upgrade to family-plan and blaming customers,what? all of us.and now and then does the new free shuffle.helpdesk blaming our device settings

title: Airlearn - Language Learning
description:
Airlearn: Learn Spanish, German, French, Italian, Dutch, Portuguese, Japanese, Korean, Chinese, Hindi, English, Turkish, and Russian in one intuitive app. Enjoy short lessons, cultural insights, and fun practice slides that make language learning stress-free and engaging.

OUR APPROACH
‚Ä¢ Learn First, Practice Next: We teach key grammar, vocabulary, and cultural context before you dive into quizzes. Gain real understanding instead of guessing.  
‚Ä¢ Rich Cultural Insights: Explore history, customs, and local expressions. Language is more than words‚ÄîAirlearn helps you appreciate its cultural essence.  
‚Ä¢ Clean & Minimalist: No overblown gamification or cluttered screens. Lessons stay focused, so you can learn at your own pace without distractions.
