scraped_reviews.content: It's a good app overall for learning a language from scratch. I like that it explains grammar along the way and incorporates visuals. Lessons are very short, and launch immediately one after another, until you run out of free lessons (5 a day) or until you click the X botton on the bottom left and confirm that you wish to exit the lesson. The cat avatar that is assigned to you doesn't seem to be customizable, sadly. I wish they will add this feature.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, We are continuously working to enhance the user experience. For any other suggestion/feedback please write to help@airlearn.com and we will be happy to help you.

scraped_reviews.content: The "You" page is bugging out super hard, the "tap to view" pictures are constantly rapid-fire changing. Also, I dislike the use of AI art throughout the lessons. It is lazy, cheap, and defeats the purpose of the ads I found this app through that claimed to be better than Duolingo. However, the lessons on Airlearn are a lot more useful than any other app I've used, which is why I gave 3 stars. It will be more if either/both of the points I've mentioned are fixed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, We have a dedicated creative team to design high-quality visuals. We‚Äôre always looking for ways to improve, and we appreciate your feedback. For any further suggestions, feel free to reach out to us at help@airlearn.com.

scraped_reviews.content: The app has gotten better at giving explanations and I found the feature to jump sections, however, I wish the correct answer was shown if the user chose the incorrect option. Additionally, a review of words learned and used in sentences would be beneficial to retain in one's memory in the long run without having to jump to sections and redo the lessons.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Emilio, We have a "Jump-start" feature that will help you start learning from the desired level. For more details, please write to us at language_help@unacademy.com and we will be happy to assist you.

scraped_reviews.content: Update: I was fairly taken aback by the use of Î∞òÎßê right off the bat in the Korean section and gave the app 3/5 for it, I think it's ideal to learn the informal-polite form first. I increased my rating as I've been enjoying the flow of the app, I enjoy that it doesn't linger on topics for too long and sprinkles in reminders for other units in the reviews. Didn't give 5 stars because the home screen widget is broken and repeatedly makes me start from the beginning of a unit and waste a heart.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, We do have a dedicated creative team & language professionals who prepare the lessons and we have noted your feedback here. For any other suggestion/feedback please write to help@airlearn.com and we will be happy to help you.

scraped_reviews.content: I saw this advertised (surprisingly) on Duolingo and thought it would be a good 2nd practice option. Installed during lunch & it was sending me notifications all afternoon. Got home from work & blew through the first lessons until I got to the maximum for the daily free lessons. Hadn't been off 5 minutes before it sent another notification urging me to sign up for pro! Didn't see a way to edit the notifications so I uninstalled. Might be good for some but way too many notifications.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Elizabeth, we are sorry to hear this. We are working on enhancing our user experience and your feedback is valuable to us.

scraped_reviews.content: I noticed a couple of improvements! So 5 stars. I have to respect a team that supports their work. OLD: Affordable but a few issues that I can live with for now. 1) On my Android device the listening to Japanese typically doesn't work well. FIXED! 2) Large amounts of hiragana are hard to read, I haven't made it to where kanji is used. IMPROVED! 3) After jumping ahead, I can't set the default position back to an earlier position. Still I find myself using this app more than other apps.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, We are continuously working to enhance the user experience. For any other suggestions, please write to us at help@airlearn.com and we will be happy to assist you.

scraped_reviews.content: App is easy to use, lots of content available, I like that it has you matching pictures to words to build association, etc. Would have been a solid learning tool for me. But the AI. Not just the images but the voiceovers in both starting and target language too. Devs, really? You can't have someone mic up and read lines? it's not just a preference thing, it also affects pronunciation. Some stock photos and real voices and I would have paid for this and gotten real use from it. Disappointing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, We have a dedicated creative team to design high-quality visuals. We‚Äôre always looking for ways to improve, and we appreciate your feedback. For any further suggestions, feel free to reach out to us at help@airlearn.com.

scraped_reviews.content: I can already tell this is going to be a mediocre experience. It's trying to be Duolingo, and thus keeps the worst aspects of it from a language learning perspective (drag and drop exercises are never going to be as effective as reading and writing in full narrative sentences). Except they don't have the decency to be actually free. No placement test + limit on skipping modules = if I actually wanted to learn anything from this app, I'll have to spend a month on baby sentences.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, We are continuously working to enhance the user experience. For any other suggestions, please write to us at help@airlearn.com and we will be happy to assist you.

scraped_reviews.content: actually this is the first app that actually works very well, I started learning Japanese a few months ago and now I can understand some music lyrics and some anime words and also I think it is very fun, the only bad thing here is if you go out of the lesson you need to wait for the next day to continue but if not you can do how much lessons you want or can. I really love it üíóüíó

I often praise this app because of the way it teaches languages. It gives facts about cultural aspects explains the languages rules and structures. As well as help to practice vocabulary. Unfortunately, over the past month the app as become completely unusable. It's always buggy. Won't allow you to proceed forward and even when you do does not count your completion towards the streak. Makes it difficult and unreliable
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, We're really sorry for the inconvenience caused. To assist you further, we request you to write to us at help@airlearn.com.

scraped_reviews.content: i wanted to enjoy this app but i CAN'T READ IT! if there were any accessibility options to change the font size i simply couldn't find them after 10 minutes of looking. after two lessons i had a migraine and gave up. font is waaaay too tiny to distinguish Japanese kana on my phone and the characters were in this thick san serif font that just ran together. super disappointed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, We are continuously working to enhance the user experience. For any other suggestions, please write to us at help@airlearn.com and we will be happy to assist you.

scraped_reviews.content: First mention the support is horrible i have had problems where my stats don't show it took a week for that to get corrected now I have an issue where after finishing or completing a lesson when I log back in I have to redo some of the same lessons over again with no response to how to correct this and the biggest issue is that this company double charged me $43 .29. I have been asking for a credit of that charge for more than a week and as yet haven't received any response.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, We're really sorry for the inconvenience caused. We‚Äôll make sure to prioritize your concern and assist you as quickly as possible.

scraped_reviews.content: Audio recording frequently does not work. Your small errors in typing or speaking still count as "correct". The Portuguese Brazilian teaches "tu" as if it is the common form of you, but only a few regions use it that way. some pronunciation explanations are wrong, such as claiming that "rr" has a rolling sound, no it does not, that would be spanish, in Portuguese it makes an "h" sound.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, We're really sorry for the inconvenience caused. To assist you further, we request you to write to us at help@airlearn.com.

scraped_reviews.content: decided to try German, it would probably be okay, but it has massive limitations. you can only do a very limited number of lessons in a day and you aren't even allowed to review past lessons after that. there's no way you can genuinely learn like that. if you take your time to review old lessons, you aren't allowed to do new ones. it's a "pay me" trap. it's just a Duolingo rip off. I'd rather pay a tutor than an app that offers nothing unique.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, We are continuously working to enhance the user experience. For any other suggestions, please write to us at help@airlearn.com and we will be happy to assist you.

scraped_reviews.content: Ive tried several apps to learn korean (even Duolingo), and i love the way this is set up the best!! only 2 things need changed IMO: 1) i wish I didn't make you restart if you dont finish a full lesson. thats frustrating. if it allowed you to pick up where you left off (or even see how far into the lesson you are), that would be huge!!! and 2) i love that it has you interpret phrases and match them, but honestly, I don't always remember all of the words. seeing the translation would be helpful
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, We are continuously working to enhance the user experience. For any other suggestions, please write to us at help@airlearn.com and we will be happy to assist you.

scraped_reviews.content: so far, it's helpful because I really like the explanation and description before actually answering the questions. I was wondering if you could separate each lesson per level. For example, there are about 5 lessons at each level & I can't review the 3rd lesson unless we open the level and go thru each lesson (hope that makes sense). I'm the type of learner who likes to review instead of just moving forward but not being able to remember the previous lessons, it's more challenging than learning.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Thanks for pointing this out. We‚Äôd love to look into it and assist you further. Please write to us at help@airlearn.com with your registered email ID and details of the issue.

scraped_reviews.content: this app is great!! just... not when it comes to using the mic. I'm well aware that my American accent can make it hard to understand me in another language. but it's like the mic can't even pick me up at all. the cues don't even help either. I know it's not a problem with my actual mic. I can take phone calls perfectly fine and other apps pick up speaking. it's just this one that's different. is there something I'm missing?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, We regret to hear this. We are continuously working to enhance the user experience. For any other suggestions, please write to us at help@airlearn.com and we will be happy to assist you.

scraped_reviews.content: subscribed to Pro as I knew it was going to be more suitable for me than DuoLingo. One thing that would be great is if the dictionary section had some sentence examples in it, maybe even some of the sentences we've learned in the lessons so that we can have a quick reference to them. other than that, the short lessons are great.

They ruined a good app by taking the fun out of it. Guys, if we're going to use the app consistently, it needs to be accessible. I get you need to make money, but it's just not worth enough to pay for multiple apps. To choose one or two to purchase, you need to stand out. This was a great free-ish app until they're making you wait 4 hours for another heart. You get 5 every day, and it was a 2 hour wait until you got another heart. Do better, guys. Today I look and I'm waiting 4 hours?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, We are continuously working to enhance the user experience. For any other suggestions, please write to us at help@airlearn.com and we will be happy to assist you.

scraped_reviews.content: since it's free, I can't give it one or two stars, however, pronunciation varies, image references aren't always clearly one thing or another, and sometimes the speech recognition either gets what you said wrong, tells you to try again, if you say it exactly the same it will tell you you did it, and other times it doesn't even register you're speaking. I do feel like I'm learning, however I feel like it could give an actual grammar lesson prior to asking you to build a sentence.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, We are continuously working to enhance the user experience. For any other suggestions, please write to us at help@airlearn.com and we will be happy to assist you.

scraped_reviews.content: Just starting out, the app seems good. I like that it gives extra explanations about words, grammar, and facts about the language/culture. However, what seems to be the use of Generative AI in the images they show for correlation has me hesitant about how high quality the translations actually are. I can definitely say while I like the app, I won't be paying for premium unless the use of generated images stops and the translation process/ accuracy is transparent.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, We have a dedicated creative team to design high-quality visuals. We‚Äôre always looking for ways to improve, and we appreciate your feedback. For any further suggestions, feel free to reach out to us at help@airlearn.com.

scraped_reviews.content: I have loved using this app for the last couple of months. it is similar to Dou but has more picture and grammar. The german grammar system has been really hard to learn, so I am loving the help in grammar. It does not have speaking practice at the moment, but it did so I am sure they are working on a bug. The app is simi new and so far I really like it.

The learning experience is cumulative. I feel like I'm being taught grammar and useful info. Obviously being a language learning app instead of a course, it is not as in-depth. I think instead of just keeping track of words learned, each Did you Know section should be saved in a digital notebook. Also, I have a significant complaint about the speaking and typing portions of the app. I am meticulous with both, but it never gives me 100% for these sections.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, We are continuously working to enhance the user experience. For any other suggestions, please write to us at help@airlearn.com and we will be happy to assist you.

scraped_reviews.content: I love this app. I think the cat animation is really cute. The two biggest things for me are the use of Romanized Korean and some of the pictures are kinda confusing as to what they are supposed to represent. The romanization confuses me b/c I make the mistake of looking at it when reading Hangul. I like the incentives to keep going when you feel you wanna stop. It's good for beginners who are ready to progress to elementary level. But, I give the overall all Five stars!

I would probably use it if I didn't take 1 or 2 minutes to select the correct word. Don't know if it's just me or what or if it's buggy, but I get frustrated with how efficient the app is allowing word selection and placement, it is not fluid at all and I'm spending more time getting the correct word selected sometimes on one question than it would take to complete the whole lesson. Beyond frustrated. Cant give it a one star because I wasn't able to really try it out to make a fair assessment.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we‚Äôre sorry for the inconvenience caused. To help resolve this, please write to us at help@airlearn.com with your registered email ID and the issue details-we‚Äôll take it from there.

scraped_reviews.content: This app leaves a lot to be desired as it is right now. The skeleton of an amazing app is here but it's a tad buggy and the UI needs some more work before I would seriously consider spending my money on it. For example, sometimes when text pops up on the screen I'm not able to scroll to see it all. Also, this might not be a problem for anyone else, but the app tells me that I've learned over 2100 french words, which is nowhere close to the truth.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, We are continuously working to enhance the user experience. For any other suggestions, please write to us at help@airlearn.com and we will be happy to assist you.

scraped_reviews.content: Once the support fixed the initial issue where it looked like you were being charged for a PRO subscription it's been fine, thanks. A fun app to use with some interesting content mixing vocab with grammar. A bit slow to respond & doesn't always pick up your selections - might work better if some of the sound effects & animations could be switched off / skipped.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, We are continuously working to enhance the user experience. For any other suggestions, please write to us at help@airlearn.com and we will be happy to assist you.

scraped_reviews.content: it can be a bit slow at times, but I genuinely feel like this is a lot better than Duolingo (at the very least.) It explains why certain words change, or why you use different words for certain circumstances, rather than just telling you, which makes things a million times easier to remember imo. my two gripes- 1. scraped_reviews.content: So far it's been a really good experience. Lessons are easily digestible. Be warned, however, if you have push notifications on, this app will try to get you to take lessons at 3am. Waking up in the middle of the night to "ready to get back to your streak?" is not exactly ideal. Imediatly turned off notos because of that. Edit: A lot of grammatical errors as I go through the lessons which isn't ideal for someone that doesn't know how to look out for them. Doesn't pick up voice well either

scraped_reviews.content: I love this app! I'm learning Spanish much easier and faster here than I was on Duolingo. That app doesn't explain things well, leaving you feeling like you're not learning because you aren't. I'm glad I switched. I learned more here in just a month than I did in 7 months practicing daily on that awful app. The reminder notifications can be a bit annoying, but regardless, it keeps me reminded to do my daily lessons. The free version is great! I am considering paying for premium.

Seems like a great app so far, it does a good job of actually explaining things and giving extra information. It's really unnecessary and obnoxious asking me to invite someone between every single lesson. Not only that, but I have to select no two times, not just once.

scraped_reviews.content: Been using free version for 10 days now & like it. Can't say how effective the different approach is yet but so far think it's done well. Vocab list is nice, though expected flashcards. Only issue I've had is sometimes the lessons say I wasn't 100% accurate even though I hadn't missed anything. And, superficially, can't figure out how to change how my cat looks!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, We regret to hear this. Could you please write to us at help@airlearn.com with more details? We‚Äôll be happy to assist you.

scraped_reviews.content: I needed to find something better than the one with the owl. I wanted something that focused more on listening. I like how this app stays on one topic for a while and as it moves from a topic, it incorporates the last topic into it constantly reminding and building off the previous. So far with this app, and I am only on the 14 day free trial, but am really considering a paid version. Something I hadn't with the Owl.

I liked the app enough to purchase for the year. So far, the one complaint that I have is the speech recognition. A con for me is the ai voice, it's kinda hard to understand what they say sometimes when explaining something to me and I'm a bit deaf so it makes things harder.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, We are continuously working to enhance the user experience. For any other suggestions, please write to us at help@airlearn.com and we will be happy to assist you.

scraped_reviews.content: Update: Now I can get everything correct but it will not give me a 100. It says 98%. I enjoy the lessons and how it explains how you use the new words. I will continue to use. Love the lessons. Just occasionally it will say words I didn't click on and I can answer wrong on some and it will say correct. Before this I was tempted to pay for this one. I love that they keep a list of every word you have learned. You can review them. You did great on the lessons. I truly enjoy this app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, We regret to hear this. Please write to us at language_help@unacademy.com, and we will rectify any errors.

scraped_reviews.content: Day 1: Seems like a decent app. Would change a few things though. biggest one = being able to go over the lessons/words you already learned without a limit. Not sure why you'd have to wait for ticket reset/another day to go over things you already went through. Also would be nice to be able to have a speak option to work on pronunciation. Day 5 Update: Seems you can work on pronunciation via speaking lessons but they are rare. Still think going over lessons you've done shouldn't take hearts
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, We are continuously working to enhance the user experience. For any other suggestions, please write to us at help@airlearn.com and we will be happy to assist you.

scraped_reviews.content: It's a great app, in my opinion it is better then Duolingo, but only in my opinion, I recommend to try it the two week free trial and see how it is before buying any monthly subscription obviously, but the one issue I have is there should be a implementation of flash cards build in for your selected language, or some way to study, not just words popped up on one large page where you click it and it says it, I can work but it is not really effective, if there were pre built flash cards, PERFECT
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, We are continuously working to enhance the user experience. For any other suggestions, please write to us at help@airlearn.com and we will be happy to assist you.

scraped_reviews.content: so far the language learning has been well, I studied multiple languages in college and am catching back up. The app itself though is the problem, pictures not loading the app never loading, and when I tested to jump ahead it didn't count my test when I went back to the main screen since I was done for the moment it wouldn't let me go to the next chapter.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, We're really sorry for the inconvenience caused. To assist you further, we request you to write to us at help@airlearn.com.

scraped_reviews.content: i really like this app so far but i don't like how once you click off a lesson you can't finish it cause you can only do a lesson a day unless you pay for pro, so you have to wait. i also really would like if you could take multiple courses instead of just one in case you wanna learn multiple languages. i do like how they explain grammar and other stuff a lot more
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, We are continuously working to enhance the user experience. For any other suggestions, please write to us at help@airlearn.com and we will be happy to assist you.

scraped_reviews.content: I like this app much better than Duolingo. I have pro. The voice recognition needs work and sometimes the audio won't play. I also want to be able to stop at any point and pick it right back without being sent all the way back to the start of the section. I would also like to see a way to quiz vocabulary from the words section.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Could you please write to us at help@airlearn.com with more details? We‚Äôll be happy to assist you and ensure the app works smoothly for you.

scraped_reviews.content: If you like the general user interface of Duolingo but looking for something a little different, this app definitely won't disappoint. I feel it presents new concepts in a way that makes them stick a little better. But I'm only 2 weeks in and have been using Duo for about 5 plus years (inconsistently). I now use both every day and can see a difference in basic conversation.

The reason for 3 stars: 1. The voice training doesn't work and it's a real shame. I have cleared cache, given permission, uninstalled and reinstalled. The speak & listen part just will not work. I have a Samsung S21+. ------------ The font choice. I speak some Spanish and their "I"s look like "L"s which keeps tripping me up. A tiny detail such as a font can make a real difference. If these 2 things can be resolved, I would definitely consider purchasing the membership.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, We are continuously working to enhance the user experience. For any other suggestions, please write to us at help@airlearn.com and we will be happy to assist you.

scraped_reviews.content: The app was doing fine. Then it started not completing the lessons, taking me back to the beginning of that lesson. I couldn't advance to the next level. Then the app flashed a message saying "clear the airlearn cache. app has a bug", then restart. I cleared the cache and restarted the app. No luck! I uninstalled the app and reinstalled it. I just did the same lesson five times without completing it. my virus software has not found any issues with my phone...... it's the app. Fix this please!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we‚Äôre sorry for the inconvenience caused. To help resolve this, please write to us at help@airlearn.com with your registered email ID and the issue details-we‚Äôll take it from there.

scraped_reviews.content: The lessons have many questions that disappear when I have to choose an answer, may it be a word, sentence, or even s picture. I would much prefer to see it on one screen instead of having to scroll up and down to answer the question. ADDITIONALLY, LATELY THE APP HAS NOT BEEN WORKING. TRY AGAIN IS NOT SUFFICIENT AT THE END OF A LESSON... Sincerely, Lea
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, We regret to hear this. Could you please write to us at help@airlearn.com with more details? We‚Äôll be happy to assist you.

title: YouTube
description:
Get the official YouTube app on Android phones and tablets. See what the world is watching -- from the hottest music videos to what‚Äôs popular in gaming, fashion, beauty, news, learning and more. Subscribe to channels you love, create content of your own, share with friends, and watch on any device.

Watch and subscribe 
‚óè Browse personal recommendations on Home
‚óè See the latest from your favorite channels in Subscriptions 
‚óè Look up videos you‚Äôve watched, liked, and saved for later in Library 

Explore different topics, what‚Äôs popular, and on the rise (available in select countries)
‚óè Stay up to date on what‚Äôs popular in music, gaming, beauty, news, learning and more
‚óè See what‚Äôs trending on YouTube and around the world on Explore
‚óè Learn about the coolest Creators, Gamers, and Artists on the Rise (available in select countries)

Connect with the YouTube community
‚óè Keep up with your favorites creators with Posts, Stories, Premieres, and Live streams
‚óè Join the conversation with comments and interact with creators and other community members

Create content from your mobile device
‚óè Create or upload your own videos directly in the app 
‚óè Engage with your audience in real time with live streaming right from the app

Find the experience that fits you and your family (available in select countries)
‚óè Every family has their own approach to online video. Learn about your options: the YouTube Kids app or a new parent supervised experience on YouTube at youtube.com/myfamily

Support creators you love with channel memberships (available in select countries)
‚óè Join channels that offer paid monthly memberships and support their work
‚óè Get access to exclusive perks from the channel & become part of their members community
‚óè Stand out in comments and live chats with a loyalty badge next to your username

Upgrade to YouTube Premium (available in select countries)
‚óè Watch videos uninterrupted by ads, while using other apps, or when the screen is locked
‚óè Save videos for when you really need them ‚Äì like when you‚Äôre on a plane or commuting
‚óè Get access to YouTube Music Premium as part of your benefits

scraped_reviews.content: it's great and has provided me with tons of entertainment, educational stuffs and a bunch of cool info however not even 10 minutes ago, when I was watching YouTube shorts, the channel name, like and dislike buttons the share button and a lot more was just gone and it's seriously bothering me. I'm not sure what happened, but I would love it if someone could try to fix this because i may just end up switching to tiktok if this continues because I'm sick of all the weird little issues.

Much better since I last reviewed. Isnt letting me watch videos but may just be my phone. Overall so much better! Update: yeah no it's definitely not just my phone. Comments were loading fine on shorts (Wanted to quickly see if it was ok again) while the video wasn't. Then the comments kept closing then not loading. I'm still getting notifications from the app and videos on the home screen are loading so it's not a connection thing. At this point its on your end. I just wanna chill and I can't.

YouTube used to be the best place to come and watch videos. can't find one person with a 10 minute video that only has one ad like it used to. back in the day it played an ad at the beginning and end. then it one in the middle. now it's every minute just about. And it keeps subscribing my account to channels I haven't ever heard of before or watched. it's gotten to be very buggy.

Idk if it's just me, but for a year now, YT has been glitching, and it's not my internet. Also, the ads are pretty annoying. Some things are pretty questionable and inappropriate, but mostly okay. Also, if I click on shorts one video pops up, and the rest are all previous ones I've watched. That can be pretty frustrating. Other than that, it's a pretty good app to have.

Recently, the app has started to bug out significantly. I can no longer click the notifications button, or any of the buttons at the bottom (Home, Shorts, Create, Subscriptions, and Account). Whenever I want to switch accounts, I have to go out of my ways to settings. I'm also now forced to upload videos and create posts through YouTube Studio, and I can't even access my notifications at all anymore. Honestly, I'm surprised a good alternative hasn't popped up yet. YouTube, fix your damn app.

I went from getting 1-2 add breaks a video to getting BOMBARDED by ads. The last video I watched was 25-ish minutes long, and I got 12 ADS. On top of that, I've blocked certain ads multiple times and they still show up. YouTube is starting to feel like those web articles that have more ads than content. This needs to be fixed soon, or someone is going to make a better alternative platform. Edit: I've blocked and reported a specific ad multiple times and it still plays every three videos.

I'm having deja vu here. At this point I've been paying for youtube premium since it was an option. Other than making YouTube ad-free my most used feature is definitely the popout player and background play. But the control buttons have stopped working and I can't skip or play/pause without opening the app. UPDATE: Now I can't add anything to my play queue. I get an error when I try. This is another paid feature that is no longer working. Does anyone have a solution for this?

I hope you like videos with your ads. It's like they are trying to outdo the previous annoying ad implementation each time. You get ads on top of chat during livestreams ON TOP of the random ad breaks, you get the same screen covering ad if you pause the video, watching a vid instead? same thing, now ad resets the scrolling, you're getting kicked out of the comment you were reading for time stamps, and since the video probably paused for an ad break, you wasted your time. ID Verification too.

I've always loved YouTube and all of the content available. Lately, though, the number of ads has gotten ridiculous. Especially when I skip and ad, the video starts back up, and then another ad pops up within seconds. I just checked, an ad every eight minutes. When I'm watching an hour+ gameplay video, it's a bit much. Another ad just popped up two minutes after the previous one! Dropped from two to one stars due to this. I'd say every 15 minutes is reasonable, but after two!?! Come on now.

If I could go into more detail, I would. The app used to be great but it just seems to keep breaking every day. A great example is with the comments section, I wouldn't be able to write comments because the keyboard would take 8 minutes to pop up, and then not be responsive for another minute. They just recently fixed a bug that made it impossible to unpause, congrats, you made the app kinda usable.

Videos are great. Content creators get paid. Ads are getting bigger and longer. I accidentally hit the Doordash one constantly, which closes the app. The ads in the middle of the video can be anywhere from 10 seconds to an hour and a half. You're lucky if the SECOND ad of 2 is one you can skip. But now they show 2 ads at 1 one and they're both non-skipable. How much of my life am I wasting watching ads? The YouTube subscription is very expensive. I've been using YouTube since the beginning.

Anytime I take a break from my video or movie to answer a text or something, the video resumes 5-30 minutes prior to where i paused. The app will also restart 80% of the time i accidentally click an ad and try to close it out. If you try watching a movie on youtube, you'll likely spoil a major plot-point by trying to find where you left off And of course, this NEVER happens with ads, only the actual content that users want to see. Terrible app, but unfortunately the only one with a monopoly

I was listening to a great song by Nirvana in my picture in picture while playing games. I go to sleep and try listening to it again in the morning, but when I clicked the square at the bottom of my phone it didn't appear. and I know for a fact that YouTube turned it off because picture in picture doesn't work for videos that aren't songs. also, 60 second ads with no skip button? that's wild. I get ads bring in money, or something, but that's just ridiculous. youtube used to be so great, too...

Since the most recent update, anytime I play music it automatically starts a playlist. This can be annoying especially when listening to full albums. Tried to turn it off but there is literally not a way to do it. I've tried everything that is playlist relatable. I also deleted YT music thinking that was the issue. The only way to fix it was undo the previous update on YouTube.... Update, undoing update doesn't work after all. It forces me to go thru a playlist every time.

The ads are ridiculous, yes you can get premium, but I'm refusing into other underline issues are resolved. The mini player is atrocious and needs completely redone and optimized. Ads that are reported or blocked doesn't do anything, you will still get them. Notifications for subscriptions and other things are malfunctioning and not accurate. Shorts are bombarded on you constantly and hiding them is a 5 min fix. For being around so long, I don't get how you objectively got worse over time.

I'm trying to understand why I can't visually watch any long videos if I play a short when I first get on the app. Especially when shorts are the very first thing I'm shown. And now it's gotten to the point where watching a short might mean I have a black screen and audio-only for full-length videos. I'm tired of closing the app just to watch a regular video. And now I can't scroll through my recs while watching other videos, as if I don't pay for premium ü§®

Ugh, YouTube ads are the worst, seriously. So many are just disturbing or straight-up inappropriate. And don't even get me started on having to wait two weeks to change a username. That's way too long, it's such a hassle. They should really make that easier. I just want to update my channel without jumping through hoops. It's a small thing, but it's annoying. Hopefully, they'll change it someday, always saying bunch of errors and stuff and unbelievable

Every update to YouTube and YouTube music make them worse. Now its almost impossible to navigate while having a minimized window playing in the background. It's like the video stays maximized, but it looks like it is minimized. So when I go to click a different video, the video playing in the background comes back to the front. What's the point of paying if I have to close a video to select a new one, or if I can't add videos to my playlist? Will probably not be renewing if app isn't fixed

The app has been getting progressively worse as time has gone on. Glitches exist where if you click on an ad, which happens frequently b/c they made the tile on the right side of the screen so you can no longer fast forward without risk, and then try to close out of the browser window, it closes the app, sometimes not even registering that you were watching the video in your history. Not to mention comments on videos disappearing without explanation after you post them.

This used to be a great app. But now it's becoming no different than cable. How, well if you haven't noticed the obvious 50 ads you get per video that's on you. What really ticks me off though is that even if youtube doesn't monetized a youtuber their so greedy that you'll still get an ad every 5 minutes or just from clicking on the video and it ending. Like I have never seen a platform so greedy and do everything it can to push it's audience away. Not to mention the lackluster recommendations.

Every time I go into it, the first video will automatically play, and it still does it after updating. Also why are there so many ads now? I pause the video, an ad pops up at the side, I go to the comments, an ad pops up over top them, plus every ad that is in the video. like I can understand having them in the video, but everytime I pause or go to the comments is just annoying.

Have always loved youtube and have been a long time user I believe my current account is from 2013 and i have another from 2011; however, I've noticed the amount of ads almost makes me not want to watch at all. I don't on my xbox or playstation because I get ads that are way too long, way too often, and I cannot skip them. Ridiculous. Be for the people not for the money. I understand it's free, but when the ads are longer than the video I want to watch or I get an ad every five minutes? Wow.

New version of this app has changed the "mini-player". When you minimize the current video, inside of the app, instead of snapping cleanly to the bottom of the screen where the video continues, but does not obstruct access to browsing content, the video now shrinks into a tiny picture-in-picture type box (like the website experience on a PC) but it annoyingly cannot be moved offscreen or out of the way, it's always hovering ON TOP of the stuff your browsing through. It's annoying and intrusive.

I don't know whats going on with youtube lately but all of my videos have the audio lagging behind the visuals and I literally cannot make it stop. Its not just my phone, its also my laptop. I can't get them to sync for more than 5 seconds and its insanely off putting, especially since I watch a lot of youtubers who are on camera speaking. I have no idea whats going on, deleting and redownloading it didn't help and even the browser version isn't working properly.

would give less than a 1 star review if that was an option. RIDICULOUS! sometimes I watch videos that have dozens of ads for an hour of content. I'm not talking about the content creators ads, but youtubes specifically. The goal is to annoy people into purchasing YouTube premium. YouTube used to be awesome, but has turned into a more expensive version of cable TV. üëé

After the most recent update, you can't watch a video on full screen without an ad pop-up every 2-3 minutes on mobile devices. Also, when an ad does play, you'll get 2 pop-ups for the same ad, but you can't close the one that appears on the bottom of the screen. The ads are truly ABSURD now.

Comments are completely broken. Half the comments don't show, often more. You can see the number of comments listed, but if you count the number on recent videos, you might only see 10 when it claims there's 50. Many of my comments get hidden like this, too. And that's when I can comment. Commenting on Shorts is broken rn. Sometimes the reply button is blocked by the phone bar UI at the bottom of the screen. Other times there is literally no button to click to comment.

Playlists now skip every other video, playing only the odd or even videos for whatever reason. Ad frequency, quality, and relevancy have all taken a turn for the worst. Reporting an ad for clearly being against ToS does nothing but creators can still have their livelihoods taken from them at random. Sometimes videos won't save your progress after an ad, sending you back to the point in the video you first got an ad each time you get another.

Ever since the update, I've been having technical difficulties with the mobile app itself... I try to look at the comment section: my phone itself gives me the error: "YouTube isn't working." Watching YouTube shorts: "YouTube isn't working." Want to full screen a video?: "YouTube isn't working." And, what's worse, it'll constantly pop up with that error message every couple of seconds, with YouTube slowing down my phone entirely and most times, working perfectly fine in the background...

Update: Google can't seem to get their ish together. Youtube app skips videos, doesn't play sound sometimes, goes dark on some videos. always an issue. No idea what Google is doing, but the app isn't working right anymore. Constantly freezes the video but the sound is still going and there's no way to fix it. Or it will just show a black screen while the audio runs. Why do I have to wait through 30 seconds of ads only for the videos to not even play. Samsung Galaxy S22

The adds have been increasingly intrusive. Adds every 2 minutes in a 15 minute video really makes it impossible to enjoy the video, especially when the adds are sometimes a minute long without being able to skip. And after this last update both shorts and long form videos are playing frame by frame. This is insane, adds, adds, adds, video doesn't play smoothly in the slightest. At this point I'm going to be looking for a different option to watch videos.

Too many ads that ruin user experience. Back then you could enjoy a good hour long video essay with maybe one or two ads. Now you get ads almost every minute in the video, ruining the immersion. Not to mention the invasive ad that plays after you pause, and then an immediate ad after you unpause the video. And don't forget the rampant inappropriate ads on this platform. Honestly, you're better off watching videos on a different platform, or just go on a browser.

Way too many ads. Back then they were bearable if you didn't have premium like me, but now it's just way too many. If I wanted to watch something with a bunch of ads, I'd watch TV. I can't watch a simple music video without getting 3 ads, a 15 minute video with 12 ads, and an hour long video with 250 ads. God forbid I pause the video to do anything else without getting an ad on the pause screen, and an ad a minute after. As of now this app, and it's website, are essentially nonfunctional.

The player is stuttering trying to play a video every five minutes. Also, it doesn't seem to do a good job managing to play shorts and videos. Often playing a short requires clicking on the short twice. This also often ends up disabling the PIP mode until the app is "force shutdown." Just feels confused as to what it's trying to do. This is on a less than two year old model Samsung Galaxy.

I've been using the YouTube app for years, and for like the last year, weird things have started. It'll act like certain settings are enabled in the app, they are not, and unless I force stop the app, it will not correct itself. Videos randomly stutter and get choppy, it dims the video, will zoom in the video, and that's just the tip of the iceberg. I shouldn't have to force stop the app to get it to work correctly, recognize my settings and just keep it like that. Also the algorithm sucks now

Don't get me started with the ads. It's DISGUSTING how long a 15 minute video takes me to watch now because of ads. Also, with the latest update on my Android device (and now my Apple device too!!!), I can't save a video to multiple playlists at the same time anymore. I have to add a video to one playlist at a time now and it's EXTREMELY frustrating. Please fix this issue. I've reached out and sent feedback numerous times to no avail.

YouTube crashes on me every day. When it occurs, it happens multiple times. I often have to come back later and then it will be fine. Until it decides to crash again. What makes it more frustrating is that we pay for premium! If it were all free, I wouldn't even have a right to complain. But we pay about $25 per month! The least YT can do is make their app work. They keep updating it and changing things that don't need to be changed, which then causes me problems to arise. PLEASE FIX YT!!!!

I pay for Premium and it's a nightmare to try and get videos to download for offline viewing, as I dont always have internet during the day. Forever saying that the videos are waiting to download, and it won't let me even delete the videos and try to start the process again. I have fiber gigabit internet at home and this is where I'm always downloading from. internet speeds are not the issue. please stop breaking your app every time there is an update. Fix functionality over UI tweaks.

It was fine until recently. Now, videos suddenly get dark and stay dark while playing. It happens on different videos by different creators and seems to be at random. However, the comments section and everything else appears as normal fine. It's just the videos that are suddenly getting dimmer and harder to watch, so it is not my phone dimming the entire screen. I turned off ambient mode, but that hasn't resolved anything. Not being able to opt out or close ads also sucks.

It's great!! Sometimes you get videos between the ads. Oh and shorts having links in the actual videos is an amazing reminder that we shouldn't enjoy videos when we can be buying things. In all seriousness, I've loved YouTube for a long time but it is going downhill sadly. I hope they fix it, but it doesn't seem like it. Also some ads are scams or inappropriate but they don't remove them. Edit: Now when you pause a video you get an ad. Greed ruins everything now.

It is redundant, and highly annoying, to show videos based off past videos watched in listings when a keyword search for specific videos is used. If I wanted to watch the other videos, I'd have searched for the keyword for those videos. It's entirely unnecessary to include those videos in searches when they have nothing at all to do with what was searched. I see the trick: Keep people on the app longer. Well, to be absolutely honest, if it annoys me, then it's also annoying thousands of others.

Getting qorse with every update. The constant harassing me to join whatever they call the premium subscription now EVERY TIME I OPEN THE APP wasn't annoying enough. I absolutely love that when I search a video, there's more ads than actual search results now. Absolutely wonderful since I didn't want to watch the videos I searched, I desperately needed more ads. Oh and did I mention that I adore having to sit through a nearly 3 minute ad to watch a 30 second long clip? Fantastic.

Don't bother if you are trying to use it on your phone. It works perfectly fine on the laptop and TV. On phones it loads and plays the advertisement no problem, but freezes on the loading circle on the actual video regardless of using data or wifi. It also fills it's cache to the point of having to be manually cleaned every 30-45 minutes. I just got a 1 hour and 2 minute advertisement, yes I was able to manually skip it but had to stop what I was doing to do it. 1 hour add on a 40 minute video.

This update has ruined the entire YouTube experience. Now if you want to save a video to a playlist, you can only save it to one playlist at a time, and each time you do it takes you all the way back out of the playlist selection. Then you have to restart the entire process for every playlist you want to save the video to. This one change has literally ruined YouTube for me, especially since I use it for learning and research where I'm constantly organizing videos into multiple playlists.

Ads are so frequent that the app itself is an ad. longer songs (5 mins+) play an ad before the song ends. Having to watch an ad before a video and then another right after it starts, and then another soon after and so on is ridiculous. There are also ads that just restart on their own and they won't run out until you skip it. & I refuse to pay 10$ a month for premium. I downloaded Tubi and a free music player, Google is the problem. I cant even delete the app from my phone. Thats ridiculous.

I've been a Youtube premium member for years now, and I'm appalled at how long it takes devs to fix issues on this app. In the past, there was an issue with saving videos to playlists. It was almost a full year before devs addressed and fixed the issue. Nowadays, when I play videos in a playlist, the app will only play every other video, i.e. it skips videos in the playlist. It's frustrating, and it can be a safety hazard because I have to manually select videos in a playlist while driving.

The app keeps getting worse. The UI is unintuitive. There are more and more ads that are longer and unskippable. The newest update brought a glitch which causes videos to be extremely laggy, while the audio is fine. Overall, youtube keeps becomming more and more anti-consumer to try and push their premium subscription service. I wish there was an alternative.

I had premium for several years, so I never noticed the glitchey ads. Now that I'm cutting back and ditched youtube premium, I can tell that the ads are disruptive to the video I'm watching at the time.. it's easy to accidentally click on one or open a new window. It's hard not to notice that their squeezing every dime out of the ad revenue, making a less than enjoyable experience for anyone who isn't paying for premium. the complaints go on and on.

Never once complained, but lately I've been getting Ads that pop up on half of my screen while I'm watching something full screen. These new ones you can't close while watching full screen either. So now I have to get up, go to my device, turn it right side up, click close Ad, and turn it back full screen EVERY SINGLE TIME. Please change this.

i use Youtube frequently, but recently with the playlist function, it will skip over a video we have queued. if I have 5 songs in a playlist, it will play the 1st, 3rd, & 5th, leaving out the 2nd & 4th. this is extremely frustrating as a viewer who likes to watch things in chronological order, because i have to go and find videos I'm not interested in to act as buffers to be skipped over, and I do not want to do that. the quality of YouTube has significantly decreased recently.

title: Yahoo News: Daily News For You
description:
Yahoo News: News that gets you. That means free, unlimited access to the stories and topics that matter most to you. Whether you prefer listening to audio, watching videos or reading articles, we aggregate news from a broad spectrum of premium publishers, so you can keep up with your world through a feed personalized to your interests and preferences. Never miss out on breaking world or national news updates, plus read about entertainment, lifestyle and more.

Yahoo News has been bringing readers the latest headlines and hottest trends from trusted sources for over 20 years. Join the millions of people who get personalized news updates from Yahoo News, and access the following benefits.

Yahoo News Features: 

PERSONALIZATION: Keep up with the news you care about through a personalized feed that adapts to your interests, while helping you stay informed with the most important breaking headlines. Instantly access the stories, topics and publishers that matter most to you, and adjust your preferences at any time to improve your feed and notifications. Block any keywords or specific publishers you don‚Äôt want to hear from, and make your news feed uniquely yours. 

PREMIUM NEWS SOURCES: Yahoo News aggregates content from the best global publishers ‚Äî from CNN and Time to Business Insider, People and Esquire ‚Äî so you can feel confident that you have access to the best, and most comprehensive news providers out there. Get perspectives from a broad range of publishers, and opt into updates from your favorites.

FREE AND UNLIMITED ACCESS: Yahoo News is completely free to use. Access unlimited stories from premium publishers, so you can always stay on top of the topics you care about.

TRENDING VIDEOS: Whether you‚Äôre looking for can‚Äôt-miss shorts or trending video journalism, we aggregate only the highest quality videos, so you can watch and scroll without the noise. 

MORNING AUDIO DIGESTS: Listen to the Morning Briefing, an AI-generated audio digest that allows you to learn about the day‚Äôs most important headlines while you read, get ready, commute or multitask.  

BREAKING NEWS FROM AROUND THE WORLD: Get global breaking news headlines that matter to you, wherever you are. Yahoo News partners with international news organizations like Associated Press, Reuters and The Washington Post, that report on the biggest world stories and current events. You‚Äôll never miss a beat.

REGIONAL NEWS: We‚Äôve partnered with an array of regional publishers like the Miami Herald, Charlotte Observer, NY Post and more, so you can stay on top of politics, news, weather updates and other important events across America.

DIVERSE RANGE OF TOPICS: Yahoo News is proud to aggregate content from a vast range of publishers. In addition to our proprietary Yahoo coverage of News, Entertainment and Lifestyle content, you will also get access to the other topics you love like: celebrity, sports, movies & television, music, technology, health & wellness, parenting, style & beauty, travel, home & garden, autos, shopping, horoscope, science, weather and more.

QUICK AI TAKEAWAYS: AI-generated, scannable, bulleted takeaways for articles make it easy to get the most important elements of a story in an instant. Harnessing the power of AI, users can quickly browse the key points of stories and stay in the know.

scraped_reviews.content: I love the summarize feature onIy on some sites. I like how the recommendations are trainable and if it's like Artifact, it takes a month for good suggestions. the only thing I really hate is the reading streak notifications. It's impossible to silence or disable. It's useless, disturbing, and made me stop using the app. Another annoyance is the articles don't link to the original source which makes saving them to Reader difficult.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, we are sorry to hear about your experience. We would like to assist you with this log in issue. Please contact us on our help page help.yahoo.com through our link "Contact Us". -D.B.

scraped_reviews.content: It seemed to be working fine for three days until the app changed its format to black. My added feeds have once again disappeared. I followed BR's instructions on how to fix it, and it didn't resolve the issue. Help! I'm about done with the Yahoo News app entirely! Everytime the app logs me out, it deletes ALL of my added feeds (like Tech, Opinion, Weather, Celebrity, etc.). It's so frustrating to have to add them back every single time I log back into the app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
I have a couple of troubleshooting steps for you that should resolve this issue:
1. Clear the app‚Äôs cache
2. If you‚Äôre signed in, tap the Settings icon, tap Manage Accounts, then tap Edit, tap Remove
3. Restart your mobile device
4. Lastly, switch the internet connection from WiFi to mobile data. -BR

scraped_reviews.content: Why is it that you folks can't have a story on just one page? Instead, I'm reading a story, and I get to a point and it says NEXT. What's up with that? So I read down to another point and it says NEXT again! Sometimes this goes on for 15 pages! The reason why? Too many adds in your content! Adds equal viruses that can get infected into my devices. So, either drop the adds, or I'll drop you.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Barry. We're always working hard to improve the app! Thank you for your download and review. -RM

scraped_reviews.content: there is a big improvement over stability with the app; however, it'd be nice if several issues were addressed. first, it'd be nice if comments i made wouldn't disappear from the stream several hours after making them. i am able to see my reactions and likes to others comments, but at some point my replies disappear. second, when reviewing comment history, if you click on the comment it sometimes opens. when it does, you cannot navigate beyond that comment. at that point it's useless.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your kind feedback. We are aware of this problem and are currently working on solving it.  Please update your app to the latest version when you see an option.

scraped_reviews.content: can't log in.. I get this message when I try to use Google login or email plus password. {"error":{"localizedMessage":"not found","errorId":"NOT_FOUND","message":"not found"}} Account works fine on the website. I'm not starting a new one. I have uninstalled reinstalled. Cleared cache/data. Same problem. I would like to use the app instead of the website but the app just doesn't work. While I'm at it..your comment section is the main draw on the website. It is terribly glitchy on the website.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! We apologize for the inconvenience this issue has caused. Please contact us using help.yahoo.com or via Facebook in a private message on the Yahoo Customer Care page and let us know some more details regarding the issue you have encountered. We would be glad to help with this. Hope to hear from you soon! -BP

scraped_reviews.content: Every since this new app has come out, it's loading slowly upon launching, even after all the updates it still loads slow when opening. I thought it would get better, but nah not better & i really don't understand why there's a comment feature because every time you comment, your comment is most likely always rejected. Please fix the issues with the app..

Who knew... Been a minute, didn't even know yahoo was still around... But for a News Junkie like me, This is One Nice app, Nice chunks of News with fast links to continue on to more nuggets, and the (in article AI Summary) is very much welcomed. Thanks. Great Job!
New phone, Motorola G Stylus 2025. Android 15. Thought everything would be cool and fast. oopps. My favorite app for news chokes after 2 or 3 articles. escape out and reload. Article is gone.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, please check the latest update in the store ;)

scraped_reviews.content: 2015: When replying to comments, my comments end up under other posts. It's ridiculous and then the app has no way to edit my posts, such as deleting it. I have to wait until I'm on a computer to go into my activity to delete. Fix this and I'll give you a higher rating. *Well here it is 2025 and I cannot make comments at all. I've uninstalled this app and reinstalled it, it's up to date with the updates and still I can't comment. FIX THIS ISSUE!!!*

Yahoo News app is a great app. It's my go-to app for news (5 stars); however, since the last update, I have noticed the app spontaneously closes when scrolling up through the various articles (3 stars). It makes the app unusable. PLEASE FIX ASAP!
If you love boomer comment sections filled with consistent misinformation, sure, have fun! Bonus points for the ultra-strict AI comment moderation on the side.

Exactly what I've been searching for. I put in a few keywords that indicate topics I don't want content for, and it actually worked, those kinds of stories disappeared from my feed! I haven't been able to stomach any news source since Nov 5, 2024. Now I can read the news again. Thank you Yahoo News!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: So glad you're having a good experience! Thanks for the kind words and support. It means a lot to our team.-A.U.

scraped_reviews.content: 0 STARS...Just Downloaded This App Yesterday~And It Was Working Fine...Now It's Rubbish...When I Try To Post A Comment~It Buffers Forever~And When I Get To Reply To Someones Comment I Receive An Error Message Stating: We Are Unable To Post Comment Right Now...What Sort Of Rubbish Is That??????? UNINSTALLED...ZER0 STARS...
This app always freezes and locks up. It's rare that I can use it for long before it stops working. One of the worst apps I have ever used.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! We apologize for the inconvenience this issue has caused. Please contact us using help.yahoo.com or via Facebook in a private message on the Yahoo Customer Care page and let us know some more details regarding the issue you have encountered. We would be glad to help with this. Hope to hear from you soon! -BP

scraped_reviews.content: I don't like the new format because you can't delete messages of that day only. When you choose select it chooses all the messages instead of the most recent.
Same shtuff, different platform... They are real nice at first and then the filters kick in... The App doesn't stay logged in, what's the point?
was working well. Could get news that I wanted on my phone as I don't like to be tied to the TV. But now it's crashing/closing out on me. Not very convenient.

I've found Yahoo Will give you the News, in a Very Limited- Fashoon, A Thumbnail- View, if you would, But it Goes into Signigicant Grater Detail, When you Tap on those Thumbnail- Presentations, Like many other news Sources, BUT. . . With Very Little Bias !

yahoo has been blocking me for months, I have made contact with them, and will not fix it, or tell me why. if yahoo has a problem with any thing, it's with the people working there. who do not like the other side to make comments. they can't handle the truth.
what do you have to do to post????? Every time I try it says unable to post at this time. Another update that is horrible. been 2 months and still unable to post. what gives????.
this app and yahoo as a whole is straight up trash... they didn't get enough people to switch to new email format so now they made it so you have to pay to stay....
Randomly stopped working one day. I can go to the browser site and it works just fine but this will not load anything anymore.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! We apologize for any inconvenience caused. Please reach out to us at help.yahoo.com or via Facebook on the Yahoo Customer Care page with more details of the issue you have encountered. We would love to assist you. Thank you! -BP

scraped_reviews.content: Works well, except when logged out you lose all saved articles. Unfortunately it has a pretty biased news algorithm. When you use the app tools provided to see less of a type of article it does not work very well and seems to still want to show certain political viewpoints. As a result I have been using this app less and less and am looking for an alternative.
worked great. I was a daily user. I achieved the level of sage or something like that. After the last update, the app keeps crashing. Fix it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We apologize for any inconvenience caused and we thank you for notifying us of this issue. We would like to investigate further. Please feel free to share with us more details on: https://yahoo.uservoice.com/. -BP

scraped_reviews.content: While using the cell phone app it would be nice to not have to go into settings-manage accounts- turn off account, then back out of it and log back into account just to post a comment. Gets really old after a while. It's now 7/25/25 and after new update it's doing it again. Have to sign out and sign in just to post a comment. Gets real old quick. How do I give negative stars?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello there! Thank you for the review! We would love to hear more details about this issue via our feedback page: https://yahoo.uservoice.com/. Give us more details about the issue so we can provide the best service possible for our members. -BP

scraped_reviews.content: Good Source of news but the reading level categories are laughable. Made it to Oracle level several times meaning one has read 350 articles. Once there after a few days it will reset to sage level meaning you have not read 350 articles in order to qualify for Oracle level. Just a suggestion remove the leveling if yout system is just going to always revert back. In 50 days plus reading the news everyday one can easily reach Oracle level and stay there. Update. Very laughable levels.
Horrible app, I pay for yahoo but its impossible to respond in comments. I just get a circle spinning like the 90's yahoo!
I have never been able to add comments, have to go on a different browser than the app.

the new update is preventing me from muting users. All my previous muted users are now visible. It's literally the only thing that helps make the comment section tolerable for engaging in discussion. Edit: tried every trouble shoot in the book. I figured out the problem. It will not let me stay signed in. I have to sign out then sign back in every single time. Then I have to do it again after anywhere from 15 minutes to an hour. I'm really getting tired of this. 5 stars if fixed!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello there! Thank you for the review! We would love to hear more details about this issue via our feedback page: https://yahoo.uservoice.com/. Give us more details about the issue so we can provide the best service possible for our members. -BP

scraped_reviews.content: latest update broke For You page nothing loads & what the hell happened with the background not being Black for OLED displays. this Gray background is a deal breaker.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there. Please contact our support team at help.yahoo.com or on Twitter at @YahooCare, they would like to investigate this issue. - RM

scraped_reviews.content: app no longer works since the last update. Just says "something went wrong. try again later" for the last week or longer. ridiculous
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! We apologize for any inconvenience caused. Please reach out to us at help.yahoo.com or via Facebook on the Yahoo Customer Care page with more details of the issue you have encountered. We would love to assist you. Thank you! -BP

scraped_reviews.content: This is the BEST news app out there. Easy to navigate, free, no annoying pop-up ads.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for your kind words! We're thrilled you're enjoying the app. -A.U.

scraped_reviews.content: Too much Trump and politics. I don't mind informative news but most of it is B.S. I'm considering uninstalling Yahoo because of the none news. I tried adding in my interests and I'll be darn if they didn't come up with people I utterly despise. Another totally out of touch news venue.
no local news and opens everything in app instead of default browser

The full app is okay. But the home screen widget doesn't reflect preferences. E.g. sports aren't on my interest list, and I've blocked a number of sports news outlets. But still, half of the widget feed is about sports

With every update they take more and more features and overload it with marketing spam. With the last update they removed the "clear all" spam and"Empty trash". Now you have to personally select those to remove them. What's next Yahoo? Oh yeah they also removed the shortcut on the bottom to go to the various folders.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello there! Thank you for the review! We would love to hear more details about this issue via our feedback page: https://yahoo.uservoice.com/. Give us more details about the issue so we can provide the best service possible for our members. -BP

scraped_reviews.content: Many of you may not know this, but Yahoo was the world's first search engine when the Internet was first developed. (Mosaic was the first popular web browser in 1993.) Having Yahoo News still available is a revelation (in terms of Internet history) and it is actually very useful!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for your kind words! We're thrilled you're enjoying the app. -A.U.

scraped_reviews.content: very easy to use with comprehensive news articles on many catagories of interest.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for your kind words! We're thrilled you're enjoying the app. -A.U.

scraped_reviews.content: Yahoo News is the absolute best. The only thing missing is more local news options. Also, there NEEDS to be an option to block all celebrity news, I don't care about any of that nor do I want to see it
I really appreciate the variety of stories Yahoo provides. It seems to be less left or right leaning, and more middle of the road. Give me the facts. I'll form my own opinions! Thanks Yahoo.
can't sign in No option to sign in through Google like in browser. Username and password doesn't work.
movie reviews are very useful with full descriptions and why and why not to see this movie"
I find myself reading it much more than I thought I would initially. Relevant articles for me.

Yahoo! News is the VERY BEST App out there for News, and possible other News and information!! I would give it 10 Stars üåü if that was possible!! I take my 10 stars üåü back, I would give it 20 or 30 stars üåü !!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: So glad you're having a good experience! Thanks for the kind words and support. It means a lot to our team.-A.U.

scraped_reviews.content: trash! I c others commenting on articles, but I get error messages EVERY TIME I TRY

to me Yahoo news is a great news source it brings you plenty of different and interesting stories from all over the net I appreciate the fantastic work yahoo is doing on Yahoo News keep up the great work.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: So glad you're having a good experience! Thanks for the kind words and support. It means a lot to our team.-A.U.

scraped_reviews.content: I am for some reason not able to make comments every time I tried to make a comment no matter the time of the day month week it says we're not able to make a comment now. Please try later and later they're never able to make a comment either.

Not able to type any comments on any articles they post. The bottom of the screen is blurred where they ask you What Do You Think is blurred and when I tap it to type a comment, it doesn't respond or either the keyboard covers over it.

Generally it's a good app for news however if you tell it fewer stories like this or hide this publisher it completely ignores the request. So if you don't want to see entertainment news you get it anyway even if you told it you DON'T WANT IT.
Unexpected error . Please try again . Unexpected error. Every single time 100% of the time no matter how good the internet is, no matter which phone
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your valuable feedback! We really appreciate hearing from our users. To ensure your feedback reaches the appropriate team, please submit it at feedback.yahoo.com. We appreciate you using Yahoo! - CM

title: Marvel Unlimited
description:
Marvel Unlimited is Marvel‚Äôs premier digital comics subscription service. Gain instant access to over 30,000 digital comics and over 80 years of comic books through the Marvel Unlimited app, or your web browser. Start your 7-day free trial now!

Marvel Unlimited features all of your favorite characters from Marvel movies, TV shows, and video games. Read the comic books that inspired your favorite super heroes and villains on the big screen!

Experience the all-new digital comic format, Marvel‚Äôs Infinity Comics available exclusively on Marvel Unlimited. Featuring in-universe stories from top creators told in visionary vertical format, designed for your device.
Read comics and stories about Spider-Man, Iron Man, Captain America, Captain Marvel, The Avengers, Thor, Hulk, the X-Men, the Guardians of the Galaxy, Star Wars, Doctor Strange, Deadpool, Thanos, Mysterio, Ant-Man, The Wasp, Black Panther, Wolverine, Hawkeye, Wanda Maximoff, Jessica Jones, the Defenders, Luke Cage, Venom, and many more! 

Wondering where to start? Check out endless reading guides curated by Marvel experts to guide you through the last 80 years of the Marvel Universe. Read about comic events that inspired the movies such as the Spider-Verse, Civil War, Thanos and the Infinity Gauntlet, and even Star Wars!
Unlimited downloads allows you to read as many comics as you want offline and on-the-go! Follow your favorite characters, creators and series and get notified when new issues come out! Marvel Unlimited is available on mobile phones, tablets, and anywhere you can access the web.
Key Features:
‚Ä¢ Access over 30,000 Marvel comics at your fingertips
‚Ä¢ Infinity Comics, in-universe stories from top creators designed for your device
‚Ä¢ Endless reading guides
‚Ä¢ Unlimited downloads to read anywhere
‚Ä¢ Personalized comic book recommendations
‚Ä¢ Sync progress across devices
‚Ä¢ New comics and old classics added every week
‚Ä¢ No commitments. Cancel online at any time.

Choose from three different Marvel Unlimited comic subscription plans as follows:

‚Ä¢ Monthly ‚Äì Our most popular plan!
‚Ä¢ Annual ‚Äì Great savings!
‚Ä¢ Annual Plus ‚Äì Get a new, exclusive merchandise kit each year you‚Äôre a member! (US Only)

Helpful Links:

‚Ä¢ Terms of Use: https://disneytermsofuse.com 
‚Ä¢ Privacy Policy: https://disneyprivacycenter.com
‚Ä¢ Subscriber Agreement: https://www.marvel.com/corporate/marvel_unlimited_terms 
‚Ä¢ California Privacy Rights: https://privacy.thewaltdisneycompany.com/en/current-privacy-policy/your-california-privacy-rights 
‚Ä¢ Do Not Sell My Info: https://privacy.thewaltdisneycompany.com/en/dnsmi 

‚Ä¢ Marvel Unlimited: https://www.marvel.com/unlimited
‚Ä¢ Marvel: https://www.marvel.com

Subscription via Google Play

Download the app and sign up to start reading. Your membership will automatically renew each month. You can cancel at any time. Your subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the then-current subscription period. Your payment method associated with your Google Play account will automatically be charged at the same price for renewal, as stated above, within 24 hours prior to the end of the then-current billing period. You can manage your subscription and/or turn off auto-renewal by visiting your Google Play Subscriptions after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication.

Before you download this app, please consider that it may include or support advertising, some of which the Walt Disney Family of Companies may target to your interests. You may choose to control targeted advertising within mobile applications by using your mobile device settings (for example, by re-setting your device's advertising identifier and/or opting out of interest-based ads).
