summary: Discover restaurants, reservations, food delivery, reviews & services near me

scraped_reviews.content: Mobile ordering is convenient, though the app is poorly laid out & requires a lot of navigation. However, if you order ahead and specify a time, they make your order ~15 minutes early, so your warm items are lukewarm at best, cold around the edges. Only good for cold items or items you want to reheat at home. Staff is very helpful when they're not crazy busy.

The app limits your searches. If I wanted to find a specific review, there's no way to guarantee that you can find it. Currently, the search engine within the app is set up to only display the "top" search results. There is zero way to continue looking with the queries provided. When you click the "show more reviews" button, it sends you to a page that cancels the original search made. Even if there IS a way to do this, the app is so poorly formatted that it isn't worth looking anymore

This app sprang to life in the background for about a week. And flew through 4 gb of data in about 4 days. Which is okay if you have an unlimited plan. But if you don't (like me) this program could suddenly decide it wants to track you or something early in the beginning of your billing cycle and completely screw you up for the month. This app is complete garbage and does not give you truly accurate representations of the places you visit. Do not bother with it.

Not a user friendly app. It is a pain trying to save things and to make notes on places, and - in searching to try to find where something is saved - it's so easy to accidentally remove it from bookmarks, and your notes. Map view has also gotten terrible, it won't let you click on different locations unless you zoom in really close. I'm pretty amazed at how awful such a popular app is.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry you're having trouble with the app! If you are continuing to encounter these issues, please let us know by reporting it here so we can assist you further: bit.ly/2fe0miu

scraped_reviews.content: This app , is is so frustrating. I can never find what I I'm looking for. And when I do it takes forever . Usually involving Multiple searches under multiple categories. It doesn't matter if you type in the direct name of the business. It will just pull up a bunch of other random business that have nothing to do with what you're looking for. This app only works sometimes rest of the time as it has an error message that pops up. Finally had enough and uninstalled the app for good!

One day, I opened up my data usage and found that this app somehow used 17GB of data without my knowledge and without me actively using it. I hadn't even opened it in about three years, and it somehow ate enough data to almost put me over my data limit, resulting in an argument with my family and us having to upgrade to an unlimited plan, all because of this piece of garbage. I have no idea what it was doing. Maybe it was a glitch. But this is inexcusable at best. Fix this worthless app NOW.

So many bugs these days.. when i click on the link leading to yelp, it always opens in web mode and keeps telling me to download the app when it's already installed. Also, I have been getting "something funky happened. We are aware of this issue and will be fixed soon" popup often for weeks, yet it hasn't been fixed. Both have been issues for a long time. I'm seriously considering using Google instead with all these bugs.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for taking the time to review Yelp. We're sorry you‚Äôre having trouble with our app. If the issue persists, please let us know by contacting our team directly at feedback+android@yelp.com or reporting it here: https://bit.ly/2fe0miu

scraped_reviews.content: I had a terrible experience, but for specific reasons. I don't appreciate that when someone sends you a yelp link there is ZERO information on the restaurant in the link or shared in the message. As a result, I have to download the yelp app (apparently the links are broken in the browsers??????) just to find out what place they are sending me. Very annoyingly when sharing lists of places.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for taking the time to review Yelp. We're always looking for ways to improve the app, so we appreciate your feedback and we'll be sure to share it with our product team for consideration in the future.

scraped_reviews.content: Horrible experience claimed they are the number 1 review site in the world. I did advertising and they said for every click I would be charged .12 cents. They said my page keeps track of the clicks, according to my page I had 71 clicks after 4 days then they charged my bank account $130.92. If my math is correct it should have been $8.52. I was also supposed to have a $900 dollar credit that is spread out over 6 months which is $150 a month. Now they wont call me back!!!!

Literally FORCES you to download this unecessary app just to "read more" of the second half of ONLY 1 4 line review you'd like to read using a browser. Sounds innocent and petty but not only should any one be FORCED to download an app (especially with overcharged data prices that may effect people). it then takes you to install it, sign in/register and then doesnt always take you back to your article you'd be done reading in more 5 seconds. Allowing this like we do is why our devices have adds.

This app is terrible! It serves a purpose and works 26% of the time but it is riddled with vague errors and random crashes. If you spend too long placing your order, it will just error over and over. You have to close and open the app, order the exact same meals and put in the exact same information and it will process immediately. The delivery notifications are constantly an half hour too late and for whatever reason, the "current location" when you search is never current. Maybe one day...
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for taking the time to review Yelp. We're sorry you‚Äôre having trouble with the app. If the issue persists, please let us know by contacting our team directly at feedback+android@yelp.com or reporting it here: https://bit.ly/2fe0miu

scraped_reviews.content: I only downloaded this app because 'Nowait' was bought out and integrated into the yelp app. I wanted to thank you for killing the single most useful app on my phone. I had hoped making reservations on yelp would be as easy as it was on Nowait (since you merged them), wow was I wrong. Your search algorithms are terrible for making reservations. I don't only want to see places available at a specific time, why is that a required search parameter? Show me what the wait times are!

I can open the app, but when I put in a restaurant or search it will not load! So annoying and frustrating because even on the web on my phone if you want to look at details on a page it forces you to use the app...which doesn't work! It's been like this forever and none if the updates fix it. I tried reaching to have it fixed. No response, UNINSTALLED.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for taking the time to review Yelp. We're sorry you‚Äôre having trouble with the app loading. If the issue persists, please let us know by contacting our team directly at feedback+android@yelp.com or reporting it here: https://bit.ly/2fe0miu

scraped_reviews.content: Trying to do my first check-in was ridiculously hard, and way to many questions/pop-ups before I could post. You cannot edit or delete a check in if you misspelled or check in to the wrong location. I have to complete 10 Yelp check ins for a weight loss challenge that I am doing, so if I want to check in later, I can't when I'm "too far," so hopefully I don't forget to do it when I'm closer!!! üò°
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Cheyenne, 

Thanks for your review‚Äîwe appreciate your feedback. We'll forward your note about adding the ability to edit or delete a Check-In to our product team so that they can take your suggestion into consideration. That said, if you would like to remove a Check-In, please let us know by contacting feedback+android@yelp.com.

scraped_reviews.content: I downloaded this app a few days ago, I have tried not one but two different email addresses due to it keeps saying "an error occurred, please try again later " or "this email is already in use" (the last one was after they wanted me to identify my gender). It has been over a week just to make an account! Such a waste! Please fix the problem!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for taking the time to review Yelp. We're sorry you‚Äôre having trouble with the app. If the issue persists, please let us know by contacting our team directly at feedback+android@yelp.com or reporting it here: https://bit.ly/2fe0miu

scraped_reviews.content: The app and website need more ways to sort photos, such as by date and popularity. I suggest putting the newest ones first by default (at least after an approval process), to give them a fair chance. I also think photos should be split into pages if there are too many in a section, instead of having an infinite scroll.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're always looking for new ways to improve, so we value the feedback that you've shared with us. We'll forward this to the appropriate team so that they can take your suggestion into consideration. Thank you for helping to make Yelp better for everyone.

scraped_reviews.content: When viewing collections on map view, it will only display 30 listings even if the collection has more than 30 listings. So if I have a collection of 100 places I want to check out, and I want to see which ones are near me, I can't do that, because it only displays 30 of the 100, and doesn't show all the ones that are near me.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry you're having trouble with the app! If you are continuing to encounter these issues, please let us know by reporting it here so we can assist you further: bit.ly/2fe0miu

scraped_reviews.content: I agree with many negative reviews already posted here. The app uses lots of data, collects too much user info, and diminishes customers' reviews via sending them into the "not recommended" bin. When I try to search for something outside my hometown, searches jump from one location to another. Projects receive responses from providers who say "we don't do this kind of work". In sum, the app is no good.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for taking the time to review the Yelp app. You can reach our team directly here for assistance with any questions, comments, or concerns: https://bit.ly/3mOxzpv

scraped_reviews.content: I loved this place! I went recently and ran into something I didn't like. They changed so many things! First, they removed the TVs. Second, they put in a computer for ordering. Third, the waiter only came by once, and it was just to bring us our drinks, period! After that, we never saw him again. I don't think this change is good at all Ordering yourself is the only thing missing‚Äîyou practically had to get your own food! I'm not going back to that place. I have to find a new one. I go out to üòè

Show addresses please. When I see an interesting entry, I of course immediately want to know the location. The address is often all I need to know, but entries never show the address. Duh! So I have to navigate to the business info only to see a map that is zoomed in so tight I still can't determine the general location, do then I have to zoom out. This is just to much effort even in viewing a number of entries. I'll just use a more user friendly app such as Google Maps.

This experience was horrible, we attempted to order and were shocked to see the amount. And also the self added gratuity over $60. I've never heard of a tip for orders for take out. Manager/owner was rude and snatched receipt from me. I took a picture of receipt beforehand. Do not recommend this place to anyone.

Its own algorithm is biased against its own algorithm...... and your reviews only count if you are continually using the app. So if you are new and decide to use Yelp and you find a restaurant/business and everything tastes or goes well and you leave a review, it won't count. because you are new and haven't been "with/using" the app long enough, and that's according to its own algorithm.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your review. Our automated software evaluates every review based on hundreds of signals of quality, reliability, and user activity on Yelp. The reviews it identifies as the most helpful and reliable are recommended. To learn more about our software, please visit: https://bit.ly/2WszNl1

scraped_reviews.content: The new update is useless for me. When I click on restaurants...they show in a list as before but there is no address without clicking on it...very unfriendly when looking for places near you. It says the neighborhood it is in...but here in Phoenix there are 1000+ neighborhoods and no one knows them or where they are. When I travel, I familiarize myself with maps to know general streets and areas...but not neighborhood names. Please give setting to change or reupdate to show addresses!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're always looking for new ways to improve, so we value the feedback that you've shared with us. We'll forward this to the appropriate team so that they can take your suggestion into consideration. Thank you for helping to make Yelp better for everyone.

scraped_reviews.content: Since you offer no way to report a bug through the app support center, a review appears to be the option. Currently when I search for a current location restaurant and click the number bubble, the images displayed on the pop up do not match the restaurant I am viewing. Then if I select the restaurant and view its profile, the images are correct.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry you're having trouble with the app! If you are continuing to encounter these issues, please let us know by reporting it here so we can assist you further: bit.ly/2fe0miu

scraped_reviews.content: they deliberately make the mobile internet experience terrible so you'll download their terrible app. I wish I could remove yelp results from my searches since it's a terrible site and company. Edit: the user experience is "better" on the app only because you deliberately make it worse on mobile. I can view the first couple images on the website, then I'm forced to download the app. The first couple images looked fine to me. No reason to download an app. I have downloaded the app, and it sucks.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for taking the time to share your feedback. We encourage users to download the app because we believe the user experience is improved on the app. We hope you‚Äôll give it a try!

scraped_reviews.content: To be a perfect app but the ratings are a little less accurate than they used to be. Still one of the best Business rating sites out there. edit 10/12/25 Yelp needs to REMOVE the multi-send on service requests. You have to uncheck a box to NOT have it sent to multiple vendors. This is extraordinarily irritating. There is no way to cancel the requests once they've been sent. Now I am going to get bombed by multiple vendors that I did not want to contact and no way to cancel the requests.

We ordered the siomai and a bowl. The food came out quickly, but the quality was disappointing. The siomai were hard and really small for the price, and everything was overly salty. We understand airport pricing is usually high, but this just wasn‚Äôt worth it. Another downside: when it was time to pay, an 18% tip was already added automatically with no option to change it. Fast service and a convenient location aren‚Äôt enough to make up for the quality and pricing.

Pros The food is delicious and Korean BBQ is so much fun! Staff was fantastic! I been to Korean BbQ several times in different states, all different chains Cons This chain does not offer as many menu items. They also forgot 3 items( ordered) leading to re ordering and potentially double orders. After eating and waiting for the next items, you tend to get full and possibly stuck with the extra food charges. It's best to order and cook the food up front rather than waiting to reorder IMHO.

Not the best service. I brought in my Polaris for a 400 hour service (fluids, filters and a rubber boot repaired. The estimate was about $650. When I went to pick it up the total was over $900. Now, I understand if there are extra costs or whatever. But, when I got it home, I realized they didn't even grease any of the zerk fittings....Really, what kind of service is that???!!!???!!!

2 recent problems in 2025 1) My last 3 check ins are not showing up in "My Activity" and no one can react to them. 2) The "Add picture/video" option won't let you instantly open the camera app and snap a pic. It only allows you to add a picture previously taken from your gallery. Very annoying! Please fix ASAP!

This review is for Yelp's android phone app. 1. I tried to use the map view in my collections, but only 4 out of 30 showed. It's quite annoying because I want to see what saved restaurants are around my location. 2. Please correct the sort function. Whenever I sort the reviews and click on "More Reviews" as I read on, it always jump back to "Yelp Sort".
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry you're having trouble with the app! If you are continuing to encounter these issues, please let us know by reporting it here so we can assist you further: bit.ly/2fe0miu

scraped_reviews.content: If I cOuLd GiVe It ZeRo StArS i WoUlD. Here's the thing: if not all yelp links work in the mobile app, then I shouldn't be nagged into using the mobile app. Top 10 pages that show up in Google searches will force you into the app, but the app does nothing in response.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for taking the time to review the Yelp app. You can reach our team directly here for assistance with any questions, comments, or concerns: https://bit.ly/3mOxzpv

scraped_reviews.content: This app perpetually looks and feels like it's just been sent to beta testing. I mean it's been that way for many years! The worst issue is that in the feed I still have the old Useful Funny Cool buttons, but if you click through to the review it has the newer buttons. If you click Cool on the feed this janky app applies it to the "Oh No" button! This has needed fixing for years. Then don't get me started on all the "something went wrong" screens with a dinosaur cartoon popping up for no reason.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry you're having trouble with the app! If you are continuing to encounter these issues, please let us know by reporting it here so we can assist you further: bit.ly/2fe0miu

scraped_reviews.content: Not happy with service.Felt taken advantage of. Friend introduced me here and food was very good but when the counter help asked me if I wanted something to drink, I said "just water". I didn't authorize to be billed for a bottled water and felt like they were just pulling a fast one. Not a pleasant experience. Won't be back nor will I recommend to others. God bless

If I could give zero stars I would. I went in for a perm expecting to pay $350 max, including tip and tax. And asked for very loose big curls. They even showed me a picture. Then they told me the price is $480. I mentioned this is misleading from what they posted online. They kept insisting I get a haircut, I said no, so they reduced the price to $420. they over charged and under-delivered by a long shot. cheers to their business going under. please comment so others aren't fooled

I had seen this restaurant on IG and wanted to try it. We sat outside and we were given a small menu and glass list with a few bottles by a less than enthusiastic waiter. A table got a huge menu and much bigger wine list. I asked to see to compare menus. The wine we got was less $$. I politely asked owner to explain & he got defensive saying I should've known to ask for the big menu and that the price of the bottle hadn't been updated. Caught lying, but he gave us the lower price. Food average.

I had a very disappointing experience with this app. The amount of ads is overwhelming and makes it nearly unusable. It's frustrating and not worth the time. I've uninstalled it and won't be installing it again. I also wouldn't recommend it to others unless the ads situation improves significantly.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're always looking for new ways to improve, so we value the feedback that you've shared with us. We'll forward this to the appropriate team so that they can take your suggestion into consideration. Thank you for helping to make Yelp better for everyone.

scraped_reviews.content: Sometimes between shifts I don't have much time to get my early dinner. Moderns is the perfect place to go. The Hawaiian sandwich became my favorite right away, although the chicken one was taaasty! The mocha? Perfection. Chocolaty but not too sweet. Same for their fruity aguas frescas. They happen to be the new owners and they are super sweet!

Stretch Lab Ft. Wright. Dishonest Business! They charged my debit card twice for $322.24 each time. I only visited them once and paid for that visit. I thought I was only buying 4 more visits. I don't remember signing any membership forms. I called to asked them to return the two charges and they refused. They said I signed a membership. I would recommend not doing business with this company. They will steal your money!

Really frustrating UI. The location keeps getting reset while I'm using it. Searches don't return the results I expect. Sponsored businesses are pushed too hard. Sorting gets ignored when you click to view more reviews so the sort only works on 5 reviews then it reverts back to "Yelp Sort" whatever that is.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry you're having trouble with the app! If you are continuing to encounter these issues, please let us know by reporting it here so we can assist you further: bit.ly/2fe0miu

scraped_reviews.content: The search functions were working terribly. I searched for 'BBQ restaurants' and the #1 thing that showed up was a dessert only place. I tried to go to customer support to report it there so they could optimize it but they designed it to make it extremely difficult to report issues, so now they get a 1 star rating for both aspects of the app/user experience.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for taking the time to review the Yelp app. You can reach our team directly here for assistance with any questions, comments, or concerns: https://bit.ly/3mOxzpv

scraped_reviews.content: I get kicked out of the app a lot. I want to be able to comment on pictures. It does not have this feature and it won't let you edit your review if it's old. Freezes up when posting pics too, will not show Elite events when needed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry you're having trouble with the app! If you are continuing to encounter these issues, please let us know by reporting it here so we can assist you further: bit.ly/2fe0miu

scraped_reviews.content: First time ever here and it will take a lot for me to return, and not to this location Over 45 minutes for a bacon cheeseburger when they were dead is not good. Staff actively ignores you! I was seated for 10 minutes with 2 to 3 servers looking at me before one came over and took my order. I had been told how good this chain was by friends that live elsewhere. I hope their idea of good was better than my experience. Bacon was greasy, fries were barely warm, burger was warm but not hot. 2/10

good app for checking out how good a place is and seeing how others have rated it. used to be a good app for rating it yourself, 5 star even. I'd recommend it to friends because your own rating showed on top to you, so you'd be quickly be reminded of what you thought of a restaurant. but latest updates of the app have been lowering my rating so that i have to dig to find it. personally, I use the app to find my own feeling on a restaurant, can go to Google to see other people's ratings.
Usually this is a great app for exploring nearby restaurants and other businesses. This week though, it crashes every time I view a restaurant and scroll down. it is unusable
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry you're having trouble with the app! If you are continuing to encounter these issues, please let us know by reporting it here so we can assist you further: bit.ly/2fe0miu

scraped_reviews.content: I save collections on the website but I am unable to see them on the app 90% of the time. The places I save never want to load on the map view or even in the list view. So when I actually want to use this app, it's useless.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry you're having trouble with the app! If you are continuing to encounter these issues, please let us know by reporting it here so we can assist you further: bit.ly/2fe0miu

scraped_reviews.content: Bookmark handling is abysmal. No way to search bookmarks. Can't even sort by reverse alphabetical order. Have to scroll through 5-10 bookmarks at a time, which takes ages. Looking at a bookmarked listing doesn't show notes‚Äîhave to scroll through all your bookmarked places just to see or edit notes. Can't update map view bookmarks based on the visible map, so it never shows everything you've saved in the area you're zoomed in on. Same problems for many years.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're always looking for new ways to improve, so we value the feedback that you've shared with us. We'll forward this to the appropriate team so that they can take your suggestion into consideration. Thank you for helping to make Yelp better for everyone.

scraped_reviews.content: We pass this place number of time, Finally we decided to dropping in. As we go through the menu, I decided take chefs recommendation three courses menu. The starter was Norwegian smoke Whale serve with bery sour cream, souce. I choose pork knuckle as the main menu, really incredible huge size around 500gr portions. The skin was crispy. The dessert. It was the mousse with espresso topped with bacon and crumble. Overall, it was the greatest eating experience in Oslo. Very interesting.

The last update does not allow friends to see checkins. When I go to 'my activity', all the places I checked in at are missing since last Wednesday. Let's get updates right and stop making changes when it ain't broke!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry you're having trouble with the app! If you are continuing to encounter these issues, please let us know by reporting it here so we can assist you further: bit.ly/2fe0miu

scraped_reviews.content: This bank will rob you of your entire check in irreversible courtesy fees when they hold all but $275.00 for 3 to 5 days because you use the atm. When you go over the 275.00 in transactions, they will charge you a 30.00 courtesy fee per transaction no matter how small the transaction is. This bank doesn't want to help you more than once infact they make notations about you, so when you call for help, they can say they have helped you before as a reason to not help you again.

title: WeComics TH: Webtoon
description:
WeComics TH, Thai comic reading platform with thousands of charming COPYRIGHTED COMICS, from Korea, China, Japan, and Thailand, creating a community with over millions downloads. Get ready to be amazed by the preferable comics that match your style. Enjoy the activities, promotions, and popular comics adapted from novels and series. 
 
„ÄêHighlight of WeComics TH„Äë
 
‚óÜ Read comics for free with stars!
Log-in daily and get free stars to unlock comic chapters or exchange your STARS for other prizes such as discount coupons, profile frames, or free passes (the number of comic chapters that can be unlocked by stars are determined by the comic license owners).
 
‚óÜ Wide range of diverse genres and popular comics!
We gather popular comics with various genres here for you from romantic comedy to adventurous fantasy, period time traveling, horror fiction, or even mesmerizing boy‚Äôs love. Plus comic adaptations from novels and have TV series versions.
 
„ÄêExclusive Comics You CANNOT MISS!„Äë
„ÉªKing‚Äôs Maker
„ÉªRebirth of the Urban Immortal Cultivator
„ÉªWhat It Takes To Be a Villainess
„ÉªBoss in School
„ÉªThe Cakeverse
„ÉªENNEAD 
„ÉªHow To Be a Princess
„ÉªAnother Emperor Reborn
„ÉªThe Demonic Contract
„ÉªPrincess of Limited Time
„ÉªWhose Baby Is It?  
„ÉªMy Wife is a Demon Queen
 
„ÄêPopular Adapted Comics FROM NOVELS Are Here!„Äë
„ÉªI Shall Master This Family
„ÉªThe Reason Why Leriana Ended Up In Duke's Mansion
„ÉªThe Silent Concubine
„ÉªThe Grandmaster Of Demonic Cultivation  
„ÉªMesmerizing Ghost Doctor
„ÉªThe Servant Is the Demon King?!
„ÉªTo Be Or Not To Be
„ÉªBe A Eunuch's Wife To Control The World
„ÉªLife Going Wild With Plug-Ins
„ÉªCEO Quan, Your Wife Is Getting Away!
„ÉªThe Ultimate Scheming System
„ÉªSpare Me, Great Lord!
 
„ÄêHot Comics Adapted to DRAMA SERIES!„Äë
„ÉªThe Untamed
„ÉªPsychic Princess
„ÉªShark 
„ÉªDOKGO
„ÉªA Chance To Cherish
 
‚óÜ Enjoy and have fun anywhere!
Allow you to enter and experience the imaginary world with you everywhere with our comics. 
Smooth scrolling with HD graphics in webcomic format. No need to zoom in and out.
 
‚óÜ New daily updates with customized notifications!
Publish new comic chapters every day. Just add your favorite titles to your bookshelf. Set-up notifications and never miss new updates and special activities!
 
‚óÜ Recommended comics you may like!
Don‚Äôt know what to read? No worries! Let us know your comic genre preference, and discover comics you‚Äôll love in ‚ÄúFOR YOU‚Äù page.
 
‚óÜ Community in your area!
Hang out with friends who share the same interests by commenting or giving the thumb up on the reading page and profile page.
 
‚óÜ  Many promotions and activities!
Get special prizes every day by participating in activities such as daily check-in, wheel of fortune, watch video ads, and missions. Get benefits / bonus from unlocking comics and discount promotion.
 
‚óÜ A UGC (user generated content) platform for every arty dream!
If you are the one who dreams to be a comic writer, our platform is always welcome! Easily publish your work on WeComics TH and get the opportunity to make income. (Contact our team via comics@wecomics.in.th for more information.)
 
„ÄêContact and Follow us via„Äë
Email: cs@wecomics.in.th
Website: www.wecomics.in.th
Facebook: facebook.com/WeComicsTH
Instagram: instagram.com/WeComics
Twitter: twitter.com/WeComicsTH
YouTube: youtube.com/WeComicsTH
 
„ÄêRecommended Mobile OS version„Äë
OS version 5 or later (android)
 
If you find any problems do not hesitate to contact us in application via Menu Me >> Setting >> Contact team (Facebook Messenger), send us a message on Facebook Page: WeComicsTH, or send an email via cs@wecomics.in.th We will contact you back within 24 hours.

title: Lark Player:Music Player & MP3
description: Lark Player is a stylish and free offline music player and video player for Android, it supports to play all major formats of offline music and videos. This free music player has a powerful equalizer, lyrics and the best user interface. It also supports file management on the device, such as deleting files, creating music playlists. Currently, more than 100 million users worldwide use Lark Player to play music offline. Customize Your Music Experience The music player with the preset modes and powerful equalizers, you can easily personalize the sound effects when you play music offline There are dedicated modes for Normal, Classical, Dance, Flat, Folk, Heavy Metal, Hip-hop, Jazz, Pop, Rock in this offline mp3 player. üéß Audio Player and Video Player Support to All popular formats Not only an MP3 player, it supported audio formats including: MP3, MIDI, WAV, FLAC, AC3, AAC, M4A, ACC ,etc.üé∂ Not only an audio player, it is also a video player. With this media player you can play video that formats of MP4, 3GP, WEBM, MOV, MKV, etc. Easily Manage Your Files You can browse your offline music by song, artist, album, genre, and more with this free offline music player. It also supports to create and manage music playlists. Music Lyrics Support to match lyrics with offline songs from your phone, so you can enjoy your favorite music and lyrics with the music player. üé§ Floating Video and Music Player You can easily multi-task by adjusting the size and position of floating window in the media player. In this way, you can do other things while listening to any song or watching a video. üòç More Free Features:üòç üåü Powerful equalizers, give you the best sound effects with bass enhancement, reverb setting, sound field adjustment, etc. üåü Offline music player, songs player, audio player, mp3 player with high quality music experience. üåü Audio player support audio formats like MP3, MIDI, WAV, FLAC, AC3, AAC, M4A, ACC ,etc. üåü Video player support to video formats like MP4, 3GP, MKV, etc. üåü The beautiful day/night theme can be switched at will in the music app. üåü Set your favorite local music as ringtone in offline music player without wifi üåü Play song in shuffle, order or loop with the MP3 player. üåü Set a sleep timer and the music app will automatically close after you fall asleep üåü Play music in background and notification bar with the MP3 player üåü Browse and play music by albums, artists, music playlists, genres, folders etc üåü Lyric support, match lyrics with offline music so that you can enjoy music with lyrics üåü Share your mp3 music via Bluetooth, Facebook, Whatsapp, etc. üåü mp3 converter, support to convert video to mp3 If you have any audio files or video files, just play it with Lark Player Note: Lark Player is an offline music player and offline video player. It‚Äôs not a music downloader and it doesn't support music download üíó Follow our social media to get more music informationÔºö Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/larkplayerofficial Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/larkplayerbrasil/ Hope you enjoy music and have a good time at Lark Player! If you have any suggestions or face any problem while using the app, please send your feedback to üíå larkplayer@larkplayer.com
descriptionHTML:
Lark Player is a stylish and free offline music player and video player for Android, it supports to play all major formats of offline music and videos. This free music player has a powerful equalizer, lyrics and the best user interface. It also supports file management on the device, such as deleting files, creating music playlists. Currently, more than 100 million users worldwide use Lark Player to play music offline.

Customize Your Music Experience
The music player with the preset modes and powerful equalizers, you can easily personalize the sound effects when you play music offline
There are dedicated modes for Normal, Classical, Dance, Flat, Folk, Heavy Metal, Hip-hop, Jazz, Pop, Rock in this offline mp3 player. üéß

Audio Player and Video Player Support to All popular formats
Not only an MP3 player, it supported audio formats including: MP3, MIDI, WAV, FLAC, AC3, AAC, M4A, ACC ,etc.üé∂
Not only an audio player, it is also a video player. With this media player you can play video that formats of MP4, 3GP, WEBM, MOV, MKV, etc.

Easily Manage Your Files
You can browse your offline music by song, artist, album, genre, and more with this free offline music player. It also supports to create and manage music playlists.

Music Lyrics
Support to match lyrics with offline songs from your phone, so you can enjoy your favorite music and lyrics with the music player. üé§

Floating Video and Music Player
You can easily multi-task by adjusting the size and position of floating window in the media player. In this way, you can do other things while listening to any song or watching a video.

üòç More Free Features:üòç
üåü Powerful equalizers, give you the best sound effects with bass enhancement, reverb setting, sound field adjustment, etc.
üåü Offline music player, songs player, audio player, mp3 player with high quality music experience.
üåü Audio player support audio formats like MP3, MIDI, WAV, FLAC, AC3, AAC, M4A, ACC ,etc.
üåü Video player support to video formats like MP4, 3GP, MKV, etc.
üåü The beautiful day/night theme can be switched at will in the music app.
üåü Set your favorite local music as ringtone in offline music player without wifi
üåü Play song in shuffle, order or loop with the MP3 player.
üåü Set a sleep timer and the music app will automatically close after you fall asleep
üåü Play music in background and notification bar with the MP3 player
üåü Browse and play music by albums, artists, music playlists, genres, folders etc

üåü Share your mp3 music via Bluetooth, Facebook, Whatsapp, etc.
üåü mp3 converter, support to convert video to mp3

If you have any audio files or video files, just play it with Lark Player

scraped_reviews.content: This app is really good. The way the album artwork disappears to display a silent ad for a second and then reappears is worth mentioning. It's so clean, much better than if the ad was superimposed on the artwork. When you added the feature to change album artwork I was elated. I hate to have that space blank. You also made it easier to minimize the now playing screen. There isn't much more to ask for besides crossfade; the lyrics are never correct and the share and lyrics button are ugly.

It speeds up randomly which is really frustrating since I want to listen to it on loop and cannot enjoy it because, as previously mentioned, it has an inconsistent speed. I am using the latest version, so I hope one that fixes this issue comes out soon.

one of greatest music player for me cause , here lyrics and edit music , literally I like very much this app , edited:- whenever I listinging to song while editing video in vn or others , after a few minutes song stop automatically ,even while playing free fire after 2 ,3 songs then stop ‚òπÔ∏è‚òπÔ∏èany solutions üôèi hope you reply my review !

If the issue persists, please reach out to us via Feedback in the app. We're here to help!

title: Argo - #1 Boat Navigation App
description:
Get Out on the Water with Argo ‚Äì Your Ultimate Boating Sidekick

Whether you‚Äôre exploring new waters, cruising with friends, or chasing sunsets, you deserve a smarter, simpler way to navigate. That‚Äôs where Argo comes in.

Argo is the all-in-one boating app that helps you plan trips, stay safe, and connect with fellow boaters. Think of Argo like the buddy who always knows the best spots, keeps you out of trouble, and never asks for gas money.

Why Argo?
Let‚Äôs be honest: marine software is either clunky, confusing, or so expensive you feel like you‚Äôre buying the boat all over again. Not Argo.

üó∫ Effortless Navigation
Ditch clunky chartplotters and confusing apps. Plot routes directly on Argo‚Äôs interactive charts with just a few taps.

üìç Explore with Confidence
Hidden coves, waterfront restaurants, or the nearest fuel dock? Argo‚Äôs interactive map has it all‚Äîplus reviews and tips from other boaters.

üí¨ Stay Connected
Share adventures, swap tips, and see where friends are cruising. With Argo, the water feels a little smaller‚Äîand a lot more fun.

If you‚Äôre still reading this, you‚Äôre already late to the party. Download Argo now and thank us later.

What‚Äôs Included with Argo:

- Unlimited Charts: Access charts for the U.S., including inland lakes and rivers. Sourced from NOAA, Army Corps of Engineers, and local providers.
- Interactive Maps: Find marinas, anchorages, boat ramps, restaurants, and more.
- Captain‚Äôs Log: Plan, save, and relive your trips with detailed logs and memories.
- Real-Time Local Knowledge: Crowdsourced hazard reports, reviews, and insider tips from boaters like you.
- Social Features: See where friends are cruising, share photos, and message for meet-ups.
And yes, all of that is really free.

Go Beyond Free with Argo Premium
Go beyond the basics with tools that make boating easier, safer, and more enjoyable.

- Smart Autorouting: Auto-route around hazards and shallow waters, tailored to your boat‚Äôs draft.
- Offline Charts: Navigate confidently, even when you‚Äôre off the grid.
- 7-Day Weather Forecasts: Stay ahead with tides, wind, and conditions for smarter trip planning.
- Custom Depth Shading: Visualize the safest waters for your boat.
- Synch with Your Chartplotter: Import and export GPX files.
- Multi-Vessel Support: Easily manage routes and logs for all your boats.
It‚Äôs like upgrading from a dinghy to a yacht.

Your Adventure Starts Here
Ready to navigate smarter, explore farther, and connect better? Download Argo today and see why thousands of boaters have already made the switch.
Download Argo for free. Start your next adventure.

Follow Us:
Instagram, Facebook, Twitter: @argonavigation
Learn more at www.argonav.io

Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
Privacy Policy: https://www.argonav.io/privacy/
