Why You‚Äôll Love Triple Tile
FIND YOUR ZEN ‚Äì Tap, match, and relax with calming puzzle games that delight both the eyes and the mind. With our stunning visuals, every match game feels like a work of art.
TRAIN YOUR BRAIN ‚Äì Every level is a clever tile match puzzle designed to challenge. Sharpen your skills as you rise to triple match mastery.
EXPLORE BEAUTIFUL WORLDS ‚Äì Track your tile game progress on a vibrant map and unlock stunning new destinations. From tranquil beaches to lush forests, every chapter brings a fresh backdrop to your matching games journey.
NEVER RUN OUT OF TILE GAME FUN ‚Äì With thousands of match 3 levels and regular updates, Triple Tile keeps your tile match skills sharp with new puzzles every week.

How to Play
Clear the board by completing a triple match ‚Äì just find and combine three identical tiles. Sounds simple? Wait until you see the clever twists, layered challenges, and surprising layouts that make this one of the most addictive puzzle games out there.

Triple Tile is the perfect tile game to enjoy anytime, anywhere ‚Äì even without an internet connection. Play offline and keep the fun going whether you‚Äôre traveling, commuting, or just relaxing at home with your favorite tile game.

Triple Tile is perfect to unwind, sharpen your mind, and immerse yourself in a satisfying match game experience. Triple Tile offers a tile game experience that‚Äôs easy to pick up yet endlessly rewarding. Every tile game level will keep you challenged, engaged, and coming back for more

Download Triple Tile today and see why so many tile match puzzle fans can‚Äôt put it down. It‚Äôs time to tap, match, and master your way to the top
summary: Fun 3 Tile Brain Puzzles - Train your Brain with Tile Matching Mahjong Puzzles

scraped_reviews.content: Early in this game, it's a little buggy but not horrible. Later in the game, it hangs up CONSTANTLY, not giving you credit if after you've complete the game and it hangs up or making you restart over and over. The graphics are great. If you leave the game, you come back to a new game--don't have to figure out where you left off. They will not fix their bugs and I let them know multiple times about the problem. I deleted game!

Overall the game is very nice, easy-to-follow interface and cute graphics. However, the ads make it hardly usable. I could understand some ads for perks, like additional slot or reverting a move, but they are put after every single interaction. You are prompted to ads even upon successfully completing the level, which is ridiculous. I would not support this game.

I've been playing this game for months. I really like it. when I'm stuck, I watch an ad and use an item provided. but.... now I'm up to 1,900 and every other time I beat a level the game freezes. not giving me the credit, not progressing to the next level. I have to play a level several times before moving on to the next. very annoying. its getting to the point i cant play. after all this progress, I'll have to uninstall. sucks

WAY too many ads. It's ridiculous there isn't a way to pay to get rid of ads. The game listing in here says there's in-qpp purchases, which usually means you can pay to get rid of ads, but I can't find anything in the game that even costs any money. It sucks because the game is super fun, but the developers' greediness ruins it. I would absolutely pay for an ad free experience. Now they're missing out on money made off of me because if I stop playing, there's no ad revenue from me anymore.

The game is a VERY glitchy. It sometimes freezes up during the ads, and you don't get credit for watching, or the level up doesn't go through. This is a more recent development as it didn't occur during the first 250 levels. Very frustrating! I keep hoping someone will address these issues. But no one seems to even notice my complaints. When my challenge is done with Cointiply, so is this game.

This game and another game they own called blossom match do not work well.The ads won't play most of the time and it forces you to play a level repeatedly. I downloaded these apps thru the Daily Gift platform in which you have to complete certain levels within a specified time. For example, I have 8 days left to complete level 1,000 in Blossom Match and I'm currently stuck on level 345.I've reached out to their customer service but I'm not getting any resolutions...if fixed I'll update w/ more *

It keeps crashing and glitching out, it used to work better ------------- **update 6/23/25: it is now freezing at the end of each game that has been won and it won't advance. I can't refresh screen or anything. cache has been cleaned out, app up to date. I can't do the glitchy freezing up & then have to replay the same level over & over **update 6/27/25: it is freezing up after every win and doesn't count the win. what is going on?!! **9/18/25: tried again, ditto- 3 games froze in a row, sucks

I like that you have basically unlimited lives. I also like that so far, I'm not being pushed to buy things with real money. I do wish they would offer some instructions, if there is something special about a level. For example, I did not realize that I was supposed to be collecting certain tiles to gain prizes. I thought I had to let them break down in order to tap on the tile.

Started out really liking this particular triple tile game. But now, at level 81, I can't justify having to sit through a half dozen ads in order to make it through one level. Each level starts EASY, each set of three tiles grouped or close together. But get past that first couple of layers, and it's suddenly impossible to find sets of three without using boosters (or cheats). I did literally sit through the same (for the most part) obnoxiously long ad at least six times. Not anymore.

I love the have itself as it is challenging without being stressful. BUT, be ready for lots of VERY LONG, unskipable adds. Occasionally, you will get one that is only 5-10 seconds but most are 45 seconds to a minute in length and there are a lot of them. Plus, don't switch off the app in the middle of a game to get involved in anything else for more than a minute or so because it will sit down the game and you will have to restart the level. And you won't get back any power ups you used.

Honestly I loved playing this game at first and made it all the way to level 500, HOWEVER the ads after every single game make the game not worth it. I would literally PAY to not have ads, but it's not an option and I can't stand it anymore. Also, if you complete a level but then don't sit through the entire ad you'll have to redo it. Infuriating.

This game still needs a lot of work. I've lost so many levels and golden tiles because it restarts, usually when I have around 20 golden tiles collected and I'm a few away from matching them all. I've had to repeat so many daily challenges also because this game restarts. I've contacted customer service months ago, but it still keeps happening. It should be fun, not stressful

Not the greatest matching game out there. Not only are there a ridiculous amount of ads, but the art style of the game is quite bland, I dislike how similar some of the assets look. I've mistakenly clicked on the wrong tile, thinking it was a different one, a few times now. There's also some oversight/glitch where if you finish a game, but accidentally leave the app before the ad after the game finishes, it does NOT count your progress, which is sooo annoying when I'm multitasking on my phone.

This game is a mahjong style game which is pretty fun in and of itself hence the 3 stars. However, I have yet to reach any level of the game that plays like the ads have suggested, which seems a bit deceitful. Additionally, there is no feature that tells what your possible "brain age" might be from how well you do or don't play. If the game was more like the ad suggested it might have received all 5 stars.

I love these types of games. I've probably downloaded more of these than anything else lol. However, what I don't like is the progression of ads. It fools you on purpose. You spend time on a game so you keep sucking up AD after AD after AD after AD!!!! Well guess what buckaroo? I ain't doing it anymore. So if the rest of the sheep want to, they can, but I am not making you money. No.

I really liked the game when the first ten or so levels played without an ad. Unfortunately, there's now an ad after every level, and no way to get power ups aside from watching yet another ad. I get (and agree) that the game devs should be compensated for their work, but it would be a much more enjoyable experience if there were an option to purchase an ad-free version. Surely, guaranteed money is better than fractions of dollars from ad impressions/clicks?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! We'd like to apologize for the inconvenience. Thank you so much for your feedback. As you know, our app is free to use, and ads allow us to support the app, optimize and improve it. We will take your comments into account, thank you very much!

scraped_reviews.content: This starts out fine but as the puzzles get harder, this turns into a real ad fest. These are all 30 second ads and they're nearly constant. I played to level 124 but it's gotten totally impossible to solve any of these puzzles in one shot so you end up always needing to refresh (one ad) or revive (2ADS!). You can, literally, spend several minutes (anywhere from 4 to 8 +) on one puzzle. It's really sad; this is a great game but I have a life and I don't want to spend it watching ads. Uninstalled

Do not play this game. It is not a game. It is an ad farm. At first it seems tolerable, but you will quickly find yourself watching between 2 and 10 (10!!) ads to complete a level, every level. It's not a matter of skill, either. This thing is a time vampire of the worst sort. I played 500 levels (for a gift card site,) so I know from grueling experience. I even tracked it on paper for my own validation. This app is abhorrent. Avoid it at all costs.

OMG..the ads! Only giving 5 of each of the boosters, which goes absolutely quick once you get to level 130. This game is nothing but an ad game. I couldn't take all those ads. DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME, because you're going to spend more time watching the ads than playing, and you're going to go through the boosters really quick, then you're going to have to watch 30 second ads to get 1 booster. Not worth it!

I am currently on level 407! I downloaded it through the KashKick app to see if it was like the other tile matching games that only let you get to level 3 and never pass it when you are playing for real money (KashKick pays, not the game) and I was amazed that I have been able to keep going. Yes, the ads can get crazy some times, but they give me time to get up and stretch or get a drink or whatever. I highly recommend this game if you are looking for a tile matching game that goes past level 3!

I really like Triple Tile, but the developers seriously need to make a way to save the game with Facebook, Google, Apple, email, etc. I'm on my fast 5G device and it seriously gets slow as you progress. If I'm able to finish a puzzle, it records my progress. Sometimes it crashes, closes, and I have to play that round all over. Please fix the ability to save your game progress. Crashes often. Very annoying, not recommended.

Gameplay itself is enjoyable. But the ads are out of control. I'm ok with watching a short ad to get an in game reward. But ads are pushing a minute long now. Some require clicking the X 3 or 4 times to close. Some give no reward at all. And the black screens, which force you to restart the game and poof all your progress is gone. Now, they've added ads that go off randomly in the middle of the level and redirect you to some shady website...losing all your progress too. Uninstalling.

This game is normally very enjoyable, but there are very obvious ad walls setup for you to fail at repeatedly with no chance of winning so that you'll watch more ads. Looking at you, level 239 (though you're not the first). I'll gladly update my review to 5 starts if these levels are removed, but they knew what they were doing when they made them, so I doubt I'll have to. EDIT: Actually came back to lower this to 1 Star because it's so obnoxious at a certain point. Way to ruin a good game.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear that you're not having a good experience with our game. We want to provide the best possible experience for our players, so we'd like to learn more about the issues you're facing. Could you please contact our support team? We're dedicated to resolving any problems you encounter. Thank you for bringing this to our attention.

scraped_reviews.content: I love this type of game. After 250, the puzzles were such that you needed to watch several ads EACH PUZZLE in order to get tools to complete the puzzle. Ridiculous amount. An occasional one, I get. But at least 7-10 times per puzzle?! Not worth it. I'm at 465 - a week left to hit 1000. It takes 10+ minutes for one puzzle anymore. I'm out. Edit to respond: it's not that I mind ads. It's that you make the puzzles impossible to solve without ads, which isn't really any fun to solve only w/tools.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We're truly thankful for your support! We'd like to express our apologies for any inconvenience you may have encountered. Your feedback is highly valued. Our app remains free due to ads that aid us in refining and advancing it. Your input is much appreciated!

scraped_reviews.content: Started off a lot of fun, and honestly, the game play still is, to a point. It very quickly becomes an ad machine with levels that aren't winnable without power upside, and you're forced an ad every time you do anything... basically... be ready for there to be WAY more ads than levels After reading their replies to others, I just want to note, we respect it's free because of ads. But if it has so many that it becomes trash, then it doesn't matter. Player experience matters more than ads.

I downloaded this from an ad in another game because it looked fun. It was advertised as having to draw a line to connect matching tiles in long streaks and accumulating a set number of each tile type to win the level. This is actually a mahjong type game where you have to collect 3 matching tiles while uncovering the other tiles. It's nothing like the demo they show in the ad. If a game is different from what is advertised, it's an automatic uninstall for me.

Personally I find the game really fun. It's nothing like the ads though so I took off two stars for that. Shame on the advertising department. It can get boring at times due to the repetitive pictures colors and noises. Overall a good game I would recommend. Not a cash grab, and it never gets too difficult that you want to rage quit lol. If you need "boosters" they are easy to get too. Good game for anxiety.

This game is ridiculous with ads!! I'm not winning any coins or power ups..if I want a power up during the level you have to watch at least 4 or 5 ads and only get one at a time...say it's the scramble the tiles..you watch this long ad..only get one and of course I have to use it and then I want say an undo time..another long ad and you get only 1 tile...very frustrating and annoying..the description of the game says there are purchases but I have seen none. Waste of my time..I am deleting!!

I sent a note there in the game itself multiple of times and also once through a e-mail about my situation and NO ONE RESPONDED. That is why I am here now. I got to level 450 and the same time the challenge game ad showed up. Well I made the mistake of playing the challenge game first before collecting my rewards arriving at the level 450. After playing the challenge game I assumed that I would get my rewards reaching the level 450. That NEVER happened. So can I get these rewards or is it lost?

I was enjoying this game. It isn't difficult and it keeps me engaged. I'm currently on level 78. I gave it three stars because I see that it's difficult to get helpers, the higher you go. Most puzzles are fairly easy but some can't be solved without using helpers. Then it requires watching an ad just to get one helper and I've had to get as many as four helpers in one game. So I will uninstall while I still enjoy it. I'll save myself frustration later on.

I really enjoy the game, but I cant give more than 1 star until the amount of ads is reduced. An ad after each and every level is TOO MUCH. If it was an ad after 2 or 3 levels, that would be much more tolerable and would make me more interested in playing for longer. And I get that "ads keep the game free to play", HOWEVER, it makes you look super greedy to have that many ads...
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We're truly thankful for your support! We'd like to express our apologies for any inconvenience you may have encountered. Your feedback is highly valued. Our app remains free due to ads that aid us in refining and advancing it. Your input is much appreciated!

scraped_reviews.content: I'm about to dump my Triple Tile app! The space under the X is so tiny that even when you hit right on it, it sends you off to the internet! And then you can't get back to the game in process! It'll start at the beginning of that round again! And if your finger touches the edge of the screen... THAT round starts all over again, even if there was only one move left! There needs to be a way to be a way to resume the game in progress!!!

So... I'm doing something wrong, I have gotten 0 ads in this game, which goes against what everyone else is experiencing; However, that also means I can't use the revive feature when you mess up. Another thing I have noticed recently is that I can't use any of the powers you get. 4/28/25 Edit: Well.. I opened my mouth. Now I have ads galore, but I got powers back. I will be uninstalling it because of the horrendous amount of ads in the game now.

Addictive! I've played a lot of match 3 tile games and this one is the most challenging one I've ever played. Cute graphics, smooth gameplay and no ads.üòÉ There's no store or option to watch ads in exchange for in game boosters. They are awarded for reaching checkpoints which is nice but it would be helpful to be able to earn or pay for the help when you're stuck. Overall, great app!

Played a bit of this game every day. Addictive. Got to level 1259, and was not able to go further. An ad, at the end of 1259, would not permit my passage to the next level. Ad insisted I download a different game, and locked me out from continuing play. Too bad because I had great fun with Triple Tile Match, and will be looking for a similar game to play.

I tolerated the EXORBITANT amount of ads until I couldn't take it anymore. There's an ad before the game, after the game, if you move to the next level, if you don't. Ads wind up longer than actual play time. And they're not short either. Some are two min long. No option to buy the game either which is unfortunate. It's addicting enough I would have purchased. Instead I found Tile Club & purchased that.

I play these games so you don't have to. This gets 3 stars because they bait you. First 20 levels, no ads. Every level after that has an ad. Overall it's pretty fun and a good way to kill a little time. But anything more than just playing these super easy puzzles over and over again, is not as rewarding as you would think. Game will always remain 3 stars.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! Thank you so much for your support! We'd like to apologize for the inconvenience. Thank you so much for your feedback. As you know, our app is free to use, and ads allow us to support the app, optimize and improve it. We will take your comments into account, thank you very much!

scraped_reviews.content: It's great and fun until you get to level 100, and then you can't possibly pass levels without watching multiple ads. Every two moves you have to shuffle or get a hint, and in order to do that, you have to watch a 30 second ad. Every time. I had to watch six ads just to pass one level. So play until level 100, then uninstall! If they gave me an option to buy to get rid of the damn ads, I might actually consider it, but they don't even do that.

I used to enjoy this game. It was a nice little puzzle game to veg out to. The ads were annoying but sometimes I could go many levels without an ad. But recently in the middle of a level I get sent to either an ad or the Google play store. It's understandable to do it between levels but this has gotten glitchy and ridiculous. It just happened 3 times in a single level so I decided to move on to another game.

I couldn't be more serious when I tell you that I flat out could care less about games, & really don't have time for them anyway. But this has been a win-win! It all started when I saw some offer for free food from Checkers if I download their app & i'm now getting free deals like every week (no, I dont work for them). One of the deals was to simply try out this Triple Tile game for any free burger. Only problem now is, i'm hooked on this game big time (plus it's oddly mentally calming too).

There is no option to turn off ads. It seems like these ai generated games all do the same thing free access, then slams you with non-stop ads, finish a level ad, failed a level ad, want to replay level ad........ you got to be kidding me. It annoying I do not play games that annoy me. If you spend more time closing ads than playing, you need to question why you have this app installed.

I love this game. Some of the levels are hard, some are easy, but im never bored with it. However, the ads are ridiculous. And I can handle the ads after every level but when I'm in the middle of playing a round, my hand is NOWHERE NEAR the banner ad, and then the app will redirect me to a web page about the banner ad. That's absolutely ridiculous.

If you close the app out before the ad finishes it doesn't count that you finished the level. I usually only want to play one level and then move on with my life. If I was in the mood to play more I definitely don't want to sit through 30 seconds of junk just to spend less than 2 minutes playing the actual game and then 30 seconds of junk again.

I've tried this game five times and every download has the same glitch - I play untill I'm tired or an ad pops up and I click off of it, the game closes, I try to reopen it and - nothing. A blank blue screen. Everything is lost and I have to redownload. Even more troubling is that for some reason this game is being offered in Inbox Dollars as on of their "if you download and reach level 500 in (fill in blank days) you earn (x dollars)". How if you have to redownload it and lose everything ?

Too many adds, adds to long, have to play 100 games to get help icons. To many games not winnable without help, this makes it not fun. The game is tons of fun if ads are under 30 seconds. Still fun, but the ads, which i understand, but so many, so long some over 30 seconds. I would like to play the game. If it doesn't get better I'm going to find another game.

I've spent more time watching INCREDIBLY long ads than playing the game. Note: levels 1-20 are ad-free. After that, it's every level, that you have to click X out of several times. The ads are also repetitive and disgusting: one is a person's skin with holes & bugs coming out of it. I started playing bc of a pay-to-play site, if I reach certain levels it pays me. However, after level 100, it's near impossible and frankly, this isn't worth it. Uninstalled.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! We sincerely appreciate your support! We want to extend our apologies for any inconvenience you've experienced. Your feedback means a lot to us. Our app is free because of ads, which help us enhance and maintain it. We'll definitely consider your input. Thanks a million!

scraped_reviews.content: There have been changes & improvements to this app. It's more enjoyable to play. Sometimes game will "stick" at that #51 spot. At some point, you stop receiving rewards. This gets inconvenient. There are more ads as you advance. Trade-off should be continued rewards without having to watch ads each time. Slows progress. Overall, a relaxing game.

I just wanted to sort groceries... I was looking for something different, and the ads for this game showed sorting shelves of groceries. I played a few levels but it's pretty much fancy mah Jong. Just another tile game. No shelves. No groceries. Just tiles. Blah. I just wanted the game on the ad. This isn't it.

It's fun until you get past level 100. Then it's grueling and not worth playing. It's designed solely to force you to watch ad after ad. You must use a booster because there's no possible solution without one. I wouldn't mind if I had to use one booster a level, but it literally needs one every few moves. There's no way to purchase boosters either, and most ads are at least 30 seconds. It's not fun. No one wants to watch 10 minutes in ads per level.

I'd like to see the ad revenue from this game. First 20 something levels lull you by not playing any ads. After that it's ads every level. About level 100 starts giving you impossible levels that you either need to buy hints to pass (one hint is almost never enough) or keep resetting in hopes for good RNG, watching ads after each reset of course.

title: Nike: Shoes, Apparel & Stories
description:
The Nike App is your personal guide to all things Nike. ‚Äã‚ÄãBecome a Member ‚Äã‚Äã‚Äãand‚Äã‚Äã get‚Äã‚Äã exclusive ‚Äãaccess ‚Äãto ‚Äãthe latest from Nike and Jordan. Shop innovative sport styles, trending sneaker releases, and curated streetwear collections. Unlock ‚Äã‚ÄãMember Rewards, personalized ‚Äã‚Äãstyle advice, and easy shipping and returns, all in one seamless shopping app.

SHOP BETTER AS A MEMBER
Free Shipping on Orders $50+, Member-only promotions, 60-day wear tests, and receiptless returns when you purchase through the app as a Nike Member.
‚Ä¢ Member Profile: View Activity, orders, and purchase history. Buy apparel, sport styles, sneakers, and accessories with the Nike online shopping app.
‚Ä¢ Member Rewards: Celebrate big moments like your birthday & Member anniversary.
‚Ä¢ Shopping App Exclusives: Unlock exclusive sportswear and streetwear. Get first dibs on new releases dropping weekly. Shop Air Max Muse, Vomero 18, Nike Dunks, and Air Jordans. Explore our latest innovations in running shoes, training gear, gym clothes, and more.
‚Ä¢ Jordan Mode: Shop the latest in Jordan clothing and sneakers, plus unlock exclusive content available only in Jordan Mode. Explore classic Jordans, seasonal apparel, and the newest sneaker release.
‚Ä¢ Jordan Sport: Find Jordan essentials from basketball shoes and football cleats to golf apparel.
‚Ä¢ Nike By You: Shop and customize iconic Nike shoes with curated color palettes and premium materials that match your style.
‚Ä¢ Nike Gift Cards: Buy digital and physical Nike Gift Cards for every athlete in your life. Unlock a world of footwear, equipment, and apparel.

SERVICES THAT CONNECT & GUIDE YOU
Shopping is easier with the Nike App. Turn on notifications to be the first to score the latest sneaker release. Chat one-on-one with a Nike expert for style advice.
‚Ä¢ Notifications: Never miss a sneaker drop. Shop online for the latest styles, drops, athlete collaborations, events, and more by turning on push notifications.
‚Ä¢ Training & Coaching for all: Expert advice delivered by Nike athletes, coaches, and personal trainers. Receive training tips from your Nike community wherever you are.
‚Ä¢ Nike Experts: Get sport and style advice from our Nike experts. Whether you are shopping for Jordans, men's clothing, or kids' sneakers, buy apparel with expert assistance. 
‚Ä¢ Exclusive Nike Experiences: Find Member-only events in your city and attend IRL or online. Join your Nike community. 
‚Ä¢ Online Shopping App with Athlete Guidance: Get exclusive access to expert advice, personalized shopping recommendations, and Member-only perks.

STORIES THAT INSPIRE & INFORM YOU
In-depth stories spanning across sport and culture, delivered daily. Follow your favorite athletes, sports teams, and products.
‚Ä¢ Member Home: Explore new, curated Nike stories, refreshed daily.
‚Ä¢ New From Nike: Discover Sneakers of the Week, view the next sneaker release, and browse shopping collections for women's and men's clothing.
‚Ä¢ Apparel & Sneaker Trends: Learn new ways to wear your favorite Nike styles, accessories, footwear, and streetwear.
‚Ä¢ Sportswear Collections: Running shoes, sports accessories, or gym clothes‚Äîlearn what gear empowers the top Nike athletes.

Discover a shopping app with Member benefits and explore the latest from Nike and Jordan. Unlock exclusive apparel, style recommendations, in-person experiences, and the newest sneaker release. Buy shoes and clothing tailored to your sport and style goals.

Download today and experience shopping as a Nike Member.

Download today and experience shopping as a Nike Member.
summary: Unlock the latest from Nike & Jordan. Shop sneakers & apparel for all athletes.

scraped_reviews.content: Very easy to use but man, too many bugs all the time, especially when adding things to the cart. I try to add things that are in stock and then says not available. I go to just look at the cart and says, try again later. Makes for a very frustrating shopping experience when all you want to do is check out. Like, cool, I guess you don't need my money when your sales are slumping 12% in yet another quarter.

Never had issues getting logged in until today. After removing and reinstalling the app multiple times, I still can't get in. I even tried to create a new account but no dice. Says error parsing data from the server or something along those lines. What's crazy is I was just on the app yesterday and put several items in my cart. Went back to see what was still in stock today and complete my purchase, but can't get past the login screen. Frustrating to say the least.

New app update won't allow me to sign in...I love Nike. I've been using the app for many years, with no issues. However, that changed when the latest update occurred. Now when I go to log in, it buffers then kicks me back to the initial start-up page. I have since deleted the app, re-installed it and made sure my VPN allows the app, yet still not functioning. Not sure what the issue is or what else to do...

Almost never able to purchase product that I want. I am a serious nike customer. It hard to keep spending money with you all when I'm always forced to purchase my second choice. My first choices are always sold out within seconds of releasing. Then all of the shoe stores are only selling shoes to people who want to purchase 10 pairs at a time. If you only want 1 pair it's easier for them to lie and say "oh sorry were sold out". If you wait a Little while you see someone come in and purchase 20.

The app has be total TRASH!!! for the last 2 or 3 months. It won't let me sign in. Keep on getting the message "Something is wrong, try again". I missed out on several sales and pairs of sneakers!!! I'm so damn annoyed!!! Spoke to a rep and they told me to call and do the order over the phone. That isn't always convenient. I can't even access the damn products. The app doesn't work!!! Come on Nike let's fix this!!!!!

I used to get a lot of shoes back in the days here on the app . I encounter an error adding an item to my cart as well as trying to "buy it now" App is useless to me nowadays since I can only get anything from the actual website. What's the point of receiving exclusive access on some items but you can't checkout . Shame shame ... spoke to an "expert" on the chat and all I got was - "I'll escalate it internally" or something among those lines . Anyway . Love Nike ! I hate the nike app n snkr

This app is an illusion. What they say is in stock isn't really in stock in America, it's in stock in their sweat shops in China I guess because how do you justify a 13 day shipping window, then you add an extra day directly after the purchase. This has happen during the holidays and during normal parts of the year for me at least. To add insult to injury they send you an email saying they haven't forgot about your product 3 days later instead of shipping your product or refunding you. Rude.

Very unhappy with both nike and SNKRS app. The app start having errors as soon as 10 am hits for releases. when I finally get through, it did not allow me to click anything to make a purchase. Then during a shock drop, it still was having issues and the app was not loading up until the drop finished and everything sold out. This isn't fair. As a customer and member for years and still going through this is bizarre. I'm done with nike.

Won't open my cart! I've had this app for a while now and left some designs om my cart. But when I'm ready to checkout, my cart won't open! It won't even load so I can view what I put in it! Sort feature for low-high price doesn't work; the prices are all over the place! Also when I look at one design and hit back, it also takes me to the beginning of my search list, not to where I stopped. Terrible and inconvenient.

App was great for ordering nike gear, great selection, and quick shipping. The prices were good too. Now, it doesn't work at all. I can not add anything to my cart. Nike needs to figure it out. Losing sale after sale. I deleted and re downloaded it 3 times now, and it has the same result. Will not allow me to add to the cart . So, APP DOES NOT WORK!!! HOPE NIKE FIXES THIS SOON. It WAS great.

They keep declining my orders. The 2 times my orders ever went through, one from me, when I first downloaded the app, the other from a customer service representative, they were canceled in few hours. All other tries proved futile. Customer service keeps telling me my billing address is the problem. How can my billing address be accepted on all the other shopping sites, when it has problem?

The app consistently crashes. I was trying to buy a pair of grey lottery dunks. However, during the transaction, it said there was an error processing my payment. There was more than enough funds and i ended up missing out. So unfair that i'll have to pay resellers bc you guys limit the quantity so much. Nike is the cause of the reseller market that they claim to hate.

I like nike products. You definitely get what you pay for. I have had my nike sneakers for almost 2 years now and they haven't let me down. Only problem right now is that when the latest update came through it bugged up the app. For some reason an error pops up when I try to go to my favorites. It says Server Error. Idk if it's a bug or something happening on their end but I hope they fix it soon.

Horrible, after ordering on this app time and time again, I now can't place orders and am missing out on all the good stuff. Same debit card with money in the account , they say my address is the problem but I have had shoes delivered there in the past. And for some reason only certain people are allowed to process orders over the phone?? Makes no sense how a big company like Nike allows this to happen. I've called customer service to no resolve. Very poor customer service! Not happy at all!

Purchased two items on May 15th. Only received half of my order when I got another email about 10 mins after saying that order date has changed when both items had the same delivery date. The other half of my order will take 1-5 business days and if I don't want to wait I can cancel my order which I hear they can do nothing about and get something else when I would have to wait longer for that item! Very dissatisfied all around.

I love using the Nike app. I use it to order all my shoes from and returns are especially easy as well. Customer service is amazing. They usually have pretty good sales. I just wish sometimes their sales would go with all their shoes not just the old ones. I mean not everybody wants to buy old shoes. I get tired of buying 200 plus dollar shoes. It'd be nice to get a sale on them every once in awhile for a one time coupon or something. Navigation is really easy. I love And I'll continue to use

I've spent thousands on this app and still never seem to get the shoes I want. somehow I get an error on the really popular ones. also when they release a shoe and it goes on sale before the 60 day return limit why not just refund me the difference for being a loyal customer. also, why isnt there some kind of point system for spending $ and spending it consistently that secures me rare and or limited releases? if your R/D department needs help we can talk numbers.

Navigation through the app is easy but the overall shopping experience gets frustrating you, placing orders and getting the orderconfirmation then a day or hours later I receive a notification that sorry, we had to cancel your order without any explanation, I reach out to them, they say that the payment review team is going to send an email or whatever and they don't reach out , the whole shopping experience becomes frustrating like the whole thing makes it hard to even shop online using the app

Everytime I want to buy some new drops online I was having an issue with my payment and then the shoe would sell out in minutes. There goes the shoes I wanted, but when I complain about how the payment processing is unfair I'm told a life hack is to buy a gift card and preload it and I won't have problems with the payment processing. It's not advertised on the site to do that, how would I know that? Thats some BS. Offering me to buy your gift card just to buy some shoes off the site. I'll pass.

thr last 6 months my Nike app hasn't been working wel. it either wont take my payment or add my items to the cart even when they are in stock. I have contacted tech support and still the same issues. I just tried to order a hoodie and it wouldnt accept my payment. I kept getting an error.

The app experience is much better when Nike realizes their are people out there manipulating the site with bots to buy up shoes in seconds keeping you from having a legitimate chance at making a purchase. There has been numerous times I have been in the process of buying a shoe from a drop to then be told it is now sold out.

As of lately, the app has been messing up. I've installed and uninstalled it multiple times, and it keeps saying no connection. So I have to go on Google to the actual website. that's frustrating because I just want to check my orders and the app doesn't work. then when it does download, the Nike and Jordan sign keeps interchanging and then the product pictures never load. Please fix

Defaulted to US even though downloaded from UK store and location enabled. Cannot change country in the settings and loads of code errors making no sense... The website today no different. It doesn't accept any payments and more error codes there as well. What??! Worst experience in years with website or app, period!

I've never seen such a bad shopping app in my life, every single piece of information needs double verification, it keeps you trapped on an infinite loading screen when trying to pay, it doesn't format phone contact numbers properly, shows infinite error codes everytime time you try to check out, choose payment methods and pick up locations. Why spam my youtube videos with your useless adds to make people buy products, if your goal is to make it as hard as possible for people to obtain them????

WHAT DID YOU ALL DO: still not fixed i see. paying for items just continues to be stuck in a loop for almost 2 weeks now. I had to delete the app to keep it from reverting me to the app, then log in through my phone web browser to make my purchase. please fix

it's hard to find the items you want and it doesnt really sort properly like only choose men but then even women items shows up. right now your app and website is frustrating because you removed gcasj as another payment option but cleary shows on your FAQA and gcash list you are still in partnership.

Pretty much unusable due to poor UI design. For example say I want to look for mens shoes, size 9, between 50-100, I'll select the filters and begin to scroll but one slight deviation to the left or right and it moves to another category and all the filters are lost.

The app was always working great and Now for the last week it won't let me put anything in it's bag. I can't purchase anything. I contacted support and I did everything. I logged out. I Reinstalled the app. I cleared the cache and still nothing. I think the app needs an update . Can some help.

very poor customer support! i was having some issues in checking out an order , so i asked customer support but thode people made me repeat same things for 4 days and my problem still persists. i haven't got any updates from their TECHNICAL TEAM. it's better to switch to other brands

0 star The payment option is not working i tried more than 20 time from different devices but still not working everytime i proced for payment it shows CODE error RP1 and sometime PD2 my birthday month promo code is going to expire in 3 days and the nike team telling me it will take 5-7 days.What is this Application i am frustrated from this. i wll give it 0 Star if possible. bad experience and there is only one payment option(Debit/credit card) showing in my application .

the nike app is amazing... they have anything from bulky sneakers to more of a sport look... 10/10. they also have customizable shoes for you to create and they are in a pretty reasonable price for what you get... worth the time to get the Nike app. oh and you get discounts on most of your purchases!!!

I can not log in to my Nike account. I've had this problem now for 3 days. Will you please fix this issue. Your app us trash and an inconvenience. I haven't been able to log in all morning. How long is it going to take you to make an app that works especially when you charge us what you do for clothing and shoes not to mention I own stock in your company

Terrible experience. I have been a member of the nike app because i used the nike run club for years since 2020, but never placed an order for shoes/cloths. I tried to place an order through this app for some shoes since my birthday is coming up(10/21) and i dont have any shoes atm. Nike offered me a 10% birthday discount but for some reason when I placed my order it got canceled. I tried multiple times and had Nike CS step in and help but still my orders all get canceled. Terrible experience!

unusable. trying to place my order and keep asking for my password. filled my correct password but unable to close my transactions due to not accepting the password. how could that be when in fact i can log in the Nike app the same password that I am using to close and pay the basket transactions. switch to Adidas app and planning to buy samba and special.

this app is no help at all. Tried ordering a pair of Jordan's and 2 pairs of custom shoes and it canceled on me 3 times. After the first time I called they stated it was security and they will review it. The second time they can't give me a reason. the 3de time I ordered I called them directly after to give all my info and more so I can just get the damn shoes. But nope it didn't help at all.

Need more improvements. It changes to the next categories easily when scrolling. Then, when I return to the category i am scrolling, it will go back to the top when it is supposed to show where I left before. It makes it harder for me and of course, I have to spend more time just because of that.

Return Process in the App was repetative. When trying to process a return I kept getting recycled to a new "athlete" service rep every few minutes in the chat and had to re-explain my issue to a different person from the very beginning. I must have restated myself about a dozen times. The chst function should be more persistent and not time out so fast. I also had issues uploading photos to the attachments section of the chat. Buying a product is easy and enjoyable but returning is a headache.

Good app design. However I recently had an issue wherein I couldn't get a birthday discount code even though It was my birthday month unlike last year where I received a code. I then contacted support only for them to state that the account had to be active and that they give other accounts a chance to get the promo. This is just silly in my eyes as they treat these codes like a golden ticket. If it's your birthday and you haven't got a code just know nike only recognises it every other year.

Liked being able to make my own shoes and not dealing with a shoe store not having your size on something you want. Anything, Nike, Jordan, or Converse is in the app. I've used it many times without issues.

The app performs as expected ~70% of the time, but the other ~30% of the time, I am unable to add items to my cart or checkout if items are already in my cart... makes the whole experience kind of frustrating.

I tried to buy a sneaker on the app. paid the amount and followed all the necessary procedures, to find out that what I ordered was out of stock. I waited 20 DAYS before I could "Waste MY AIRTIME" to call someone from abroad who gave me an apology and said the money will be wired back to my account. I am not a happy customer. for a first time user, I could expected much more.... üíî

App is literally a bug and customer service sucks. I just became a member and received a promo for 10% off but turned out its an expired code. Why would you give an expired code? I get disconnected twice from chat whenever I try to take a screenshot or the info about the shoes. Customer reps aren't helpful. Tho, customer service gave me 15% off but man I can't use it for my first purchase. Just because the shoes I'm trying to buy are excluded from promotions. What a waste of time.

Google Pay does not work in the app, and trying to use the mobile site with the app installed hijacks your browsing and sends your session to the app. I had to uninstall the app just to complete a purchase (successfully using Google Pay via the mobile site). This app actually prevented me from purchasing until I uninstalled it.

we had experienced a delay with our order like 3 weeks delay. we explicitly mentioned that this is a gift supposedly but nike did nothing. they just went ahead and provided us our orders aside from that we didn't receive anything just a "sorry" but did not provide any action really bad experience. the surprised was ruined!!!!

I love foamposites. Everytime I've tried to purchase a pair through this app on the release date it never goes smoothly. Royal Blues were set to release today at 10am est. I hopped on the app several minutes ahead of üïñ. "Loading..." it said. It's now 10:22am and the screen never said anything but loading. And by 10:25 they were no longer available. Just let "SNKRS" handle your releases from now on ...update, 2 hrs later I was able to purchase. But I stand by my statement. SNKRS does it better

Get rid of the horizontal scrolling to change categories! It gets triggered half of the time when scrolling down when browsing items even if you do it slowly. Also the app doesnt save your filters, so when the horizontal scroll is triggered and changes the category, you have to reset it again.

app was great but recently it will not load anything and says there's errors. I've uninstalled and reinstalled and it wont get past the home screen. . . . update: a month later and still not working properly.
When I open the app, it says I nd to download the updated app. I have uninstalled the app and downloaded it again numerous times, but it still doesn't work. I can't open the app at all.

Absolute garbage. Customer service lie through their teeth. I have a 150 pound gift card i cant use and my account wont let me pay for anything. I am furious. Im done with Nike and will never purchase from them again and any nike clothing i own is going in the bin.
very easy to navigate. it's a very fun site actually to go to and shop at. awesome very pleased with my purchase thus far I'm waiting for my other two items to come soon.
